1.content:
Matt walked in the back door of his home. The 17-year-old high school student tossed his backpack onto the kitchen table.

He had ditched his final class of the day in order to get home before his younger sister, Kellie. He wanted to have some privacy for his experiment.

Matt felt nervous and wiped his sweaty palms on the front of his jeans. All his research appeared about to pay off. He got a bottle of water from the refrigerator and gulped down the refreshing liquid.

The teenager hadn’t shared the nature of his research with anyone else. He wanted to make sure his formula worked before he shared the story of his success.

Matt already suffered from teasing, especially from his kid sister. Kellie always took delight in ridiculing her big brother’s interest in science, making fun of his geeky ways and nerdish behavior.

It didn’t matter. Soon, very soon, Matt told himself, he would get the last laugh.

He took his water and made his way down to the basement. With his parents’ permission, Matt established his own private laboratory in the basement. Matt’s parents felt proud of him, even if they did worry that he spent too much time in his lab rather than socializing with his peers.

Matt logged on to his computer. He saw an e-mail in his Inbox from his best friend. He could not wait to see the look on Andy’s face when he revealed that his formula worked.

Impatient to begin his experiment, he decided not to read Andy’s e-mail. He could read the e-mail later, after conducting his experiment.

Matt moved to a mini-fridge. He opened the door and took out two glass jars. One jar held a red liquid. The other jar held a pale blue liquid.

He placed the jars on a table.

Reaching into his desk drawer, Matt removed a small portable tape recorder. He pressed the RECORD button and placed the recorded on his desk.

“I am proceeding with the experiment. Earlier successes have led me to believe it is time I test the formula on myself.”

He reached for the jar with the red liquid. He tilted the glass back and quickly chugged the contents.

“If I am correct, I should feel the effects begin almost...”

Matt stumbled. He felt very strange. The room started spinning until everything became a blur of color. He experienced the sensation of falling before everything faded to black.
1.title: Testing the Formula

It was a sweet, adorable little boy with a mop of golden blond hair, though he towered over Matt like the Statue of Liberty. He couldn't be more than five or six years old, he bent down and stared down at Matt with a mixture of curiosity and interest.

"Hi," the boy said as he scooped Matt up in one hand. Matt sat in the boy's palm as the boy looked him over. "My name's Steven. Are you a fairy?" Matt made an indigent noise, but before he could speak. the boy said: "No, I guess not.... you're not a girl and you don't have butterfly wings....What are you?"

"Steven!" called a female voice.

"That's my Mommy, I gotta go." Steven put Mat into a cargo pocket of his pants and ran toward his mother

Matt heard the exchanges between Steven and his mother and to his horror, he learned that Steven was only visiting his grandparents in this neighborhood and that he lives on the other side of town, near the countryside!

He heard the boy get into the car, heard the car door slam and then felt himself being taken out of the pocket.

He stared up at Steven from his sitting position in the boy's palm as the said boy giggle at him. "You're coming home with me," he said. "But don't worry, I'll be your bestest friend ever, little guy."

Before Matt could say anything, little Steven put an even smaller Matt back into his cargo pocket, and there Matt was for the remainder of the journey.
112222.title: A little boy named Steven

1122221.content:
All during the journey in the pocket of little Steven's pants, Matt had little choice but to think on his precarious dilemma. He would rather be in more dependable hands, but at his tiny size, he has no choice but to try the boy.

Steven, except for his enormous size, looked like any other sweet, adorable little boy. He might only be six years old, but if Steven got clumsy or impatient, the consequences could be dire for Matt.

Matt figured he could reason with the boy and convince him to get him back to his home. Without access to his lab, he knew he had no hope of getting back to a normal size and a normal life.

So, after a long, boring journey in the pocket, Matt was ready when Steven's hand intruded into the pocket. The huge fingers nabbed tiny Matt and pulled him out.

The tiny youth found himself on a vast bed. Steven sat on the bed, looking down at tiny Matt.
Steven, with that mop of golden blond hair, still looked like an angel.

A very big angel as he loomed over Matt a colossus.

Matt felt very nervous, but he had to regain the upper hand.

"Where are we now, Steven?"

"In my room."

Matt remembered that Steven's room meant that he was far across town, actually in the countryside, probably in one of the many subdivisions that had been constructed on former farmlands. In other words, he was a good distance from home.

"Steven, you have to help me..." Matt began.

Suddenly, Steven reached down and poked Matt with a big finger. The simple jab bowled Matt over.

The boy laughed. "How'd you get so tiny if you're not a fairy?"

"I invented a formula," Matt said, but then Steven looked confused.

"It's like medicine," Matt said. "And I drank it, and then I shrunk."

"Cool!" Steven said. "And now you're my pet."

"No!" Matt exclaimed. How to convince this huge boy that he wasn't going to be his pet?

Suddenly, he didn't have any options. Without warning or permission, Steven scooped him into his fist.

To Matt's fright, he felt almost crushed in the boy's grasp. Finally, when he felt he might suffocate, Steven released him...

...by dropping him into a enormous glass bowl.

Could it be?

Matt looked around the curved walls. It was! Steven had put him into a huge fish bowl.

"Steven!" Matt screamed. "Let me out of here."

The angel with the golden hair looked down at him and smiled. "That's your new home," the boy said.

As Matt stared up at him from the depths of the glass bowl, Steven smiled again.

"We'll be the bestest friends ever, little guy."

Unfortunately, Matt wasn't quite sure he shared the boy's optimism.

11222211.title: Pet in Training

1122222.content:
Like most kids, Steven was impatient to play with his new toy, pulling Matt from his pocket as soon as he got to the privacy of his room. The kid's eager fingers left purple and blue bruises on areas of Matt's body where he was squeezed too tightly.

"Easy!" Matt yelped when Steven released him on a cluttered desktop. "I'm not indestructible!"

Steven laughed. "What's that mean?"

"Indestructible?" Matt said. "It means you can't treat me like a toy!"

"You're not a toy, silly. You can be my new pet."

For Matt, that didn't sound much better.

"Look, I need your help, kid," he shouted. "Could you carry me back to my house? I need my antidote..."

"No," Steven shook his head. "You've got to stay with me. I'm bigger, so you have to do what I say."

Matt was prepared to argue, but the door burst open and an even bigger giant entered the room.

"Mom said get ready for dinner, squirt," the huge giant said in a loud voice.

Matt wanted to groan. He knew the giant, and that wasn't something that he was glad to discover. Tyler was an arrogant jock at the high school, always teasing Matt and his more studious friends.

"What's that you've got?" Tyler asked.

"Nothing," Steven said, grabbing Matt and hiding him behind his back.

"Steven, show me," Tyler commanded.

Steven removed his hand from behind his back, and raised his fist, showing the shrunken teenager to his older brother.

Tyler burst out laughing. "Hey, I know that little wimp!"

"He's mine!" Steven said, squeezing possessively and causing Matt to gasp.

"Hand him over, squirt. Now!"

Matt had thought ahead enough to build a ramp up to where the antidote is so getting to the antidote would be easy but he would be very vulnerable if he was caught half way up. There would be nowhere to run.

Then again, his pants pocket is right here. Matt can't think of anything useful in his pocket but maybe he could craft something if he got creative.

13.content:
Matt’s gradual return to full consciousness extended over a period of about half an hour. He found his body so exhausted that he could barely open his eyes, let alone move under his own power.

He managed to focus on something. It looked the size of a billboard and he remembered the letters 32.

More time passed. He felt a chill. His eyes snapped open. “Where are my clothes?” Matt mumbled.

He grunted and pushed himself onto unsteady feet. A large wall of white surrounded him. He walked closer to the expanse and touched the wall. It felt like thick cloth. That’s when he noticed that strange billboard.

In the back of Matt’s mind, he knew he had seen something like it before. It looked like the label in his boxer briefs.

“Oh crap!” Matt exclaimed. The wall of white...everything made sense. “My formula! It worked!”

He had shrunk. And he had shrunk out of his clothes until he now stood, very small, in his own boxer briefs.

He ran toward the wall. He began to grab with his fists at the fabric, determined to hoist himself out of the enormous boxers.

He had failed to take into account that his formula would have no effect on his clothing.

After Matt escaped the boxer briefs, he saw more articles of clothing. He found one of his sneakers turned on its side. The shoe as big as an apartment building. A strong stench wafted from the interior of the sneaker.

“Everything looks so big!” Matt wondered how small he had become.

He got closer to his size 9 sneaker. The shoe dwarfed the tiny teen.

“I must be only an inch tall!” Matt exclaimed. He hadn’t meant to get that small.

But, he had proven that his formula worked.

“Now, I just need the antidote and...” Matt’s words trailed off and his mouth gaped open as he stared up at the distant tabletop. He saw the jar with the pale blue liquid, the antidote to his shrinking formula.

“Oh crap!” Matt felt like kicking himself. “How am I going to get to it now?”
13.title: One Inch Tall Teen

"Well..." Matt's dad began, sheepishly, "I saw a jar of that one liquid and thought it was a protein drink that your mom said she would make up for me. Apparently, it was your shrinking potion. But...wow! Son, it works!! Do you know what this means?"
Matt's father, Roger, was also a scientist, but a rather absent-minded one. Roger had always encourage his son's scientific endeavors, no matter how crazy they sounded. And they often were. The shrinking potion was the first crazy science experiment that actually worked! And Matt could see that his father was proud. Matt could also see that his father had the same idea, also using a gum wrapper to cover himself. Good thing Matt chewed a lot of gum!

"What? What's wrong?" Andy asked his friend. Andy quickly ran towards Matt when it looked like Matt was about to faint.

Suddenly, Matt let out a loud groan as Andy witnessed Matt shrink back to 6 inches in height. His body dwindled rapidly, as Andy watched Matt's arms and legs shrink, his torso diminish, and his head shrink down, all at once. Matt was suddenly covered by his huge clothes on the floor!

"Uhhh.... what happened?" Matt sighed.

Matt grew back to 2 feet tall! This time, he remained at that height.

133211222111123.content:
"Hopefully you're not going to spend the rest of your life as a two-foot-tall man," Andy said.

His buddy was joking, but the thought still made Matt nervous. "That's not my biggest problem," he admitted. "What am I supposed to do until I grow back?"

"You could come stay with me," Andy said. "You know my parents are hardly ever home."

It was true. Andy's parents were very absorbed in their own lives.

"OK, that gives me a place to stay," Matt said. "What about something... uh... to wear?"

Andy proved to be the man with the answers. An hour later, and after a visit to a local dollar store, Matt was dressed in some sharp clothes — well, for a toddler. Bright cartoon animals on a blue background of a T-shirt and a pair of jeans.

"The store didn't carry shoes," Andy said with a shrug. "The weather's warm, though."

So, they walked back to Andy's place a few blocks away. It took much longer than they expected. Matt kept falling behind, unable to match Andy's stride. He kept having to call out in a high, thin voice for his much-bigger friend to slow down.

He was exhausted once they got to Andy's house, but since the house was empty, getting him up to Andy's room wasn't a problem. The stairs, though, that was a bit of a challenge. He had to almost hoist himself onto each step, which made for slow progress.

"I guess I took size for granted," Matt said when he reached the second floor.

Throughout the week, he was having to depend on Andy for almost everything, such as getting items from tall shelves and even opening a closed door. He hadn't realized until he tried that he was too short to reach the knobs on many of the doors.

He sent texts each day using his phone to explain that a "project" he was developing with Andy required all of his time and that he was staying over another night.

"I hope I grow back soon," he said after sending another text to his parents.

The next morning, after a sound night's sleep, he screamed in delight after waking to find himself back to normal.

The scream didn't do much for Andy's mood. "Damn, man," he complained. "I thought you'd shrunk again when I heard that."

"Sorry," Matt said, realizing he was now naked under the sheets of the bed.

"No problem. Glad you're back with the grown-ups."

"Speaking of that... could I borrow some clothes from you?"

Andy chuckled. "Sure."

Andy's clothes were a bit roomy on him, but it was better than the alternative.

"I think I should go home," Matt said. "I can resume my work on the antidote and make sure it's stable."

"Want me to come with you?"

"No, you've done enough," Matt said. "I'll call you later."

With no decent food in the house, Matt called Andy and asked if he wanted to meet him for dinner. They discussed their options and agreed to meet for burgers at their favorite restaurant. With inexpensive food, fantastic fries and big burgers, it's popular with almost everyone.

For such a warm day, Matt wore only shorts, a T-shirt and flip-flops for the short walk to the restaurant. He puzzled over his lack of insight into the formula problem, but he decided to let it go for one evening. Perhaps relaxing and enjoying himself might clear his mind.

Of course, he arrived at the restaurant ahead of Andy, who was always running late whenever they made plans. He was glad to see their favorite booth in the back, blocked off from most of the rest of the dining area by a large juke box. He slipped into the booth and told the server he was waiting for someone. The guy left so soon Matt wasn't able to ask him for a drink of water. The walk to the restaurant had left him thirsty. Strangely thirsty, in fact. He also felt sweaty and clammy at the same time. He barely had time to hope he wasn't getting sick when the room began to steadily grow around him.

The weight of heavy clothes as he shrank into them alerted him to the reality. The restaurant wasn't getting bigger. He was getting smaller, again!

He started to slide out of the booth when the shrinkage kicked into high gear. An instant later, a shrunken Matt found himself on the pad of one of his plastic flip-flops, buried beneath the tent-like proportions of his shorts.

"Oh no!" Matt exclaimed in a shrill voice. He climbed from beneath his clothes and stood naked and tiny. He discovered that his clothes had slipped between the seat and the tabletop, which would make concealed from any casual observance.

Furthermore, he was tiny. Incredibly, extremely tiny. The size of an ant.

Tiny Matt gazed around his basement laboratory.

"Crap!" Matt screamed. "Crap, crap, crap! How could I be so stupid?"

The whole point of the experiment had been to shrink. He should have thought ahead about making certain he could obtain the antidote, now far out of the one-inch-tall teen's reach.

He heard a noise and turned his head. He felt a chill creep along his spine.

"Buttons!" Matt exclaimed as he saw the family feline slink past some old cartons.

The cat looked like some prehistoric dinosaur, a feline-osaurus rex.

And, Matt realized, he looked like prey!

Matt made a frantic scan of his surroundings. He saw two possible hiding places close at hand.

A small crevice, actually more of a cavern for the tiny youth, led into the basement wall.

He saw, too, the overturned sneaker. Could he reach the shoe and hide there until Buttons left the lab?

The crevice led into a spacious but dimly lit space in the wall. Matt lingered near the entrance to keep an eye on Buttons. He saw the huge cat pause to sniff at Matt’s discarded sneaker.

Matt sprinted across the floor toward the cave-like entrance of his overturned sneaker. He climbed into the shoe and turned to look back.

The huge cat, attracted by his dash to the shoe, came rushing toward the sneaker.

With a squeak of fear, Matt raced toward the toe section of his sneaker. There, in the dark, the inch-tall-teen cringed in fear. He saw the cat's huge paw rake the interior of the sneaker.

He also became very aware of the stench permeating his surroundings. "Do my feet always smell this bad?" Matt said, almost gagging.

He strained to listen. The cat no longer thrust its paw into the shoe. Had the feline gotten bored and given up the hunt?

He really felt small now. Reduced to cowering in his own sneaker, he chided his stupidity in testing his formula on himself.

Maybe he should get out of the shoe and try to reach the antidote.

The inch-tall youth remained somewhat jumpy, remembering the close encounter with the enormous feline. An eerie silence pervaded the laboratory.

Matt caught a whiff of the rank shoe sweat smell. "First thing I am going to do is take a shower," he said as he made plans, prematurely as it turned out, for what he would do once he restored himself to full size.

The tiny teen walked across the lab until he reached one of the massive supporting legs of the table where he had left the bottle of antidote.

The wooden table leg looked like some monumental column. He walked under the table and gazed upward. He felt like he had entered some ancient and colossal temple.

His situation looked hopeless. How could he ever reach the antidote on his own?

That's when he noticed the huge cable snaking down from the tabletop. Matt ran toward the long, coiling loop. Could he manage to climb the cord and reach the tabletop?

Suddenly, before he got the chance, he heard a noise.

His heart pounded as he looked for the source of the noise.

Matt saw...

134212.content:
Slap. SLAP. SLAP!

Matt looked up in wonder as his best friend descended the stairs into the basement laboratory. Andy's flip-flops slapped the stairs with each step he took.

"Andy! Help! Help me!"

Andy stopped at the base of the stairs. "YO! MATT!"

Matt scurried over the floor toward the enormous gray flip-flops. As he got closer, he saw how enormous Andy's feet looked to him now.

"Maybe if I can pound on a toe," Matt said.

He leaped and managed to scramble onto the wide rubber surface of the top of the flip-flop. He started toward his friend's big toe when Andy moved.

"GUESS HE'S NOT HERE!" Andy said.

"Oh no! Wait! I'm here! On your foot!" Matt screamed.

Andy began to walk.

SLAP! SLAP!

Each step threatened to throw Matt off the flip-flop.

He scampered into a space between his friend's biggest toes.

Suddenly, a bright light blinded the tiny guy. He felt his world spinning. Then, with a jarring abruptness, the motion ceased and Matt is thrown off Andy's flip-flop.

1342121.content:
Matt opened his eyes. He blinked and tried to bring his vision into focus.

A strange jungle of green surrounded him. He rested on a stretch of dirt beneath the shadow of a broad leaf.

“Where’s Andy?” Matt wondered.

“And where am I?” The tiny youth got to his feet and took a few steps. He walked to the “trunk” of a strange tree. He felt the rough surface of the tree.

Then, he realized, he was standing in the shadow of a plant stem, not some large tree. The jungle of green was blades of grass.

“Crap! I’m in the backyard!”

••••••

Meanwhile, the eight-year-old son of the next-door neighbors left his house with a butterfly net and glass jar. He needed to complete an assignment for school. He had no luck in his own yard, but he looked at the unkempt lawn next door.

Matt’s neglect of his chores, such as mowing the lawn on a regular basis, left his family’s backyard an overgrown mess.

But, for one eager boy with a class assignment due, the yard looked perfect.
1342121.title: Lost in the Yard

13421211.content:
Matt stopped to rest next to a tree trunk-sized blade of grass.

The location looked familiar, and the tiny shrunken teen began to suspect he had been moving in circles.

He prepared to renew his attempts to find his way out of the backyard jungle and back to his home when a huge sneaker stomped down only inches from him.

"Ha! Found one!"

The words of excited triumph rang in the ears of the tiny teen genius.

Before Matt reacted, a huge tangle of mesh fell down and scooped him from the ground.

As he struggled, he managed to gaze up into the huge face of a kid.

He saw huge but stubby fingers reach for him.

"Hey! Stop! What are you doing?" Matt shouted.

"Just got to put you away," the kid said.

Matt renewed his desperate but futile struggle.

The boy plucked his tiny captive from the net and produced a glass jar.

"You're a good start to my bug collection."

"Wait! I'm not a bug!" Matt protested.

The kid, however, failed to hear Matt's frenzied but feeble shouts.

Matt dropped with a thud to the bottom of an enormous glass jar.
13421211.title: Caught

choices: taped Matt down his his desk to study him more.
13421212.content:
Jeremy liked collecting bugs and small animals. His 11 year old brother always called him "the little critter man" because he was constantly catching crickets, lizards, frogs & minnows. His Mom was always getting on him for his critter hunting because he didn't like wearing shoes (he didn't think he could creep quietly enough in shoes) but didn't like going barefoot. So he would get a lot of grass stains & holes in his white socks.

He knew the neighbor's yard would be perfect for getting some bugs since it hadn't been mowed for a few weeks. His teacher had assigned the class to collect & identify four different types of insects, an assignment that was right up his alley. Even though he still had a week to do the project he couldn't wait to start.
____________________

Matt was desperately trying to find some high ground so maybe he could see above the grassy forest he was trapped in, find his house over the tree-like strands of grass and head that direction. He figured if he could make it back home he could get either his sister or Andy to help him get back to normal. The grass was about twice his height, but looking up through it he could see the big maple tree which was in the middle of the backyard. He decided to make his way towards the tree so he could climb it a little bit to figure out where he was.

The grass was like a jungle, and at his size each blade seemed thick and heavy. He moved around a large cluster of crabgrass, and stopped because he heard some rustling up ahead. His heart started pounding as he could hear something making it's way toward him through the grass. But in addition to the rustling he could also feel very large vibrations, almost like some very large object was pounding over and over again on the earth a short distance away. The rustling and the pounding vibrations seemed to be two different things.

Suddenly, a large cricket lept right at him, knocking him to the ground. The cricket seemed to be as afraid of him as he was of the cricket and with one huge jump lept away from him. And that's when Matt saw the source of the pounding. It terrified him when he saw that the cricket that just knocked him down was now trapped in a net hundreds of feet above him, and was being put into a giant jar. He saw the huge figure of Jeremy, his little (!!!!) neighbor kid, looming very large above him. Jeremy was very happy with his first capture.

It never occured to Matt to try to get Jeremy to help him. He had always considered Jeremy to be a little bit annoying and so he picked on him a lot. He knew that if Jeremy were to find him at 1 inch tall he'd be in a jar for the rest of his life. So simply by instict Matt started to run.
__________________________

Jeremy cupped the cricket gently in his hand and dropped it in the jar. He had handled bugs for a long time, and was always very careful not to harm them. Then he picked up his net again and crouched down low so he could search through the long grass. Out of the corner of his eye he noticed some movement in some of the long grass about two feet to his right. He slowly stepped in that direction, being very careful not to step on whatever it was that was in the grass. He set the jar down, and then reached down towards the moving grass. He gently moved it aside, and saw something, he wasn't sure what, trying desperately to move away from him. He took his net and dropped it right over the small creature. Then he carefully moved his hand under the net, moved the grass aside so he could find the little critter to trap it. Jeremy's eyes got rather large as he realized what was trying to escape him. He knew it couldn't be, but it looked like a very tiny man. He very gently picked up the small creature between his thumb and index finger, turned the net over and dropped it in.

Jeremy sat down cross-legged on the lawn so he could see what he had found. A good bug hunter never goes hunting without a magnifying glass, so Jeremy pulled his out of his pocket so he could get a better look at his little captive. He put his left hand under the net, so that Matt was lying on the netting on the palm of the boy's hand. Holding the magnifying glass in his right hand he got a closer look at Matt, and realized instantly who he was.

"Whoa! What happened to you?" he said softly. He studied Matt for a few moments. Matt was trying to shout up to Jeremy for help, but Jeremy was unaware of it because he was so preoccupied with the fact that he was holding a tiny man on his hand.

Jeremy slowly lowered his left hand from under Matt, and let the netting (and Matt) rest on the fabric of his sock on the side of his foot. He put the magnifying glass back in his pocket, grabbed the jar, and got up to head back to his house holding Matt in the net. He didn't want anyone else, especially his brother Jimmy, knowing what he had found. He got to his bedroom and...
13421212.title: Captured For A School Project.

choices: Jeremy takes a good long look.
Jeremy wants to experiment with his find.
134212121.content:
...and put the net down on his desk. He saw the little person jump down off of the net, so he picked it up and put it down next to his closet door.

The little man was running all over Jeremy's desk, trying to get his attention. Jeremy was fascinated. He had to get a better look.

Jeremy sat down at the desk and Matt continued to try to attract the giant boy's attention.

"Hey! Hey! Listen to me!" Matt yelled up at the boy, but he backed away from the edge as Jeremy pulled himself towards the desk, his form looming larger and larger.

"OK, little guy," said Jeremy, putting his hand onto the desk, trying to stop the little guy from running around.

As soon as Matt saw the hand descending into his path, he veered away, he did not want to get anywhere near a hand again, being picked up by two fingers was bad enough.

"Stop," Jeremy said, moving his hand, trying to get the little man to stay still so he could get a closer look.

Matt kept running to avoid the giant hand. Jeremy began to get annoyed and reached into his desk drawer. He pulled out roll of tape and tore off a piece. This was all happening high over Matt's head, so his first inkling was the shadow of Jeremy's hand coming down. He was not quick enough to avoid the clear tape descending on top of him, pushing him down to the desk top, trapping all but his head and one arm. He struggled to free himself, but the tape was too strong.

"There we go..." Jeremy said and lowered his head towards the tiny man.
134212121.title: An Object of Curiosity

1342121211.content:
"You're not such a big know-it-all now, are you?" Jeremy asked with surprising vehemence for an eight-year-old kid.

He stared down at Matt's tiny, struggling pinkish form trapped beneath the broad swaths of tape.

"Listen, please," Matt begged. "You've got to help me out, Jeremy. I need to get back to the basement. I have a formula in my lab that will grow me back to normal."

Jeremy laughed. "Oh, no. I like you like this." He knew bugs, and he knew that most bugs were more than a match for Matt in size. He felt more than a little vindicated to realize that he had the upper hand with his former tormentor.

"But you can't keep me like this!" Matt protested. He writhed beneath the tape strip, almost unable to comprehend that he was so small a mere strip of tape could immobilize him.

"You should have thought of that all those times you were mean to me," Jeremy said.

"I'm sorry," Matt said. "Really, I am truly sorry. So, could you please help me out, Jeremy?"

Jeremy smiled and shook his head. "You're mine!" The eight-year-old said with awful finality.
1342121211.title: Too Late for Sorry

Matt held onto the mesh of the net for dear life as Jeremy carried him along. All he could see was the ground far, far below him with Jeremy's feet coming into view one at a time as the boy walked towards his house.

Once they got inside, Jeremy ran up the stairs to his room and Matt was knocked to the bottom of the net ,quickly turning himself over after looking at the dizzying view below him.

Jeremy went immediately to the shelves on the wall of his room and grabbed something. He brought the net over to the something and turned it upside down. Matt fell down onto a bright green plastic surface. Above him, a clear plastic cover was snapped into place. Jeremy had put him in a "bug box", a small plastic container about 3 inches tall and about the same in diameter, more than big enough to hold Matt.

It had clear walls most of the way around it and a gridwork of clear plastic at the top where a boy could put food into the bug without having to take the top off. Jeremy thought it was perfect to hold his find. Matt thought it was hell on earth as the gigantic boy lifted the cage so he could see his captive better.
134212122.title: Matt's new home

choices: Matt uses the stuff Jeremy left to try to escape.
Matt settles in for the night.
1342121221.content:
Matt watched the titanic 8 year old walk around his room. Matt's mind raced. How could he get out of here? The top was way too high for him to reach and the plastic much to thick to try to break. He'd have to get Jeremy to let him out...somehow.

Jeremy walked around his room, trying to find things that would be good to put in with his new find. He'd have to give it water, he knew that. Maybe a cap from a plastic bottle. Something for the little thing to sleep on...hmmm, maybe a piece of that shirt of his that his mom was going to throw out, yeah that would do.

Matt readied himself as the gigantic boy approached his prison.

"Hey!" he yelled as Jeremy's hand held the bug box and began to take off the top. Jeremy's fingers took up a lot of room in the box, so Matt was squeezed against one wall as the boy put things down for his cool find. When Matt felt the fingers withdraw, he saw that Jeremy had left him a capfull of water almost as tall as he was and a rag of some kind.

"What the hell is this!" he shouted up to the boy, who he could see looking down at him through the mesh.

"There you go, little guy, some water and some place to sleep." the boy crooned.

What?
1342121221.title: Jeremy Makes Matt Feel Welcome

13421212212.content:
jeremy looked down with pride and smiled approvingly at his finest capture. he continued " you will be living in there for a long, long time! you are now my prize addition to my collection. if you behave yourself, i may put you in a nicer cage".
jeremy tapped the side of the bug box with his finger and laughed a devious laugh.
he continued "if you don't obey me, i will not feed you. if you continue to fight me, i will punish you!"

matt looked up and had no choice but to agree to his terms....at least for now!!
13421212212.title: trapped!!

13422.content:
Inside his shoe shelter, Matt heard someone enter his lab.

"Matt! Hey Matt, you in here?"

He recognised the vioce. It was his best friend Andy. Andy looked at the table that was covered in beakers and flasks.

"Looks like someone's been a busy beaver."

Andy glaced at the cat, which was staring inside of a shoe on the ground.

"Yo Buttons, you seen Matt? Weird. I sent him an email telling him I was coming over." It was then that he noticed Matt's clothes in a heap on the floor. Huh, never thought he was much of a streaker...

He gathered the clothes and shoes. To Matt, it felt like he was riding a roller coaster as his friend carried him out of the lab and into the laundry room. Andy placed the pile on the washing machine in case he wanted them washed.

It was now Matt realized that Andy could help.

"Andy!!!!" Matt shouted, "Andy! Over here! Look over here! I shrank and I need you to get me the antidote! ANDY!!!"

But he was much to small to be heard. As Andy reached the front door, Matt heard him run into his younger sister.

"Hey, have you seen your brother?" he asked her.

"No, not since this morning," she replied. She wasn't surprised that Andy was in the empty house. For he had a little habit of coming in without needing an invitation and was considered a part of the family.

"Well, tell him to call me when you see him."

"S-Sure." she said, blushing. Andy was soooo dreamy!
13422.title: Enter: Andy

134221.content:
Kellie, still daydreaming about her brother's friend, Andy, entered the laundry room.

She saw the pile of her brother's clothing atop the washing machine.

"I guess Matt thinks I am supposed to do his laundry," Kellie said resentfully.

Matt, who had tumbled into a fold in his boxers, heard his sister's voice and struggled to exit the cotton canyon and get himself seen.

"Kellie!" Matt screamed. "Hey, Kellie! Help!"
134221.title: Laundry Time?

choices: Kellie drops you in with the boxers
Something distracts her from finishing the laundry
1342211.content:
"Hmm." Kellie began sorting through the laundry, dumping the colored clothes on the floor for later while dropping the white clothes directly into the washing machine. Your boxers just happen to be white.

You feel your sister's hand close around you, and then vertigo as you are lifted into the air. Kellie's hand hovers over the washing machine, ready to drop you into the watery abyss.

What happens?
1342211.title: Kellie sorts the laundry

choices: He survives, and the door opens.
13422111.content: The water was surprisingly warm when Matt hits it. He can't help but think that he wouldn't have minded swimming in it if he weren't trapped in a giant pair of boxers and about to be drowned in a giant washing machine. A second later, Kellie slams the lid shut, leaving him alone in the darkness. An ominous rumbling forewarns the movement of the chamber, slowly at first but spinning the clothing (and Matt) more and more quickly until he can't tell which way is up and his lungs feel like they'll explode.
13422111.title: Kellie drops you in with the boxers

choices: Dropped deeper into the dirty clothes
Climbed atop the clothes in hamper
1342212.content:
Kellie, after time to consider, decided she didn't want to clean up after her irresponsible older brother.

"He can wash his own clothes," she said.

She gathered up Matt's clothing — jeans, boxers, shirt — and carried them toward a tall wicker clothing hamper.

At the same time, her unfortunate inch-tall brother remained tangled deep within the folds of his boxers. He felt the chaos of motion as his sister took his clothes from atop the washing machine and carried them to the hamper.

His next sensation involved the lurching motion of a sudden plunge. He ended up on his back on a stretch of cotton gazing skyward from deep inside the hamper.

"Kellie!" Matt screamed. "Help!"

He saw Kellie's giant form looming overhead with more clothing in her hands.

"Kellie, I'm down here..."

His huge sister responded by dropping the rest of her brother's clothing into the hamper, burying him deeper.

Matt tried to dig himself out from beneath his own heavy clothing. He smelled some rather rank odors within the hamper, which held clothing in much more need of a wash than his own clothing.

He crawled in the darkness and...
1342212.title: In The Hamper

choices: Refuse, and ask if he can lead him out.
13422121.content:
Instead, Matt plunged deeper into the mass of laudnry.
"Greetings," he heard a voice say.
He turned around and in the darkness he saw an old, elf-like creature with pink hair and a blue toga.
"I am the sock nymph. Who might you be?"
Matt couldn't believe his eyes. "I-I'm... My name is Matt."
"Aye, you must be from the upper world. Us sock nymphs,we live off the socks your kind leaves behind in the great cave of tumbling warm. Why is it that you are normal size, and not your giant self?"
"It's a long story. How can I get out of here?"
The nymph scratched his chin. "You've got a strong back, why don't you join us, and become a nymph? The world is much more simple down here."
13422121.title: The Nymph

choices: falls into a bowl of chip dip
135.content: Matt decides he must escape from the basement. As he finds rope leading down the steps he begins to climb. He reaches the top where he sees he is in the kitchen. He luckily finds some string hanging from the top of the kitchen cabinet to the ground. As he reaches the top he realizes he its not string but a spiders web! The spider starts to walk towards him as matt frees himself from the web but falls from the cabinet.
135.title: The Escape

1351.content: Matt lands on rough material. He looks and sees a zipper up ahead. He must have landed on his sisters backpack! Just then, he sees Kellie approaching him, dressed in her work atire. She picks up the bag and one straps it over her shoulder while Matt grabbed onto the top to stop himself from falling.
1351.title: Off to work we go

13511.content:
Kellie was dressed in her work uniform. A dark green polo shirt with white beaver logo on her breast, tucked into her brown cargo shorts. She must be going to her job as a tour guide at the Green Marsh wildlife center.

https://www.pc.gc.ca/en/serapprocher-con...

You try to walk up the bag towards her hair so you could contact her but she shifts the bag causing you to trip backwards and fall into her backpag, landing with a thump on her baggie stored sandwich.

It looked like you were going with her to work. Thankfully Kellie wasnt the only person you knew who worked at the marsh, since almost everyone who worked was going or went to your school. If you couldnt get Kellies help you could try for them.

Kellie goes outside, hops on her bike and starts pedaling. You could feel her body rock side to side with each pedal and it was starting to make you feel nauseous. After a while, she arrives at the marsh and she drops her bag off in the employee lounge. With the bag walls now remaining still, you were able to climb and exit the hole between the zipper tabs.
13511.title: Wildlife center

1352.content:
Matt falls into the big bowl of chip dip. At first he falls completely under, but he finds that with a little effort he can stay above the surface pretty easily. Unfortunately, while he's escaped the spider for a bit, he can see that the spider is very slowly starting to descend towards the bowl of dip. Matt can't believe it's going to end this way: after everything he's been through, he's going to be eaten by a spider while stuck in a giant bowl of chip dip.

Eventually the spider reaches the dip. By this time, Matt has swam over to the opposite side of the bowl and found, to his disappointment, that there's no way he can climb over the top. Fortunately, the spider didn't know what it was getting into, and it can't move in the dip. Matt can't believe his luck, but he still has a feeling of low-level panic. The spider can't get to him, but he also can't escape. What's going to happen?

After about 15 minutes of staring at the spider, Matt hears a loud, rhythmic thunder. He doesn't want to take his eyes off the spider for one second, but all of a sudden the bowl of dip is lifted high into the air. Matt remembers that his sister had said she would invite her friends over to watch TV that day, and he also heard his mom say that she was going to a PTA potluck.

He looks up to see the giant face of...
1352.title: Danger in the dip

choices: Riding a chip out of the bowl
13521.content:
He looked up at the enormous face of his sister.

"Kellie!" Matt yelled. "It's me! Your brother! Here in the dip."

Instead of indicating she might have heard him, she took the bowl in her hands.

"Enjoy!" Kellie told her guests as she returned to the living room and placed the bowl of dip on the coffee table.

Matt stared up at several of his sister's friends. They all looked impossibly huge.

Several enormous hands reached for some chips and began scooping dip.

The first scoop also removed the spider stuck in the dip with tiny Matt.

"Oh, gross, no!" Matt tried to warn the unlucky diner. "Don't eat that!"

He saw the tiny spider disappear into a huge mouth. The huge girl ate dip, chip and spider in one great bite.

Matt felt sick. Not only because he had seen someone eat something as revolting as a spider, but because he could be eaten next if he didn't find a way out of the bowl.
13521.title: Snack Time

choices: Something stops Amanda in the nick of time
135211.content:
Matt panicked. All around him, gigantic chips descended into the bowl, plowing through and scooping up huge (at least to him) amounts of dip. He struggled to slosh his way through the bowl, which was very deep to him. To his tiny body, it was like trying to swim through a pool of concrete.

Far above him, Kellie and her friends were engaged in conversation.

"WHERE IS MATT TODAY?" Kellie's friend Julie asked.

"BEATS ME, I CAME HOME AND HE WASN'T IN HIS LAB. OR ANYWHERE ELSE, FOR THAT MATTER." She responded while
dropping a chip into the bowl of dip.

Matt had looked up at the sound of his name in time to see the chip descend, held in Kellie's impossibly huge hand. It entered the thick dip several meters in front of him and shoveled towards him at an angle.

"Kellie, don't!" Matt squeaked pathetically. The combination of the cavernous bowl and the thick dip swallowed up his puny cries for help. Matt's heart sank as he felt the massive chip move underneath him, like some gigantic whale below the vast surface of dip. Even worse was the horrific squelch as the chip began to rise out of the dip. Matt felt himself going up. But luckily enough for him, Kellie's angle caused him to only be caught at the edge of the chip. A small dollop of the dip, him included, plunged back into the bowl.

His problems weren't over, however. He had landed on his back now, and the thick dip was finally winning it's battle with him. He tried valiantly to right himself, but the dip was like quicksand and he was stuck fast. He had a full view of Kellie and her super-sized friends high above him, enjoying their snack.

"HE'S BEEN REALLY BUSY WORKING ON SOME KIND OF SECRET FORMULA. HE WON'T TELL ME ANYTHING ABOUT IT!" Kellie boomed as she shoved the chipful of dip into her mouth.

"WOW, WHAT A DORK!" Came the thunderous voice of Amanda, another of Kellie's friends.

"YEA! A SECRET FORMULA? SERIOUSLY!" Said another girl, Andrea.

Matt, even in spite of his predicament, felt a pang of hurt. His formula worked! It would make him rich! Provided, of course, he first find a way to avoid being eaten by a couple of teenage girls! Matt's chances, however, got slim as he watched Amanda lower a chip into the dip. He looked to his right as the chip plunged into the dip and moved at him. This time, perfectly square.

"Amanda, no!" Matt screamed, but it was in vain as Amanda unknowingly scooped up the tiny teen with some of the dip. All Matt could do was scream in sheer terror as he felt his whole world rise up rapidly as Amanda picked up the chip and stopped it level with her lips.

"I REALLY DON'T THINK IT'S VERY OF NICE OF YOU GUYS TO MAKE FUN OF HIM!" Kellie thundered. "HE'S NOT EXACTLY HERE TO DEFEND HIMSELF AFTER ALL!"

"EVEN IF HE WAS HERE," Amanda said, "HE'S TOO QUIET TO EVEN WORRY ABOUT DEFENDING HIMSELF!"

Matt looked in the direction of his gigantic sister as she came to his defense. She was looking right at him, but his body was covered in the dip and he blended right in onto the chip.

"Kellie, you have to stop her! Don't let her eat me!" Matt screamed.

His attention was focused back to Amanda as he felt himself start to move. She wasn't even looking at the chip, focused on her chat with Kellie. She began to slowly part her gigantic lips, adding to Matt's torture as she slowly opened her mouth. The light from the room illuminated her huge, pink tongue, framed by rows of clean, white teeth. In the back of the enormous cavern he saw her throat, open and waiting for him. He screamed again as he and the chip approached her cavernous open mouth.

"Amanda, no!" Matt screamed. "Don't eat me!"
135211.title: Scooped

1352111.content: It is no use, Amanda stuffs Matt into her mouth. Matt avoids her huge teeth as she devours the chip. Amanda's huge tounge forces everything in her mouth down her throght. Matt can hardly breath as he is pushed father into Amanda. He thinks he is going to pass out when.......
1352111.title: Into her mouth Matt goes

1352112.content:
Matt continued to scream at his sister's gigantic friend as he was greeted by a blast of her warm, humid breath as the chip moved to within inches of disappearing into her mouth. He, a teenage genius, was about to be devoured unknowingly by his own sister's best friend.

"Not like this!" He squeaked as the chip started to enter her mouth.

"HEY AMANDA, WAIT A SECOND!" Came the voice of Kellie from outside the mouth.

Matt's tiny head spun rapidly as Amanda pulled the chip out of her mouth and held it in front of her.

"WHAT?" Amanda said, clearly annoyed.

"WELL, I THOUGHT MAYBE WE'D GO FOR SOME ICE CREAM. FIGURED YOU'D WANT TO SAVE THE ROOM, YA KNOW?"

Matt could sing, if not for the fact that he was still stuck fast to the chip, held tight by the gob of dip. He had come very close to being reduced to a snack for a teenage girl. But his sister had saved his life and never known it.

"THAT SOUNDS GOOD, BUT WHAT DO YOU SUPPOSE I DO WITH THIS?" Amanda said, holding up the chip a little and causing Matt's stomach to lurch.

"I DON'T KNOW, FINISH IT IF YOU WANT! OR JUST THROW IT AWAY!"

Matt knew it was all too easy. And now he had even more problems as he looked up to Amanda's billboard-sized face. She contemplated the the chip, not noticing the tiny passenger whose life she held in the balance.
1352112.title: Something stops Amanda in the nick of time

13521121.content:
Amanda stared at the chip for a few seconds deciding what to do. you could tell she was looking right at you but couldn't see you. "AMANDA! DON'T DO THIS! HELP ME! AMANDA! NO!" you screamed, but it was ineffective. even with all of your screaming and waving, you were unnoticeable to your sister's best friend.

Amanda glanced quickly at your sister then back down at the chip. "EH, CAN'T WASTE THIS." comes from her mouth right in front of you. Amanda then begins to slowly part her lips again. "AMANDA NOOOO!" you scream once again. it's all happening so fast but also seems to be in slow motion. her gorgeous lips make the entrance to your soon to be death trap. you look up to her one more time in an attention to get noticed, but you slide under her nose and into her mouth without any hesitation on her part.

you land on her tongue and you're able to spin around quickly in time to see your sister looking at her. then your last glimpse of the outside world is cut off as her lips close. her massive tongue begins to shift and you are thrown with the chip onto her right set of teeth as she begins chewing. you somehow are missed on the first two chomps, but on the third you aren't so lucky.
she bites off your legs. you scream the loudest you have from the worst pain you've ever experienced, and all at the hands of your sister's best friend. "MMM OH MY GOD THIS IS SO GOOD KELLIE. WHAT'S IN IT?" Amanda lets out before she unknowingly finishes you off. then her tongue pushes you over slightly more and the rest of your body is crushed into mush with the chip as she is ready to swallow.

outside she is still chatting with your sister and the other girls. your sister has no idea that she was feeding you to her and her friends. she also had no idea that her best friend Amanda was killing her own brother. Amanda casually giggled as she finished chewing and swallowing you. she, nor anyone else, will know what she had done to you.
13521121.title: Amanda eats the chip

135212.content:
"Oh my God, so Gross!" Andrea squealed staring directly at Matt.

Matt thrashed in the thick gooey dip. "No, I'm not a bug!" He screamed hoping they'd hear him.

"Oh my God. I'm so sorry guys, I don't know where that could have come from." Kellie said grabbing the bowl from the table.

Everybody's appetites officially ruined, snack time was over. Matt tried desperately to get his sister's attention as she carried the bowl back into the kitchen.

"Stupid fucking bug!" She grumbled under her breath as she opened the trashcan.

"Wait, Kellie! Stop! It's me, Matt!" The shrunken teen begged as the bowl tilted towards the can.

Kellie used a rubber spatula from the counter to force out the dip. When it was nearly gone, she could still spot the writhing bug that embarrassed her.

With a look of hatred, and annoyance Kellie unceremoniously flicked the bug out of the bowl with the spatula.

Matt screamed as he fell to the floor below, landing with an audible smack. The dip coating his body splattered around him.

He barely had a chance to groan before his vision was engulfed by the sole or Kellie's blue bedroom slipper. "Kellie! No!" He cried.

Kellie stomped down with all her might. She felt a satisfying crunch as the bug was squashed under the ball of her foot. She angrily twisted it back and forth before dragging her foot backwards leaving a trail of remains, and dip.

After tossing the bowl in the sink Kellie wiped up the mess she made on the floor. She was still embarrassed, but she felt better about getting revenge. She padded back into the living room with a grin, parts of her brother's body clinging to the sole of her slipper.
135212.title: Eew! Bug in the bowl!

13522.content:
"Mom!" Matt screams after seeing his mother's enormous face above the bowl. "Help me!"

His mother was running late for the potluck. She didn't notice her shrunken son before popping a lid onto the dip bowl. She quickly shoved the bowl into a bag, and rushed off to her car.

Matt was in full panic the entire car ride. He tried to keep on top of the dip as best he could. Unfortunately his every moment caused him to be even more covered.

After being carried inside the lid of the bowl was ripped away quickly. Matt saw his mother above him, obviously in a rush. "Mom!" He called out, nearly choking on the dip. She couldn't hear his cries for help as she shoved a spoon inside the dip. She walked away without a second glance.

"Okay everyone, let's eat." A loud voice called out.

Matt struggled to climb his way out of the dip as hungry faculty and parents lined up at the buffet. It wasn't long before someone took a spoonful of the dip from the bowl. Matt remained trapped scoop after scoop.

Another enormous hand shoved the spoon into the dip. This time right under Matt's shrunken form. With a nightly plop Matt was deposited onto the plate of.....
13522.title: His mother

choices: In the maw of Mrs. Graham.
135222.content:
Matt managed to clear the dip from his eyes as the plate was carried towards an awaiting table. High above him Matt saw his teacher, Mrs. Graham.

The no nonsense literature teacher seemed to wear a permanent scowl. At 63 years old she had spent over thirty years dealing with high school kids. She was stern, but Matt did enjoy her classes.

"Mrs. Graham! Look down!" Matt screamed while trying to climb out of the thick dip.

The tiny boy sunk deeper into the dip as the plate was roughly deposited onto the table. Mrs. Graham sat down, immediately striking up conversation.

Matt could hear the voices of several other faculty, and parents. He struggled back to the top, and called out for help again. His already pitiful voice drowned out by idle chit-chat.

The giantess teacher began to eat while still being enthralled with the table's discussion. She lifted fork after fork of green beans and corn. Along with chunks of honey ham.

The aggressive beating of Matt's heart was nearly enough to vibrate the entire plate. Though when Mrs. Graham suddenly dunked a cracker into the creamy dip Matt honestly believed his heart exploded.

"Please stop! I'm down here!" Matt cried out in desperation.

Casually snacking at the end of her satisfying meal Mrs. Graham took another scoop of the delicious dip. Only now there was another ingredient on this cracker.

Matt screamed in horror as he was carried towards his teacher's enormous mouth. "Please don't eat me!" He begged.
135222.title: His teacher

1352221.content:
Weighed down by the dip Matt could only screamed as Mrs. Graham's lips parted as he approached.

It seemed like an eternity as the gaping mouth taunted him. He could see every detail of her teeth. The slight yellowing near the gums. The cavity in one of her molars.

The enormous tongue pressed down firmly awaiting the delicious morsel. Damp breath, smelling mostly of the previously devoured ham.

In reality it only took a fraction of a second for the giantess to deposit the entire cracker into her mouth.

The light was extinguished as massive lips closed tightly.

For barely an instant the cracker remained centered on the saliva coated tongue. Matt screamed desperately as the muscled beast shoved the cracker between Mrs. Graham's teeth.

The crunch reverberated through the inside of the mouth. Matt struggled to slide off the cracker and onto the tongue.

As he tumbled over the side the cracker and dip were mashed into unrecognizable paste. Mrs. Graham shifted the lump back onto her tongue covering Matt.

The tongue rose up and pressed Matt and the chewed food against the roof of the mouth. As the esophagus opened the tongue slid backwards forcefully.

The undulating esophagus walls captured the glob of food. It along with Matt were being swallowed into the stomach below.

Matt was still struggling to hang onto anything he could. Managing to get free from the actual food Matt tried to climb back up the fleshy tunnel. Unfortunately the way was tightly closed off.

Feeling something stuck in her throat Mrs. Graham swallowed hard. The undulations returned causing Matt to slip further down.

Matt was able to brace against the esophageal walls. Just as he began to force his way back upward the walls opened above him. Mrs. Graham had taken a big gulp of her drink to wash down whatever was stuck in her throat.

Unable to hold on Matt was swept away. He flowed through the esophagus and through the sphincter at its end.

Matt splashed down into the putrid juices below. He swam to the surface as quickly as he could. He wipe gunk from his eyes, but instantly knew something was very wrong.

His skin began to burn horribly. The acid in Mrs. Graham's stomach was wasting no time attempting to dissolve the shrunken teen.

In horrendous pain Matt tried to find anything to climb on. With absolutely no light inside the stomach he was simply flailing about aimlessly.

The stomach groaned as it began to churn. Its massive walls squeezed inward. Matt was pushed deeper inside. With no chance of resurfacing Matt drowned as his lungs filled with the burning acid.

Mrs. Graham finished her meal. "Not bad." She commented on the food to a near by teacher. "Nothing too special though." Unaware that one of her students was a secret ingredient.
1352221.title: In the maw of Mrs. Graham.

choices: Mrs. Graham uses the napkin again.
Matt recovers, and climbs off of the plate.
Someone comes by collecting plates for the trash.
1352222.content:
Writhing wildly Matt threw himself off the side of the cracker with little regard to the consequences.

Matt fell past the table as Mrs. Graham shoved the cracker into her mouth. There was a small audible plop as the dip cover boy impacted the linoleum floor below.

"Oh, shoot." Mrs. Graham said still chewing.

She glanced down at the tiny splatter of dip a few inches away from her yellow leather Clark sandals.

Matt wanted to get her attention as she looked directly at him. Unfortunately his body was still aching from the fall.

Before he could recover Mrs.Graham slid her chair backward. With napkin in hand she reached down with a groan.

"No!" Matt barely managed to croak out.

The already soiled white napkin cover him like a fallen circus tent. Mrs. Graham's fingers slid backwards crumpling the napkin, while picking up the dip and the tiny teen.

With a matching groan Mrs. Graham sat back up and carelessly tossed the napkin onto her plate. Matt was cushioned from further damage by the soft white napkin.
1352222.title: A desperate dive.

13522222.content:
Matt slowly regains feeling in his body. Enough so that he begins to slowly crawl out of the crumpled napkin. Being so tiny has proven to be extremely dangerous. He knew his best hope was being discovered.

Exiting onto the plate Matt is annoyed to see that Mrs. Graham has left the table. A quick look around revealed the entire table to be empty. Most of the room's occupants stood huddled in multiple groups.

"Hey! Help me!" Matt called out to the nearest group. The post meal chatting drowned out any attempts at gaining attention by the tiny teen. Frustrated, Matt scanned the room for his mom. He could only hope she was still here.

To Matt's surprise he spotted his mother, but she was unfortunately on the other side of the room. He thought that if he couldn't get someone's attention, the next best option was to hitch a ride home with his mom.

Matt had no interest in dropping to the floor. He knew the odds of him making it to his mom without being stepped on were basically zero. Instead he would have to wait on the table top, hoping his mom would come near enough.

A shadow suddenly loomed over Matt. He turned to see that Mrs. Graham had returned. He called for her, but she was in a hurry as she talked on her cell phone. She quickly reached down for her purse next to her seat. The giantess inadvertently bumped the table sending Matt falling off of the edge.

As he tumbled through the air Matt could see he was headed straight towards ....
13522222.title: Matt recovers, and climbs off of the plate.

choices: In the floorboard of the car.
135222222.content:
Matt's fall was short compared to before. He fell through the unzipped opening of his giantess teacher's purse.

Before Matt could find his footing in the cluttered purse it was roughly hoisted into the air. Walking quickly Mrs. Graham ended her call as she exited the cafeteria. She haphazardly dropped her massive phone nearly on top of the tiny teen. Matt attempted to call out to her but was cut off by the deafening sound of the zipper being pulled closed.

Matt clung to anything he could grasp as the purse swung slightly with each quick step. His grip failed him as the purse suddenly dropped. As it landed with a thud on Mrs. Graham's passenger seat Matt was trapped under her enormous cell phone.

He remained pinned under the phone for nearly ten minutes. Matt clenched his eyes shut tightly when the screen illuminated. The ultra bright light was piercing in the darkness, but paled compared to the screeching ringing that began a moment later.

Unable to see, or hear Matt's senses were completely overwhelmed. So much so that he didn't feel the purse opening above. The phone was effortlessly lifted off of him.

Matt couldn't understand Mrs. Graham's conversation with the constant ringing in his ears. The light shining through the opening of the purse was only a dull shimmer through Matt's sore eyes.

He was completely unprepared for the cell phone to be casually dropped back inside the purse. Without warning something slammed into Matt instantly knocking him unconscious.

Eventually Matt began to groggily stir awake. Everything he had was incredibly sore. As he opened his eyes he saw that he was....
135222222.title: Mrs. Graham's open purse

choices: Was completely unaware of his presence.
Had an itch on the ball of her foot.
1352222222.content:
Before his vision cleared Matt could already smell putrid foot sweat. Opening his eyes he saw a pair or rough, disgusting feet. Each one coated heavily with dirt, and rough callouses. Past the feet he was surprised to see someone he recognized. Patty, Mrs. Graham's 35 year old daughter.

The last time he saw her she was working as Mrs. Graham's TA. She just stopped coming in one day. There were rumors of drug use, multiple sexual partners, etcetera. Matt always chalked it up to high school kids spreading bullshit. But as he stood in the shadow of a foot that hadn't seen a shoe, or shower in a while he started to believe.

Patty's right foot slid forward, pushing Mrs. Graham's purse that had been haphazardly dumped on the floorboard aside. Matt lurched backwards as the slender, unpainted toes came to rest where he was standing. He couldn't help but stare at her uncut nails, each caked in dirt.

Unfortunately Matt wasn't prepared as Patty shifted in her seat again. Those disgusting toes swept over him as her foot slid sideways. Knocked down Matt was pressed under the rough ball of Patty's foot.

Writhing in pain Matt tried to pull himself from under the foot. Nothing he did was enough. Without effort Patty trapped Matt as she rested her foot on the floorboard.

Above as Matt desperately tried to free himself Patty....
1352222222.title: In the floorboard of the car.

13522222221.content:
Patty's foot slid down slowly over Matt. He felt the weight in him decrease enough for him to wiggle free. Before he had the chance Patty's toes clenched around him.

He looked up from between her big toe and the second to see Patty staring back at him. She looked at him with curiosity, before cutting a quick glance at her mother. With Mrs. Graham focused on driving Patty reached down towards Matt.

Despite his protest her fingers effortlessly plucked him from between her toes. She cupped him in he hand to hide her discovery from her mother. Matt saw her casually glance at him several times. Her eyes lighting up as she slowly made connections in her brain.

"Mom, is that kid Matt still one of your students?" She asked sending a chill down Matt's spine.

"He is. Why do you ask ?" Her mother replied.

"He was the one really into science right ? What's he working on now ?" Patty asked, haphazardly rolling Matt under her thumb.

"Deeply into science, though maybe a little more science fiction lately. Last I heard he was trying to figure out a way to shrink people. Which is obviously impossible." Mrs. Graham said, unaware that Matt was very much successful.

Patty's eyes lit up. "Really, shrinking?" She said amused. "That'd be fun."

"Such a pointless thing for a boy so bright to focus on. Why on earth would anyone want to shrink themselves ?" Mrs Graham asked as she pulled into her driveway.

"Maybe some people would get off on being so tiny. Then again, I bet there's a lot of people who would love to own a tiny pet." Patty said with a sly grin.

Mrs. Graham looked at her daughter with a dry smile as she unbuckled. "Well, I'll make sure to ask Matt if he's looking for a giant owner when he shrinks." She said sarcastically.

Patty clasped her hand tightly around Matt as she climbed out of the car. "Don't worry about it mom. If he was tiny, he wouldn't have a choice would he?" She said with an unsettling calm.

Mrs Graham looked at her daughter blankly for a moment before smiling. "Not if he didn't want to get stepped on?" She asked with a raised eyebrow.

Patty grinned widely as she walked around the car. "Exactly mom. You'd make a good giantess. You'd have the little guy worshipping your feet in no time." She said laughing.

Mrs. Graham just shook her head and laughed. "Let's go inside dear. You should get cleaned up before dinner." She said leading Patty inside.

Matt tried desperately to call out to his teacher as Patty walked past. His tiny voice muffled by her dry flesh. She carried him into the privacy of her old bedroom. Once inside she opened her palm and stared down at him with a devious smile.

"Hello Matt." She said. "I need to get cleaned up. You're going to help me by.....
13522222221.title: Felt something tickling her foot.

135222223.content:
As Mrs. Graham's foot raised into the air Matt landed right on top of her toes. His one inch body slipped between her sprawling toes as she stepped forward.

Despite being so tiny, Matt was far too large not to notice as the giantess' toes squeezed back together as her foot landed on the ground.

Mrs. Graham instantly felt the strange lump between her toes. In a hurry, and impatient the giantess raised her foot, and roughly jostled it side to side.

Matt felt like he was in a massive washing machine. His body was tossed violently back and forth against the giantess' toes. Somehow he remained wedged between the chubby digits.

Frustrated Mrs. Graham lifted her foot and grabbed her yellow Clark's sandal. Matt held onto the side of Mrs. Graham's big toe to avoid falling to the ground below. It was a pointless effort as a massive finger shoved between the toes.

With a flick Mrs. Graham dislodged the annoyance between her toes. As Matt tumbled across the tile floor the giantess slid her sandal back on. Casually as she moved forward she kicked the tiny object out of her path.

Matt rolled across the unforgiving tile as if he had been shot out of a cannon. His body going completely limp. His limbs flailing uncontrollably.

The shrunken teen came to a stop in the middle of the floor. If any, or all of his bones were broken he couldn't feel it. In a barely conscious state Matt's vision was locked straight ahead.

Matt watched as a pair of slender ebony feet clad in simple tan, leather flip flops moved towards him. The enormous feet belonged to his chemistry teacher, Ms. Martin. She was young, only mid-twenties, and very intelligent. She actually helped Matt with some of his formula, though she didn't realize that.

Matt attempted to croak out the ebony giantess' name, but his body refused even that. He could only watch as she grew nearer with every step.

A powerful impact just behind him sent tremors through the floor. Matt could not even look back to see who had nearly crushed him.

"I was hoping to get to talk to you!" Ms. Martin said gleefully.

Matt's managed to clench his eyes shut as Ms. Martin's right foot fell right beside him. She stopped to talk to the unknown giant. Matt tried to get his body to obey, but it was far too broken. He could only watch as her foot began to fidget back and forth.

A casual shift to the monstrous foot was an enormous impact to Matt. Without warning the sole of the flip flop landed on his already useless legs. With an effortless movement she crushed his legs entirely.

Matt barely managed a garbled moan. It was all made worse as her foot shifted again, dragging Matt's limp body with it. Every movement over the next few minutes saw Matt mercilessly ragdolled by the leather flip flop.

When the short conversation ended, and Ms. Martin began to walk Matt felt his body slap wildly against her toe.

Also feeling the tiny impact the giantess stopped. Looking down she groaned audibly. She roughly drug her foot backwards. The motion rolled Matt under the sole, instantly liquefying the rest of this tiny body.

Matt was left a smear on tile, wiped away by the foot of a giantess.
135222223.title: Mrs. Graham's foot.

Matt slowly regained consciousness. He found himself naked inside a large cloth enclosure which he accurately surmised must be his shirt. He trembled a little as he realized the formula had actually worked. Standing up, Matt pushed against the fabric. It seemed to be awful thick. Just how small had he become?

Matt began taking steps across the fabric as he tried to find a way out. What he didn't realize at this point was that instead of reducing him to a few feet in height, as was his original plan, the formula had shrunk him to a mere half-inch in height. Now the size of a bug the miniature teen was having difficulty finding a way out of his own clothes.

When he finally did manage to lift up the edge of his sleeve and peer out into the basement, Matt got the shock of his life. First came the realization that he had been reduced to little more than a tiny naked speck on the basement floor. More importantly, his plan to quickly drink the antidote and change back was now impossible.

Matt had not done any calculations on what would happen to a person if they waited to take the antidote, he didn't even know for sure if the antidote worked. He just knew he didn't want to be stuck this way forever. His thoughts were interrupted as....

Partly out of fear, and partly out of awe Matt does not move. Just as his sister's big toe is about to come into contact with Matt, she stops. "Guess he is not here," Kellie says to herself.

In the split second it took for her to turn around, Matt quickly climbed onto one of his sister's toes. They are bigger than him and he struggled to hold. Each giant step threatened to send Matt flying. Lucky, Matt was able to hold on all the way up the stairs. At the top, Kellie heads to...
141.title: Giantess Sister

1412.content:
Matt was thankful that Kellie stopped at the top of the stairs. He didn't know what nerve he had to jump on her foot, but he had lost it. He knew he had to get off immediately.

"Mom! I'm going to Samantha's!" Kellie yelled loudly nearly deafening Matt.

Before he could recover Kellie was moving again. This time only a few steps. "Shit!" Matt screamed as her foot rose into the air. It dipped forward as she lowered it into her well worn TOMS shoe. Matt slid between her toes and her foot lowered into place.

In an instant he was trapped in Kellie's shoe. With no reason to move gently Kellie began to walk. Samantha's was only a few blocks away after all. Matt struggled to not slip under the meaty ball of her foot with every booming step.

It took Kellie ten minutes to make it to Samantha's. it was an eternity for Matt. He was sore, tired, and the smell of Kellie's foot was sickening.

Matt prayed she would take off her shoes at Samantha's. She didn't. Instead she flopped back on Samantha's bed. Her feet resting on their heels. Matt laid between her toes, almost relaxed until Samantha put on music.

Kellie shot up from the bed. As she danced around Matt was tossed violently under her toes. He was held in place under the pudgy, sweaty digits.

It all became too much to handle. As Kellie jumped up and down Matt fell unconscious.

Making his way to the heel cup Matt looked out and recognized he was still in Samantha's room. He didn't realize how quiet it was until he heard footfalls approaching.

The door swung open and the two giantesses returned. Matt saw Samantha towering above the shoe. She devoured a handful of chips before falling out of sight. Her bed squeaked in protest.

A moment later Kellie appeared above the shoe. "Shit." Matt said as her unpainted toes slammed down on the heel of the shoe crushing the fabric.

Matt cowered away as her toes slowly wiggled forward as she talked. "I should probably get home." She said, her foot shooting forward.

Matt was overwhelmed as his sister's meaty sole inched over him. He had been knocked under her arch before her heel popped in place.

Her weight presses down, but not enough. Each step she took pressed his face into her flesh. Kellie took her time casually strolling home.

By time she walked through the front door Matt was drenched in sweat. Mostly Kellie's. She kicked the shoes off at the door, sending Matt tumbling out.

He was left on the cold ground as she moved away. He couldn't believe he survived that trip. He was just thankful to be home. Where he could hopefully get to the antidote.
