His victory was short lived as the bed groaned as Shawn sat down. He reached for his socks unaware of his trapped little brother.

"Shawn! Stop! I'm in here!" Matt screamed frantically.

As Shawn's giant fingers opened the sock Matt was greeted by the sight of his brother's monstrous toes. The thick masculine digits scrunched together as the sock was pulled on.

Matt screamed constantly as he crawled as quickly as he could. Using the threads as ropes he some how avoided a head on collision with Shawn's big toe.

With the sock pull into place Matt was stuck in the gap between Shawn's big toe, and the next. He held tightly to the threads as Shawn's foot plopped onto the floor.

"Shawn! Help!" Matt screamed surrounded by his brother's toes.

Shawn stood and began to walk. His steps nearly tossing Matt underneath his toes. Adrenaline helped the tiny teen hold on in relative safety.

The temperature was already rising, the air thick. It was made many times worse as Shawn pulled on his shoes.

"Bye Mom, be home later." He yelled as she walked out the front door.

With his shrunken brother in tow he headed....
1412123.title: Brother

choices: The formula splashed onto both Kellie and Josh
142.content:
"MATT? YOU DOWN HERE?" a booming, feminine voice boomed across the laboratory. Matt crouched down; the voice was nearly deafening. "Oh man! That's Kellie!" Matt cried. Footstep thundered as Kellie and her boyfriend, Josh, walked down the basement step. Josh was two months from his 15th birthday, a few months younger than Kellie. Both Kellie and Josh were freshmen at the same high school as Matt, who was a senior. Even though Josh was not even 15, he was a large, blocky, athletic teenager, a much bigger than the 17 year-old Matt (even when Matt was normal size). Josh was nearly six feet tall, stocky (around 230 pounds) with broad shoulders and barrel chest. Josh certainly wasn't know for having 'six-pack' abs. He was thick around his mid-section, having the build of a defensive lineman. Josh actually was a very good athlete, possessing a lot of strength and surprising speed, leading him to excelling in football and on the basketball court. He had thick, shoulder length blond hair; soft blue eyes; a prominent, rounded jaw; a small, slightly upturned nose; and a cute, boyish smile that melted many hearts. He had a few blond hairs growing from his chin and soft blond fuzz along his jawline, which was probably the extent of his facial hair. Josh had a smooth complexion with freckled cheeks and marked by a few small pimples on his broad forehead, which were mostly concealed under his long bangs.

"That's weird. His bag's upstairs, the lights on down here. What the--? His CLOTHES are piled on the floor! What is he up to?" Kellie wondered aloud, her hands on her hips, looking around the lab. Josh looked around the lab and wrinkled his nose. His facial expression said it all: 'God, what a loser!' Josh took a few steps and snorted, "Maybe his home planet beamed him back aboard the mothership!"
"Oh, and what are you saying? He's my BROTHER! If he's an alien, what am I?" Kellie turned, slapping his solid torso.
"They probably want to leave YOU here! Cuz you're so MEAN!" Josh laughed. Kellie tried to slap him, but Josh grabbed her arms. The two play wrestled for a few seconds, with Kellie pulling away. She folded her arms and pretended to pout.
"Hey, baby. You're the cutest little alien I ever met", Josh said in a sing song voice, wrapping his arms around Kellie from behind in a bear hug. Kellie pulled away.
Meanwhile, Matt was on the floor, a mere 1/2 an inch tall, trying to avoid being stepped on, but about sick of watching the interplay between his sister and her boyfriend. Matt didn't like Josh and Josh didn't like Matt. Matt felt protective of his little sister, but knew that even at his normal size, he was physically no match for Josh. Josh was also an all A student and was likely to be voted into the Honor Society, of which Matt was president, whicn really annoyed Matt. It also bugged Matt that Josh once bragged that he scored a 176 on an IQ test. What a loser. Bragging about an stupid IQ score. He HAS to be lying. At least, that what Matt told himself--Matt scored a 154 on the IQ test!

BOOM! the heel of Josh's colossal sneaker thundered down an inch from Matt. This woke Matt up in time to realize he better get away from these two giants! Josh had fairly big feet anyway--he wore a size 13--but at Matt's tiny size, Josh's sneaker was almost as large as their school building! Josh's sneaker was a well-worn, white with green trim, Nike 'elite' high top from last year's basketball team at the middle school, the cuffs of his jeans was half-stuffed into the shoe, the velco strap undone and flopping around. Kellie pink, canvass tennis shoe slammed down right in front of Matt as he tried to escape Josh's path, 'AACK!" cried Matt.

Kellie and Josh wrestling around looked harmless enough, but for a tiny, 17 year old on the floor, it was frightening as hell! Matt was amazed he wasn't squashed by one of the high school freshmen, who, from Matt's perspective, towered hundreds of feet.

Josh stepped over to the table, his beat-up basketball shoes bumping heavily on the concrete floor, and picked up the jar with the shrinking antidote. He sniffed it and wrinkled his face: "This stuff smells like ass!" Kellie walked over, the footfall of her pink canvass sneakers thundering but not nearly as loud as Josh, and took a whiff :"Ewww! Gross!" Kellie then picked up the jar with the shrinking formula. Matt saw this and ran to the giants, yelling: "NOO!! BE CAREFUL WITH THAT STUFF. HEY! HEY!! DOWN HERE!! STOP!!" But it was useless; he was too tiny to be heard. "What IS this stuff?" Kellie asked, brow furrowed. "I dare you to drink it!" Josh laughed. "YOU drink it!" said Kellie, thrusting it toward him. "I don't want that!" said Josh, pushing it back with the back of his hand. When Josh slapped the jar back, some of the shrinking formula splashed out!
142.title: Kellie enters the basement with her friends

choices: Trisha, Ashley, and Josh take the tiny teens upstairs, where it's warmer.
Trisha places the tiny teens on the lab table.
1421.content:
The shrinking formula splashed onto Kellie's hand and on her thin t-shirt, soaking through and getting onto her skin. "Damn it, Josh!" she yelled. "Take it easy, I'll get something to clean it up." He turned and looked around for something to wipe up the goop. Suddenly, he heard Kellie shriek. When he turned, she was gone, but her clothes were in a pile on the floor! Josh swore and called out for Kellie. He crouched down an reach for her discarded t-shirt. suddenly, something moved! At first, Josh thought it was just a bug. He squinted...and gasped, "KELLIE??? HOLY SH--" "Oh, God Josh! Not so loud!" The tiny girl cried, covering her ears and crawling under the fabric of her t-shirt, which now stretch out for acres. Kellie was shrunk to around 1/2 inch tall! She hid under her t-shirt, covering her nakedness and protecting her from the cold chill in the basement. Finally, she looked around and saw her brother, running towards her in the pile of clothes. Josh saw Matt, "Oh...my...GOD! This can't be happening!"

"What's going on down there?!?" A young female voice called from the top of the stairs. it was Ashley and Trisha, Kellies friends. The girls were waiting all of this time in the kitchen as Kellie and Josh went to find Matt. Kellie wanted to tell Matt to let their parents know that she, Josh, and her friends were going to Taco Bell and would be back after dinner. The girls climbed down the steps and saw Josh, crouched over a pile of clothes. They saw another pile of clothes and could spot what looked like two bugs, one crawling in the t-shirt and one along the floor. "Josh?? What's going on? What are you doing and where's Kellie?" demanded Trisha.

Josh sputtered and pointed to the pile of clothes, "Kellie...she's sh-she's...ah...she's shrunk! She friggin' ant sized! And so's her nerdy brother!"
"What are you TALKING about??" said Ashley, closing her eyes and shaking her head. Josh carefully picked up the t-shirt and cradled it in his arms, his tiny girlfriend hiding inside, only her tiny head and arms peeking out.
Ashley and Trish were dumbfounded. "How, how did this HAPPEN??" cried Ashley.
Matt ran up to Ashley, Trish, and Josh, waving his arms: "HEY!! HELP ME!!! I'M DOWN HERE TOO!!!"
Ashley saw the tiny teen and knelt down. She laid her finger on the floor, allowing Matt to climb on her well-manicured, strawberry-colored fingernail. She slowly stood up, lifting her finger close to her face, with Trish and Josh moving in close to get a look at the tiny boy. He sat, covering his privates with his hands. He was shivering, from cold and fear both, no doubt! "Oh God, he's naked as a jaybird." she said, closing her eyes and turning her head away. "Really?" asked Trisha, squinting in for a closer look. "Hahaha...you can't even see anything, Ash!"
Meanwhile, Josh peered down at his 1/2 tall girlfriend, covered in the material of the massive t-shirt. For once, he didn't have a smart crack to make, he was in shock. "Don't worry Kellie, it'll be ok!"
"OK?? How can it be OK??? How did I SHRINK? How do I grow back?? And the dance is coming up this Friday! What am I going to do, Josh?" wailed Kellie. Josh looked down, "Uh, babe? I can't hear a thing you're saying."
"Can you hear THIS??" she said, flipping him the bird.
"Jeez! You act like no one's ever been shrunk before." he said, smiling. "At least you're still bigger than....than a flea--maybe."
"WILL YOU SHUT UP!!" cried Kellie.

Meanwhile, Trish found a cotton ball in the lab. It was used to make covering for Matt and Kellie. Soon, Matt and Kellie were clothed in their little cotton fluffs, standing in Trish's palm.

Josh laughed out loud, "Aww, you two are like little pixies. At least, Matt's ALWAYS looked like a pixie! Ha ha ha!"
"Yeah, REAL funny, Josh." growled Matt.
"Dont' let him get to you. He CAN be a BIG JERK," she said turning toward Josh, "It's best to ignore him."
Suddenly, a gust of wind picked both Matt and Kellie up, nearly blowing them off of Trish's palm. Josh had leaned in. pursed his lips, and blew a short, quick puff at the two tiny teens. "Josh, careful!" said Trisha, glaring at Josh.
"Yeah, Josh. Totally uncool!' said Ashley.
"What? Just having a little fun." replied Josh
"What do we do now?" asked Trisha.
"Let's ask Wayne Salinsky down there how he did this and if he can fix them." said Josh. Josh them glared down at Matt, "Seriously dude, if you shrank my girlfriend, trust me, I better not get a hold of you!" growled Josh.

14223.content:
"YOUR SO TEENY!" Kellie said. She was sitting on her haunches, her round ass stuck out in the air behind her. Matt and Josh winced as Kellie's loud voice rang thru their tiny bodies and her warm breath blew them back on the balls of their little feet. Matt and Josh endured Kellie's worrying for another minute when they began to find their surroundings returning to normal. Kellie's face was no longer a moon above them, instead appearing more like that of a giant. "OMIGOSH!" Kellie boomed, "YOUJUSTGREW." Matt paused, hoping that now that he had grown she could hear him properly. "It appears so," Matt gestured to the table. "Quick grab my tape measure!"

Kellie stood up, her imposing body towering above them. Matt was busy looking for something to cover his nudity. Josh was busy admiring the enormous size of his girlfriend. This new size had...possibilities.

Kellie returned, bouncing down into a crouch over Matt and Josh. She plunked the tape measure down for them. Josh followed Matt who stood beside it. "It looks like," Josh began to say before another quick spurt happened. Redoing his estimate, Josh said " Matt and I are about a foot and half tall." Kellie smiled, "That's great!"

Matt wasn't so positive. "Not really sis, are bodies were so small they became super saturated." He began to pace around. Josh tried to look away, because you know, naked dude. Kellie on the other hand was rapt. She had always liked her Bo, as she called him. She had secretly harbored a crush on him, one that was forbidden. And Josh, well, she liked Josh of course. Allot! And the thing was, they were cuter than ever small! Granted, she wanted them bigger, ideally big enough she could kiss and play with. But she liked being bigger. It made her feel powerful. It was clear that when she moved they watched, when she talked they listened.

Matt continued, "So, while our bodies rejected the formula, the bigger we get the less our systems reject it." Josh spoke up, "So we aren't going to grow back to full size?" Matt shook his head. "No and with each smaller gain, the next one takes longer to occur!"
