You couldn't tell what was happening through the sock. All you could tell it that you were heading towards the ground. All of a sudden you hit the floor with Immense pressure.

"ANDY PLEASE STOP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" You scream. But Andy Just keeps walking. With every step More And More bones in your body break. Andy checks the sock.

"STILL ALIVE HUH, WELL THEN THAT WILL SOON CHANGE"

Andy puts the sock on and starts walking again. On his final step he puts extra weight on your tiny body. You finally pop under the weight. After an hour Andy notices The tiny red stain on his sock.

'JOB DONE" He says joyfully
15122122112112112.title: That's the end for Matt

151221221121122.content:
Matt was possessed with fear. Was his best friend going to crush him barefoot? What was going on? His mind was going in frantic circles -- as was Matt. Just as Andy's size fourteen feet came down on top of the open space above Matt, all light was gone.

Matt started to choke. With the sole of Andy's foot as his ceiling, all Matt could smell was his footsweat. All of a sudden, Matt felt something enormous hit his body. It knocked him to the ground and covered him in some kind of liquid. He struggled to his own feet, trying to understand what it was. Next to him, something hit the bottom of Andy's shoe and exploded. It splashed. Andy was sweating. Those enormous things - big enough to drown Matt - were drops of sweat.

Matt began to scream, but just as his mouth opened, sweat clobbered him. He started to choke on the sweat. He couldn't believe that he was drinking the sweat off of his friend's feet. He felt so humiliated. So insignificant. Andy was all-powerful to rice-sized Matt.

Matt spent an hour in the shoe, with Andy's foot merely hovering over him. Every so oftem, sweat came down and knocked him down, but he spent most of the time screaming for Andy's mercy.

After a while, the ceiling began to rise away. Matt saw light; it immediatly warmed his wet skin.

Andy's face was above him. Smiling. Very widely.
151221221121122.title: Rain

1512212211211221.content:
Matt sighed audibly, and Andy glared down at him. Matt became silent immediately. He braced himself for the slight impact of Andy's sticky fingers against his body. The tips of his fingernails were wet and when they touched tiny Matt, he became stuck.

Andy moved his hand quicker than Matt would have liked, and he did it often to remind Matt just who was boss here. He deposited Matt into the front pocket of his own dark-green shirt.

Matt sighed to himself again, but he wasn't speaking to anything but the wall of the shirt. Dark-green walls rose up around him. Andy began to move and Matt braced himself for a day of school.

* * *

After that day a week ago when Andy had drenched Matt in his sweat, he had gotten audio equipment from Matt's lab and taken him home. That was Andy has laid down the law: "I'm not taking any crap from you. You're 1/8 of an inch and you're my pet; that's all there is to it. Get used to it."

The authorities had been notified when Matt was missing for twenty-four hours, of course, but Andy wasn't going to be dropping any hints to the police. In only seven days, Matt had quickly gotten used to the flow of things.

His world was Andy's bedroom and any other place that his master saw fit to put him. Twice, Andy had left Matt at home (in a secure place) but he preferred taking Matt to school with him. Where? Wherever Andy. Today he was in a shirt pocket, but he had spent a days in Andy's pants pockets, clinging to a hair on his head, in a hollow necklace around Andy's neck, and even in Andy's sneaker, pinched into place, with the company of two toes rising up on either side of him like hills.

Andy still lived his day-today routine normally, though pretending to look sad that his best friend Matt was "kidnapped." Andy knew that his pet depended on him for survival, and it was that fact that Andy relished. Matt ate from Andy's hand. Matt did whatever tasks Andy desired: math homework, and Andy enjoyed how much Matt struggled to perform calculations when the printed numbers were the same size as he. He would perform for Andy, doing small things to amuse what seemed to him like his new god. Andy would even torture Matt with his socks and sneakers, and that was the worst punishment (but certainly not the least used).

Matt was in a horrible state. He has been shrunk naked, but Andy had provided him with a small toga to wear. He smelled like Andy's sweat and his face was covered in food that he ate sloppily. He had not yet felt himself succumbed to the mental state of a pet, but he was worried. Everything seemed hopeless -- he was incredibly insignificant next to titanic Andy. He felt there was nothing he could do, but live day to day on Andy's wishes. Either that or dive off Andy's hand thousands of feet to the carpeted floor, but Andy would probably catch and punish him.

But now was not the time to think about would-be escape-attempts. 7:30 AM. High School. At 1/8 of an inch tall.
1512212211211221.title: Change of Scenery

15122122112112211.content:
"REMEMBER," Andy hissed, as he walked out to his car in hthe driveway. "YOU'RE DEAD TO THE WORLD. YOU MAKE ONE COMMENT AND YOU'LL BE SPENDING DAYS IN BOOT CAMP."

Matt winced, from both the magnitude of his best friend's voice and from the magnitude of his best friend's threat. Former best friend, anyway. Sometimes Matt wasn't exactly sure how Andy felt about him. Matt knew his own feelings: hate, revenge, anomosity. How could his own friend do this to him? Matt was nobody's pet. He kept repeating this to himself. Eventually, he'd get free.

Or would he?

Matt felt utterly powerless and helpless against Andy. Andy was thousands and thousands of times his own size. Even insects posed an extremely considerable threat. Look at him now: trapped in a *pocket*.

"Well," Matt ruminated, as the car went over a speed bump and sent him backwards into a fold of green cloth, "At least things can't get worse."

But, truly, how much did Matt know?
15122122112112211.title: On the Way To School

choices: Torture Matt with different parts of his sweaty body!
151221221121122111.content: Andy went back to his room, kicked off his shoes as usual. This time though, he was exhausted more than usual. Two last lessons were gym lessons, and he was completely drenched in sweat, from head to toe. His feet felt sore too... and then he got an idea.
151221221121122111.title: Continue...

choices: Matt gets to go home with Andy
1512212211212.content:
Andy knew, possibly better than most people, the genius of his best friend’s intellect. So, naturally, once he overcame the initial jolt of seeing his friend the size of a grain of rice and standing in the middle of his hand, Andy correctly assumed that Matt’s current condition stemmed from one of his many madcap experiments.

“SO, LITTLE BUDDY,” Andy said. “HAVE YOU GOT A SHRINK RAY HIDDEN AWAY DOWN HERE IN YOUR LAB?”

His friend’s voice actually hurt. Each word made a merciless assault on his eardrums.

The tiny teen feel onto his knees. “Andy!” Matt shouted. “Lower the volume, please.”

Andy fought hard to keep from laughing at Matt’s plight.

“I CAN’T LEAVE YOU HERE,” Andy said.

“I need the antidote!” Matt screamed. He cupped his hands to his mouth and shouted as loudly as he could, “The antidote!”

Andy shrugged. “SORRY. CAN’T HEAR YOU.”

He picked up an empty glass test tube. “THIS SHOULD WORK.”

Andy tilted his hand.

Matt felt the landscape change in an instant.

He started sliding toward the oval opening of the grain silo-sized test tube. “Andy! What are you doooing-ahhhh!”

Matt fell, screaming, into the tube, which Andy had rested at a steep angle. For his tiny friend, the slide down the length of the tube resembled something out of a thrill-crazy amusement park. He landed with a soft thud at the bottom of the glass prison.

Matt gazed up and saw a single huge eye peering into the tube. He felt a chill pass along his spine.

Andy grinned again as he squinted to see his tiny friend huddled at the bottom of the thin, glass tube. Andy tucked the test tube in his shirt pocket. He then gathered Matt’s microphone/speaker system and a few other supplies.

“THAT SHOULD JUST ABOUT DO IT.” Andy said.
1512212211212.title: Test Tube Boy

15122122112121.content:
Matt was screaming as loud as he could, but it merely bounced around him in the hollow test tube. Form his perspective, he was in a small room with a ceiling that stretched to the heavens. And he was in his best friend's pocket.

He felt sick to his stomach, from both the nauseau of the slide into the test tube and from the fear that he would be this small forever. Around him, he only saw an everpresent red wall. It was just cloth, Andy's shirt. But he felt imprisoned by it.

---

The trip took only a few minutes for Andy on his bike, but it felt like an hour for Matt. He was constantly jostled around like he was being shoved in a crowded hallway. But he wasn't in a crowded hallway, he was the only one. All of his friend's attention was on him and yet, Matt hadn't returned to normal size. It was both frightening and frustrating.

To add to that, Andy would probe around in the shirt pocket with his fingers every so often, to make sure Matt was still there. Andy must have thought it would be comfortable for Matt to know that he was safe, but Matt felt as if he was being treated like a pet. He didn't want to be cuddled with or scratched behind the ears. He wanted to be normal sized!
15122122112121.title: A Change of Landscape

151221221121211.content:
Andy walked into his home. He emptied the pockets of his pants onto a tile-topped bar in the kitchen. He deposited his wallet, several coins and a roll of breath mints on the counter before he reached into his shirt pocket.

The sea of red vanished for Matt as his friend’s gigantic hand pulled the test tube from his shirt pocket. Alert again, Matt scrambled to gain his footing. Before he succeeded, Andy caused the tube to slope and spilled his shrunken friend onto the counter tiles.

Matt, losing patience with the treatment from Andy, yelled at his friend. “Andy! Enough is enough!”

Andy turned his back and went to the refrigerator for a soda. Matt watched in silent awe as his colossal friend moved around the room. Left alone, he examined his immediate surroundings. He saw several metal coins. He ran toward a shiny dime. He stepped onto the surface of the dime and felt the cool metal beneath his bare feet.

He turned and saw the roll of breath mints. Each mint contained in the redwood-sized roll dwarfed Matt’s tiny body.

He heard the pop of the tab on a soda can and watched as Andy returned with a building-sized aluminum can in his hand.

Andy swallowed a flood of soda.

“I STILL CAN’T GET OVER HOW TEENY YOU ARE!” Andy said. He gulped down more soda.

Matt watched nervously as the soda flowed down his titanic friend’s throat. The enormous Adam’s apple bobbed under Andy’s tan skin.

“I MUST LOOK FREAKIN’ HUGE!” Andy said. “HOW DO I LOOK, LITTLE BUDDY?”

Before Matt could form an answer, a door slammed.

Andy frowned. “HIDE!” Andy ordered.
151221221121211.title: At Home with Andy

choices: Andy does something with his soda can.
1512212211212111.content:
A terribly loud sound suddenly resounded throughout the house, reverberating in Matt's whole body.

"Hide!" Andy screeched, unnecessarily loud to his shrunk best friend.

For a split-second, Matt froze. Andy hadn't exactly been the most hospitable person towards him, had he? He'd belittled and teased him. And this was Matt's best friend; he couldn't believe that Andy was frustrating him so much, on purpose or on accident. Maybe Andy's older brother would be more mature about the situation?

The thought lingered only a millisecond longer in Matt's head. He had to give Andy a chance, and if he got worse, then maybe he'd go to his brother as a last resort. Then Matt saw Andy's brother and decided that he'd go to him as a *last-last-last resort.* If Andy was godly, his brother was universal.

Andy's brother, Jake, was home from college and was twenty-one years old. Andy was close to his brother; they both excelled in sports. But he didn't want him to know about his discovery.

Matt dove randomly backwards when he saw the shadow pass over him. He slid along the counter before feeling his back bump up against a white ceramic skyscraper: a sugar bowl. Matt scurried behind it.

Andy made small talk with Jake (small talk, the irony didn't miss Matt) for a few minutes before his brother vanished out the door again.

"PHEW, THAT WAS CLOSE," Andy said, and then the that trademark grin was upon his face again. Matt was about to come out from behind the sugar bowl when Andy became impatient and grbbed him. His enormous fingers seemed as if they would crush Matt. He braced for the impact, but that was when Matt realized Andy had licked his finger. The saliva touched Matt and when Andy pulled his finger away, Matt found he was stuck. He was completely powerless aginst his (ex?) best friend.

Andy set him back down on the edge of the top of his soda can. To Matt, the pop tab looked like an enormous diving board and the hole was a lagoon.

"C'MON MATT," Andy urged. "LET'S PLAY A GAME. HOW OFTEN DOES THIS HAPPEN?"

Never again, Matt hoped. Never again.
1512212211212111.title: Big Brother

15122122112121111.content:
"WELL, IN YOU GO!"

What? Before Matt could even make sense of that statement, he saw a trailer-sized object come flying at him. The end of Andy's finger hit in the front and he was easily pushed back. Into what? Into the can, of course.

He hit with a splash. The force Matt had fallen had pushed him, carrying him down. His eyes burnt from the sugary soda, but he resisted the pain, forcing himself to swim, to swim up.

After what seemed like a breathless eternity, Matt emerged to the top of the ocean. But it wasn't an ocean at all: it was pop.

Matt bobbed in the liquid like a boat. There was a cool darkness all around him, except the top, where a halo of light hung. Through that, Matt realized with horror, he could see Andy's face.
15122122112121111.title: Soda is Bad for You...

choices: Matt melts and Andy drinks him
151221221121211111.content:
Andy moves the can towards his mouth, and Matt begins to panic.

Simultaneously, Matt's skin begins to melt as the sugarish soda starts to burn him. It seems that there is no way out of this.
151221221121211111.title: melting!!

1512212211212111111.content: You feel almost no pain at all as you melt in the soda, but, after Andy drinks you, and you touch his stomach acid, the contents in the potions mixed with stomach acid and your genes rebirthed you! Now you dont feel a thing as the juices touch you, they are too weak to digest you! Miracles!
1512212211212111111.title: Miracal!

choices: Matt tries to climb Andy´s throat
1512212211212111112.content:
Matt was smart enough to realize that there was no way out of this situation right now. Andy brought the can of soda to his lips, and the current - along with tiny Matt - began to float into his truly gigantic cavernous mouth. But that didn´t bother him that much. It was his best friends´ betrayal. He has known Andy for years, and he thought that he could trust him. But this behaviour of Andy, this betrayal of one of his few friends almost brought tears to his eyes.
The soda was washed over Andy´s enormous wall of teeth and floated directly toward his throat. Matt, being hurled around in the cold soda, knew that trying to swim back was impossible. He watched how he and the soda passed Andy´s uvula and floated down his throat. As a side effect of the formula, he was actually able to see inside the normally dark throat, but honestly, he didn´t really want to see the slimy red esophagus. So he closed his eyes during the fall. After a few seconds, he reached a hole that opened and squeezed him and the soda into Andy´s stomach. With a wet plop he landed in soda and - that´s what really frightened him - stomach acids. The stomach was really large, and there was no way to climb back, but obviously, there wouldn´t be much time for Matt to think about it, as he would die soon.
"No. I won´t die inside a traitor!" Matt shouted.
He was prepared. When he created the shrinking formula, he knew there could be some unpleasant situations, just like ending up inside someone´s stomach. He took out a syringe with a greenish serum in it. He had no time to test the serum, but did he have a choice now?
If I ever get out of here and back to normal, I should be nominated for a novel-prize. A groundbreaking discovery in modern medicin." he thought to himself. This serum was able to make the human skin resistent to the most threatening acids, but he had no idea whether there were any side effects. He injected the serum into his carotid. Seconds later, he began to scream in pain. His body began to burn, but not because of Andy´s stomach acids that were now surrounding Matt. He writhed in pain, but then the burning suddenly stopped. Did it work? There was only one way to find out. He jumped into a pool of acids, and surprisingly, it didn´t hurt him. Good, now he had to think of a way out of Andy´s body.
1512212211212111112.title: Swallowed, but this is not the end

choices: Matt, now as big as Andy's pinky, laying in the mess
Matt, now as big as Andy's pinky, running as fast as he can away from Andy
15122122112121111121.content:
Luckily, Matt now had a few moments to sit and think about what to do, since the acid no longer posed a threat. He was upset, and actually coming up with a plan was harder than he liked... Andy had swallowed him like he was nothing! ...and that was a problem... he virtually was nothing. Even if he got back out of Andy's stomach, what would he do? He was no more than a pathetic grain of rice and what would keep Andy from trying to get rid of him again... or worse?

He sighed to himself. Andy and him were so close. Did he really think so little of him this whole time? Or maybe... maybe it was just a power trip? Maybe he was feeling guilty now for what he did? Maybe if Matt got back to normal he'd apologize profusely and they could... no... Matt didn't think they'd ever be friends again after this. After all, as far as his ex-friend knew, he was committing murder as Matt sat in his tummy.

A couple minutes passed, then the little teen decided it was time to make his escape. He had two options- the throat or... well... the back door. And like hell he was going to give the bastard the satisfaction of that option! So he carefully began his ascent. His biggest problem was getting back through the sphincter at the top of the stomach, but once he got past that it was just a matter of climbing. One step up at a time. He got about halfway and took a small break. He felt insanely lucky that Andy hadn't gotten thirsty again yet, or started eating or something. Matt sighed again and started to begin the climb when something started happening- his body started burning again.

Meanwhile, Andy was sitting back in his chair and rubbing his stomach. The idea that Matt, his best friend from forever, was slowly digesting in there and becoming his food was intoxicating. He didn't know if he felt remorseful or guilty for his friend. He didn't know if he felt happy, evil, or anything at all. All he knew is that there was a person in his stomach. A teeny, tiny person who would be a part of him... giving him nutrients. It was food for a god. And that's all he felt. That he was godly to Matt and that Matt was lucky to be sustenance for his god. That was the only feeling he had.

That is... until something itched in his throat. He coughed a little but the itch turned into something worse- before Andy knew what was going on he was choking and doubled over. His airflow was blocked and he was trying desperately to spit it out. "It." He knew exactly what "It" was! Somehow Matt was doing this!

Andy couldn't get the blockage- or Matt?- out by coughing (given that he couldn't cough anymore) so he quickly threw himself to the floor and forced himself to throw up, and all at once the soda and the little human snack spilled onto the ground. The 'godly' boy collapsed onto his side, coughing, gasping, and trying to fight back tears. When he regained his composure he looked to see...
15122122112121111121.title: Matt tries to climb Andy´s throat

151221221121211111211.content:
"SO!"

Matt was roused a little from that familiar 'So.' Andy liked to use it. It was always a little bit of an annoyance... trying to get Andy to pay attention to him, or the assignment they were working on together, or the game they were playing... Andy would always proclaim 'So!' with a mischievous smile on his face and change the topic entirely. But it became more than an annoyance in the basement when tiny Matt was sitting in his godly hand; "So! How'd you get so small anyway, little buddy?" pounded through Matt's body like a sonic boom. It wasn't an annoyance, it was a change of fate. In his semi-conscious state he had realized that was where everything had changed. No longer was he Andy's friend, but something to be toyed with or gotten rid of as the giant pleased. That was the point of no return for their friendship.

It was quieter now, though. It didn't rip through his body like before. It was still booming, but it was much more bearable now. That's when Matt remembered what had happened in the giant's throat. As he was climbing, a side effect from the acid-proof serum he'd injected himself with had made him grow considerably. He was still quite small but he was big enough to clog Andy's throat up, but it was certainly an improvement from being a speck.

"SO!"

Oh hell, he remembered hearing it... he started to open his eyes as he was scooped up into Andy's big hand. Then he started struggling, "N-No! Andy! Let me go!"

Andy was amused to know he could hear him now, but he ignored him and continued. His cheeks were still red from the tears and picking up the little guy from the mess wasn't something that pleased him, but he forced a smirk anyway, "You just had to come back out, huh? I'm going to assume that means that you don't want to leave my side!"

He stood up and carried Matt to the sink. He stuffed a rag into the drain to make sure Matt wouldn't go anywhere, then filled it up a little and put Matt in it so he could get clean. He didn't care if Matt really wanted to or not at this point.

"So!" There it was again... "Since you want to be with me so badly, I'll go ahead and give you the chance to apologize for choking me and pledge yourself to be my pet."

Matt shivered in the water. Not because it was cold, but, well, because of the fear he was starting to have of Andy. He weighed the options very quickly- he couldn't leave Andy waiting for him for too long and he knew it. He could submit and hope that Andy would be kind, or maybe that he'd be able to escape... or he could refuse and see what punishment Andy might give to him...
151221221121211111211.title: Out of his Belly, Into his Hand

choices: Matt dodges quickly and Andy misses
151221221121211111212.content:
Matt didn't hesitate a second. The moment he hit the ground he shot up and started to run. He was in pain from the landing, but it didn't matter- he realized that if Andy had gone power crazy he was only going to be pissed that his tiny treat had gotten stuck in his throat and almost choked him to death. Once he was up and running though, four very important thoughts raced through his mind:

1) He was bigger now. One of the side effects of his acid-proof injection must have been extreme growth! Things still looked endless, but now he could make out furniture (and people) much easier than before. Which also meant they'd be able to see him much easier.

2) The floor was slippery because of the nasty expulsion of the soda from Andy's stomach... and he wasn't getting very far.

3) He was slippery because of the nasty expulsion of the soda from Andy's stomach and that was not only just plain gross but it might make it harder for anyone to catch him.

And 4?

He was still naked.

Andy was getting up now and wiping his mouth off on his sleeve. He could worry about cleaning and washing up later! Right now he had to catch Matt. He worried if he didn't the little pest would find someone else and tell them what was done to him. But more importantly, if someone else found Matt, they may just keep him for themselves! And Andy wasn't going to let anyone else have him without a fight. Maybe it was the need to protect his little friend and maybe it was the ideal that he was Matt's god and he should be taking care of him... whatever it was he didn't care. He quickly got up and attempted to grab the now much more visible little Matt.
151221221121211111212.title: Matt, now as big as Andy's pinky, running a...

151221221121211112.content:
Andy tilts the can back and tries to take a mighty gulp of soda, but quite suddenly finds that he drank a little more than he could chew. Coughing and gagging Andy fell to his knees and tried to cough up his 'friend', and with one mighty gag he expelled Matt, who was growing bigger by the second.

Matt, overjoyed at the experience of growing barely noticed where he had been, and realized with a start that his antidote to the formula had almost the exact same chemical composition as soda, and with a little human saliva thrown in the mixture had triggered growth in his tiny body.

Andy, seeing his friend who he had been trying to drink growing before his eyes smiled nervously and ran for his life. For a moment this behaviour bewildered Matt, but then he saw that he was still growing far beyond the size he had been before.

An evil smile crept over his lips, and he made to chase after his 'friend' and see how he liked being at the mercy of a giant. A brand new adventure was about to begin for Matt, but for now this 'little' romp into the realm of his world is over.
151221221121211112.title: Well that's one way to find an antidote

15122122112121112.content:
“Games!” Matt squeaked furiously. “Games! Listen to me, Andy! I’m sick of games.”

Unfortunately, his squeaky tirade went unheard. Andy still hadn’t bothered to hook up the device that could have helped amplify his tiny friend’s voice to a detectable volume.

Matt felt the cold aluminum beneath his bare feet. He could not believe his so-called best friend had stranded him atop a skyscraper-sized soda can.

Andy, looking very pleased with himself, started to speak when a phone rang in the living room.

“DARN! I’LL BE RIGHT BACK. DON’T YOU GO ANYWHERE!”

Matt watched Andy leave. “Where does he think I would go?” Matt said as he walked closer to the tab opening that showed the tiny teen a lake of dark cola.

He felt so frustrated at his helplessness. Andy now controlled everything about the situation.

“I’ll just have to make Andy understand that...” Matt’s comment ended abruptly as the back door opened again.

“HEY, ANDY! I FORGOT...” Jake yelled as he entered the kitchen.

Not seeing his brother, Jake walked to the refrigerator and swung open the door.

From atop the can, tiny Matt observed the fearsome titan. Andy and his older brother had a definite family resemblance, but Jake surpassed Andy in almost every respect. He stood taller, weighed more, mostly from pure muscle, and even sported a respectable amount of facial hair in the form of a goatee, something that never seemed in the cards for Andy.

Matt held his breath and remained frozen in place, hoping only that the terrifying giant would depart without incident.

He heard Jake curse. “OUT OF FREAKIN' SODA!”

The giant slammed the door closed on the refrigerator. The process set off vibrations that tiny Matt felt beneath his feet.

Then, he saw Jake glance toward the counter.

Jake saw the last can of soda in the household. He chuckled to himself. “FIRST COME, FIRST SERVED,” Jake said. “ANDY KNOWS THE RULES.”

The giant stretched out a huge muscular arm as his hand reached for the can.
15122122112121112.title: Thirsty Giant

151221221121211121.content:
As Jake grabed the soda can Matt scurried around to hide under the ring pull. It was bad enough that his friend Andy knew he was so tiny, he didn't want anyone else to see him.
Jake carried the can from the room and headed upstairs. Once in his room he shut his door and locked it. He had had the lock fitted last year after he got tired of the rest of the family barging in on him.
He set the soda on his desk and then opened his draw with his secret stash of snacks. Flicking on the tv he reached across and grabbed the soda.

Matt didn't know what to do. At his tiny size he couldn't risk trying to jump down from the can but if he stayed where he was he was going to be in all sorts of trouble.
He watched in morbid fascination as Jake reached towards the can. As the behemoth tilted it towards his mouth Matt felt himself start to slide towards the opening.
He had a hold on the ring pull but his feet and legs had slid into the opening.
Prickly brown hairs pushed into him as the moustache part of Jake's goatee covered him. Ice cold soda started washing over his legs, the force of it threatening to make him loose his grip and be washed into Jake's cavernous mouth.
151221221121211121.title: In Jake's room

choices: Jake swallows, then opens the door
1512212211212111211.content:
"Andy!" Matt shouted as his grip weakened. "Somebody! He-elllp!"

A seemingly enormous amount of soda swirled into Jake's mouth, entered the back of his throat and plunged down a short distance into his stomach.

Matt, clinging desperately to the ring pull, felt his grip easing as his fingers and arms grew tired. "I can't hold on!" Matt cried, realizing the all-but-sure destination if he failed to maintain his grasp.

The tiny teen prayed Jake would quickly drain the can of its liquid contents, but he would not be so fortunate.

A slight shake of the can in Jake's hand dislodged Matt's tiny, white-knuckled fingers from the ring pull. He felt himself splash into the stream of cold soda.

The flow washed over Jake's enormous wall of teeth as Matt continued to shriek for help.

The commotion from the rushing stream and his own shrieks prevented Matt from hearing the pounding at Jake's locked door.

"Jake, let me in!" Andy demanded. A few minutes earlier Jake's younger brother had returned and found his friend — and the soda can — missing. "Jake, you've got to let me in!"
1512212211212111211.title: Into Jake's Mouth

15122122112121112111.content: Jake swallows and Matt falls down his throat and ends up in his huge stomach. He cant hear much of the outside world from here, except it seems Jake is moving around. Soon Matt has more things to worry about as the stomach acid is making him nauseous. What can get him out of this problem?
15122122112121112111.title: eaten

151221221121211121111.content:
Outside, Jake opens the door, Andy comes falling down after trying to barge in. Andy looks around the room, and to find the same soda can, he grabs the can only to find nothing, he throws it angrily at the Trash can, trying to keep his temper down, Andy leaves the room.

Meanwhile inside Jake's beer belly, You are tossed around, as every step Jake took shakes the contents of the stomach. You try to get a grip on the slimy stomach walls, but it was to prevail, the coating on the stomach doesn't give you enough traction to grip. Soon the liquids started to bubble, then fizz. You try to see, at the bottom of the stomach full of soda was stomach acids pouring in. You start to Panic, but there was nothing to do, you try to grip the stomach wall again, it worked a bit, but Jake just pats his belly even more, knocking you straight into the acids. You felt your clothes melt away as the acids start to work on your body. Soon the acids reaches to your upper body, you slowly sink into the acids below never to be seen again.

Meanwhile Jake hears a small gurgle from his beer belly gut, he rubs his belly and does off, while his stomach works on its newest tiny meal.
151221221121211121111.title: Matt is digested

choices: Matt scrambles to avoid giant Jake
1512212211212111212.content:
The cold soda began to numb tiny Matt's hands and arms as he fought desperately to keep his grip on the tab ring and prevent himself from going with the flow down the cavernous throat of his best friend's older brother.

Matt felt his fingers begin to slip. "No! Not like this!" Matt screamed.

He struggled with fading energy to maintain his hold when, over the rushing roar of the dark river of soda, he heard a loud ringing.

•••••

Jake sat down his can of soda on a night stand next to his bed and answered his ringing cell phone.

In the process, he didn't notice the speck-like figure plummet off the can and drop onto his vast bedcovers.
1512212211212111212.title: Saved by the Bell

151221221121211122.content:
"WELL, LITTLE BUD..." Andy's voice trailed off as he returned to the kitchen and saw his big brother lifting the soda can to his gaping mouth.

The same soda can that Andy had left his speck-sized friend Matt stranded on before leaving the kitchen to take a phone call.

"WHAT ARE YOU DOING?" Andy shouted, rushing forward and slapping the soda can from his brother's hand.

Jake, in turn, stared at his berserk brother. "CHILL OUT, DUDE!" Jake shouted. "WHAT DID YOU GO AND DO THAT FOR?"

By now, Andy had dropped to his hands and knees to scour the puddle of soda on the floor.

"DID YOU DRINK ANY SODA?" Andy demanded.

"WHAT?" Jake asked. "HAVE YOU FLIPPED OUT?" He gave his brother an intense frown.
151221221121211122.title: Where's Matt?

choices: Matt falls onto the car's floor mat
1512212211212111221.content:
Tiny Matt dangled precariously, his hands wrapped tightly around a single brown strand.

Everything happened so fast, events remained a blur. He remembered everything in slow motion: Andy's gigantic brother lifting the soda can, tilting it back toward his open mouth.

And then, the dreadful sensation of falling through open space toward the cavernous opening.

Matt recalled Andy's angry, loud words.

"I'm here!" Matt screamed, although, at first, he didn't know exactly where here was.

•••••

"YOU'RE ACTING TOO WEIRD," Jake said angrily to his younger brother. "I AM OUT OF HERE."

Andy continued to search for his shrunken pal.

As Jake turned to leave, tiny Matt felt his body whipped about and he tried to hang on for dear life. His hands, which were sweating, gripped desperately at the strand...

...a strand of Jake's facial hair!

"Crap! I've fallen in Jake's goatee!" Matt realized.

He tried to retain his precarious hold. He saw Andy's face floating in space across a wide gulf.

"Andy! Help! I'm here!" Matt screamed, but he dared not relax his grip to wave.

Giant Jake left the kitchen and walked out of the house toward his car, oblivious to the tiny stowaway clutching at a hair on his face.
1512212211212111221.title: On Jake

choices: Matt recovers and crawls into a pocket
Jake sees something in his lap
15122122112121112211.content:
Jake walked to his car, all the time not knowing that he had picked up a tiny stowaway.

He settled behind the steering wheel and crammed the keys into the ignition.

He sped off, intending to meet some friends.

•••••

Tiny Matt felt his grip weakening. He struggled to keep his hold on a strand of the hair that comprised Jake's goatee.

He knew he had gotten himself into a perilous dilemma. Not only was he shrunk to the size of a speck of lint, he had now managed to lose contact with his best friend, the only person who knew what had happened to him.

As for Jake, the titanic 21-year-old stud had no idea that his younger brother's flea-sized best friend had taken up temporary residence in his goatee.

••••••

Jake lifted a hand and tuned his radio. With loud music blaring, tiny Matt felt even more hopeless. No amount of screaming would ever get the huge guy to hear him.

Jake drummed his fingers on the steering wheel. Then, he felt a faint itch. He lifted his hand to scratch his goatee.

••••••

Matt saw the column-sized fingers heading right toward him. He screamed and, rather than get squished beneath an enormous fingertip, he let go of Jake's hair.

He fell a long way, but landed with a bounce.

He managed to lift his head slightly. A vast expanse of denim stretched out in all directions.

"I've fallen in his lap!" Matt cried before he lost consciousness.
15122122112121112211.title: In the Giant's Lap

choices: Return the twerp to his rightful owner
Have some fun with the hapless teen
151221221121211122112.content: In his peripheral vision, Jake caught sight of something rolling around in his lap, and his vigilant brown eyes darted down to catch the bug who dared to invade his privacy. Instead, he saw something else - Something that looked an awful lot like his little brother's science wiz friend, and judging by his dishevelled appearance, the little guy wasn't thrilled about being discovered. Jake remembered Andy's odd behaviour earlier. It wasn't hard to fill in the blanks, especially for some one in whose blood mischief and deviousness runs, and hundreds of feet above Matt, Jake's lips curled into a menacing smirk. The giant's chiselled biceps danced under the glaring sun as he reached down, keeping an eye on the road, and pinched the scrambling teenager between two rough fingertips. Matt's stomach dropped as he felt himself soaring through the air, the sight of Jake's placard-sized belt buckle changing to Jake's tight black singlet shirt, to the V-neck opening that exposed a few dark chest hairs, to the sly, grinning face of that reminded him of an older, more manly and powerful Andy in a way that sent shivers down his spine. "HAVING FUN DOWN THERE, WERE YOU, TWERP?" Jake calmly taunted the helpless little teenager. Being at the top of the food chain was nothing new to this body-building hunk - He'd reduced his share of wimps to simpering little puppy dogs at his feet throughout high-school, taking full advantage of his superior physique and loving it - But this took the cake. He had to hand it to his little bro', who had no doubt accidentally lost track of the toy-sized teen; The little mischief maker was learning fast. Jake turned the car around, heading back home. There was only one thing to do...
151221221121211122112.title: Jake spies with his big brown eyes

1512212211212111221122.content: Ignoring the little maggot's shrill squeaks and inaudible pleas, Jake reached down, kicking off his right flip-flop, and placed the twerp on the stinking bed of foam before sliding his toes back around the rubber band. If that little wimp had eluded Jake's brother, he was going to have to be taken down a peg, just so he wasn't stupid enough to try the same thing on Jake..... Matt saw the gargantuan sole coming down on him. All around him, the fumes that had become embedded in the fabric of Jake's flip-flop rose around him, practically burning his nostrils with the disgusting smell. The bottoms of Jake's feet were shades darker than the rest of his tan skin, smeared with dirt from Jake's barefoot romps around the house and front yard. The think skin closed on Matt, pressing him into the revolting, over-worn flip-flop. Matt squirmed under the stinky bare foot, uttering soundless words of misery and sorrow. Every time Jake hit the pedal, Matt's face was squashed into the putrid skin of the powerful college boy's sole..... Andy's older brother laughed a pompass, squeaky laugh as he pressed the squeaming little bug flatter and flatter under his all-powerful foot. Jake always knew he was something like a god, but having his own little pitiful geek half-crushed under his foot gave him an immeasurable rush of power. He could feel minute little tufts of breath knocking into the padding beneath his foot, and knew that Matt must be choking on his rank foot odour down there. ''Don't pass out yet, little geek. You got a big night ahead'a you.."
1512212211212111221122.title: A ride home, under Jake's goliath foot

choices: Rub and lick my feet clean
I can eat you alive or you can give me a blow job
15122122112121112211221.content:
The day had gone on well into the night. The clock showed 11P.M., the usual time for Jake to have some fun. Jake had kept his flipflops on all day forcing Matt to endure his manly foot odor. Jake was thoroughly enjoying the torture he was putting the puny bug through.

Jake sat down on his desk chair. He turned towards the TV and turned it on. Then, after a few minutes, crossed his right over his left. He took the flipflop and slowly slid it off of his big foot.

Matt was pressed down into the flipflop unable to move. He had passed out from the torture of Jake's foot. When Jake started to take the flipflop off Matt woke up and realized what was happening.

" Please let me go, please!" Matt pleaded.

" Quit talking," Jake said.

Jake pulled off his flipflop and held it up to his nose. He took a deep breath.

" Oh shit, my feet stink," he said smiling at Matt.

Matt was firmly stuck to the flipflop. Jake reached down and pealed his body off the foam. His body was covered and reeked of Jake's foot sweat. Jake held him up to his face smiling.

" You have three choices, you can..."
15122122112121112211221.title: In Jake's room..

choices: "go jogging with you in my sneaker."
151221221121211122112211.content:
"Start massaging, little bug!" Jake laughed and felt as a god. And in a way, he was, at least to Matt. "If you don't, I'll eat you alive. Or maybe crush you. Either way, you want to return to your size, right?"

Matt had no choice. He didn't want to die inside Jake's stomach, or under his stinky foot. He started rubbing Jake's right foot, though he could barely cover his heel. That foot was almost a hundred times Matt's size. He would hardly be able to rub it completely. However, Jake also thought of that and put his feet in horizontal position, with the sole facing up. Feeling really small, Matt climbed the foot and rubbed it, even though it was smelly and sweaty.

"Hey, you're doing a great job, but I also want you to lick them." Jake said and laughed.

Matt, disgusted, started to lick the foot. After about ten minutes (which felt like hours to Matt), he had covered Jake's whole right foot. Now, he proceeded to the left one. After a while, it didn't seem that disgusting, yet it wasn't pleasant. After finishing, Matt just felt his mouth dirty and stinky. He wanted a toothbrush as fast as possible. But he wouldn't get one. He was also slightly covered in Jake's foot sweat.

"Well, now that you're done, I see that you like my feet. You even like that stinky aroma, eh? Well, how about sleeping a whole night inside my sneaker? I'm sure you'll love it." Jake took Matt with his fingers. Matt fought but lost to the colossal fingers that put him inside Jake's sneaker. There was no escape, Matt tried hard even long after Jake turned off the lights and went to bed. Thus, Matt decided to sleep on that wet and smelly surface.

In the morning, Jake's alarm clock rang and he woke up. He turned on the lights and lifted his sneaker, making Matt roll to the toe area. He said, "stay there, I'm going to..."
151221221121211122112211.title: Rub and lick my feet clean

151221221121211122112212.content:
"I can eat you alive, or you can give me a blow job!"

Hmm, assured death vs short unpleasantness...
151221221121211122112212.title: I can eat you alive or you can give me a blow job

15122122112121112212.content:
Matt held on for as long as he could, but soon he was getting dizzy and weak. In fact, he barely held on long enough for Jake to reach the car. Andy's older brother pulled himself into the car and was about to start the ignition when Matt let go.

He tumbled through the air, first striking the knee of Jake's jeans. Matt clung for stray strings, frays, anything - but there was none. He fell all the way down, below the seat.

There was a throbbing pain in his head, but Matt was otherwise unharmed. He pulled himself up to find himself on a fuzzy material, which he quickly discerned to be the car matt. Then, with a realization, Matt remembered where he was.

Jake looked like a god to Matt. His large muscles intensified the strength indicated by his size. In fact, he looked like a king on a throne, and Matt was at his feet.

Literally. Turning around, he saw two huge structures: Jake's black flip-flips. The hell of them were an inch thick, already eight times as tall as Matt. Jake's feet looked huge enough to be buildings.

They were stationary for only a moment, and then Jake began to drive.
15122122112121112212.title: The Throne

choices: Andy’s just joking and has another trick up his sleeve.
1512212211212112.content:
You quickly find a wrapper of some sort of candy bar to hide behind.

Suddenly the back kitchen door swung open and you can feel the wind caused by the door. Through the wrinkles of the aluminum gum wrapper, you can see that Andy’s brother Joe just came in.

Dressed in his usual soccer attire, you find him struggling to make it in the door. With the temperature in the triple digits, he came in all hot and sweaty. By the looks of it, it seems as if he was playing hard, and got covered in dirt from head to toe. This is kind of surprising for a Jr. High soccer team; you thought that practice could not be THAT intense.


Andy interrupted Joe’s groaning and grunting as he entered the house.


“By the looks of it, it seems as if you had a hard day.”

“Yea, coach made the whole team work on endurance today for two. I had no problems with it, but the others made me trip and fall so I was slower. I HATE MY TEAM! But that’s not the worst of it. We had to work on our abs afterwards and boy, let me tell you. After the first 100 you get kind of tired…”


Slowly Joe made his way over to the counter where you sat, rubbing grumbling his stomach as he was talking.You knew that after exersise you got tired and hungry too. The rumbling was so disturbingly loud that it actually caused you to shiver a bit, and serve as a reminder as to how small you really are. Andy started to go into a silent panic and immediately got in-between the counter where you lied and Joe stopping his advance.

“Do you know if there’s ANY food left in the house?”

“We have a few snacks, but you look tired. Go upstairs and get cleaned up. I’ll make you something… special…”

“Thanks bro, I’ll be back right after my shower.”


Joe still unaware of your presence suddenly threw his soccer bag. Unfortunately it looks as if it is heading right for you, but thankfully it falls short and lands on the floor.
Andy watched Joe leave the room and go upstairs to the bathroom where Joe closed the door. Then through the sound of the wall above he could hear water starting to run.
Now Andy’s attention was back on you.


“Well, well, well! My little bro’s hungry, so the question is, what do we do with YOU?”
1512212211212112.title: Andy's Younger Brother is Home From Practice

15122122112121121.content:
Suddenly your old ‘friend’ got one of the largest smirks you had ever seen.

“I’ve know what we have in this house and I know what I can serve him… Just wait, and if your good, I’ll let you have some.”

Andy turned around and started rummaging through some cabinets, and some drawers pulling out many things. None of these you could see as he placed them on the counter on the other side of the kitchen. It did not help either that he was standing in the way too, only helping to further obstruct your vision.

It dawned on you that your safety could very well be at risk and Andy could easily mix you into any kind of food. Joe would be none the wiser about your presence and his body needs extra calories from that huge workout. However, Andy really tried to make sure you stayed safe throughout the trip so far, and he protected you from Joe already so he can’t be that bad or evil. Right?

So this leaves you at the crossroads once again. Do you trust Andy, or do you try to run while Andy is distracted?
15122122112121121.title: A Cruel Fate - Not?

choices: Andy’s Serving Chips & Dip and Pop
151221221121211211.content:
Well, Andy has not done anything evil so you decide to stay.

Andy was still busy and furiously making something. Dashing in and out of the refrigerator, he placed many more things on the counter. You still could not see what it was so you decide to get a better look. Moving out from your tin like metal shelter, you decide to move a little closer to the edge of the counter to get a better look.

Traveling across the tiled plain you find out how small you really are. Staying inside the grooved surface of the grout you slowly move to the edge of the counter. Looking to the left and right of you were the tiles themselves which extended into the sky like small single story homes from your perspective. You constantly thought about a bug or a spider you would run into but fortunately you never did. Finally reaching the other side, you climb up onto the blue tile surface and sit there staring back towards Andy. Before you could get comfortable, Andy walked over and stood right next to the counter that you were sitting on.

You still couldn’t believe his size. You lived in several cities with large sky scrapers but Andy was still the largest building you had ever seen. His muscles were standing out even more, but it was hard to tell if it was because of your perspective and not the protein shakes he recently started.

Andy picked up the gum wrapper you were sitting under, but much to his surprise, you weren’t there! Andy slowly lifted up his shoe to see if he accidentlly killed you, but was a little relieved when he found nothing. Lowering that foot, Andy lifted the other and found nothing but a few grass clippings. Soon his attention returned to the counter. Franticlly searching, Andy kept looking and searching around the counter for any sign of you. Soon enought, Andy’s eyes finally detected your microscopic-like body contrasting the blue tile.

“THERE you are! Don’t scare me like that! I’ll be right back; I just need to get some cola out of the garage. Don’t go anywhere else!”

Andy stormed out of the room and into the garage leaving you alone on the counter. He was obviously in a hurry to make it back before his brother came back down from his hot shower. However these distractions were not why you moved yourself closer to the edge. You looked across the kitchen and by the looks of it…
151221221121211211.title: Final Prep…

choices: The Dinner Bell on the Oven
1512212211212112111.content:
Andy returns from the garage with a few Dr. Pepper’s caring one in each hand.

“Ah, these will go great with the pizza. Don’t worry, you will get your pizza Matt, I’ll make SURE of it.”

Andy’s stomach must have heard the word pizza. As if on cue, it suddenly let out a large rumble causing you to stare blankly at his abdomen. You were imagining what lay just beyond the tattered t-shirt, the very thought of if made you feel once again very small and for whatever reason extremely nervous. This grumble was a true indicator of an empty stomach, empty and ready for all new entrants and many different kinds of food.

“Seems as if, I’m a little hungry also…” said Andy, “Might as well get these Pizza’s cooking!”

And with that, Andy warmed up the oven and placed the frozen pizza on the pizza stone. Carefully placing the pizza onto the center rack of the rickety old oven, Andy closed the door, set the timer, and brought back his attention to you.

“How about we play a game Matt? If you can get out of this container, before my little bro comes down to eat, you win! Consider this a game of survival.”

Andy already had in his hand a small metal container with glass for shredded cheese. He lifted it up and shook it in front of your face highlighting that it was definitely that container. Matt, in total shock that his friend is now treating his life like some sort of game, backed up a few steps and looked at this massive and irregular shaped object. The cheese was surrounded by glass walls curving outwards making them impossible to climb from the inside. The roof was no better being covered with holes in a stamped press designed for a limited amount of cheese to come through. This would be an impossible task to do, so realizing your options; you decide to franticly run back to the safety of your metal shelter.

“Going somewhere?”

Suddenly out of the sky, you see Andy place the unscrewed lid somewhere next to you causing your whole world to shake. Losing your footing, you trip and fall on one of the imperfections in the tile. After, regaining your balance, suddenly there is another and much harder thud, but this time right in front of you. A beige colored fleshy hand abruptly appears but it represents more than a wall than a hand from your perspective. Without any sign that Andy would let you go past that hand, you turn around and run towards the edge of the counter. Then your worst nightmare came true. Andy started to slide his hand and push your microscopic body at an alarming rate towards the side of the counter. You rapidly got tunnel vision and all you could focus on was that ledge. You realized there was nothing you could do to resist Andy’s plot and allowed Andy to throw you off of the edge.

A few seconds into freefall, you opened up your eyes and looked up at the face of your former best friend. But as soon as you got a good glimpse gradually glass walls appeared and you landed on a powdery substance which cushioned your fall substantially but it did smell of a common cheese.

“Here’s the deal. Since I have no idea, how you were shrunk in the first place, I have no idea how I would even begin to help you with returning to a normal size. Hell, no one even knows you’re shrunk other than me! So while I was out and in the garage, I decided that you, Matt, are going to be too much to handle on a day to day basis. Sooooo… I decided to come up with a game that involves you walking away from this situation in one piece, or you will serve one of our bodies as extra calories! If you survive getting out of the dinner table alive among our hungry, cavernous, stomachs, I’ll try to keep you alive. But if you disappear and I cannot find you, I’ll think about you when I take my next shit. That’s all you really were as a friend to me anyways, a shitty one.”

Matt was absolutely confused. He helped Andy work on his science homework many of times, and you always offered to tutor, but what does Andy mean by shi- Oh. I see now. I’m in a pizza topping and if I cannot get out of here before they add me to their food, I’m done. Well that sucks and being turned into shit is even worse…I don’t even want to imagine that slime pit of a stomach. “Make the best with what you got I guess” I said to myself. I have to get moving and work quickly if this is to ever work!
Andy walked over to the small dinner table and set you and the container down in the center and between two plates and the bottles of Dr. Pepper, and you immediately got to work.

“Let the games… Begin!”

Scraping the cheese like sand, you tried to create a tall mountain of cheese to help propel you out of this hell hole. Working tirelessly you slave away at your only chance for survival and your way out, when you are interrupted by…
1512212211212112111.title: Let the Games Begin!

choices: Andy Willfully Adding Matt to his Food
Joe, Still Unaware of Matt's Presence
15122122112121121111.content:
Andy now satisfied that you knew your own fate, moved back to the oven to check on the pizza. The aroma from the pizza had already filled the room with its fragrance of bread, sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni. Andy now looking into the oven discovered a perfectly cooked pizza just begging to be eaten. The crust had risen to an adequate level and the cheese was a beautiful plain of oranges and yellows found on most restaurant style pizzas. Noticing its completion, along with the help of an audible cue from the timer, Andy pulled the delicious pizza out of the oven and set it on the stove.

Matt, still sweating from stress in the small glass container was gradually making progress and was closer to getting out, but it was becoming progressively harder to place more and more on the top of the edible mountain. Gravity was working against him. Matt could always climb down the man-made hill to get more material, but every time Matt climbed down and back up, he caused miniature landslides to occur, similar to those caused on a sand dune. However Matt did not care that he had to do extra work to get out of this place. All he wanted to do was to get away from the hungry jock’s stomachs and away from all the food with Joe on the way!

Andy wanted to let the pizza sit out and cool for a bit before he served it up. So he walked away from the oven and sat down in one of the chairs looking into the glass chamber where his shrunken friend laid. Smirking and smiling into the glass, he saw Matt slaving away trying to save his own life, but noticed how far he was from his goal. Andy saw this as being kind of cruel to put someone in a situation where they could do nothing to save themselves, but he found it to be the perfect way to dispose of a former friend. And finishing that thought, Andy lifted his head from the table to see Joe following the trail of delicious smell to the freshly cooked pizza to the kitchen.

“Mmmmm…” Said Joe, “Pepperoni is my favorite kind of pizza, and this has to be the best thing to settle this hunger. I’m starving, serve me some pizza bro.”

And with this, Joe sat down at the accidentally bumping the leg of the table. This sudden earthquake was not the thing Andy was expecting during his construction of his escape! Similar to the homes in California, his mountain slowly collapsed into nothing. His futile attempt at freedom was short lived as he watched his work disappear into a perfectly level plain. Seeing his whole work lost with one casual and non-deliberate bounce to the table, Matt lost all hope at escape and figured that someone would have to help him out. After dusting the cheese off of him, he turned his attention to the outside world and noticed that Joe was now sitting at the table waiting to eat a delicious pizza. However due to the quality of the glass, his vision is slightly blurred and foggy due to the years of abuse in the dishwasher and handling.

Andy took both plates over to the counter and loaded them up with individual slices of pizza. Then placing them on the table, Joe and Andy immediately got to work devouring the pizza, trying to quickly satisfy their hunger.

From Matt’s perspective he could see them eating the pizza, but he had no clear view of everything that was happening.

“Mmmmm… Deeeee - licious! Now this is what I call a pizza! But it does seem to be missing…. Something….”

Suddenly you see a hand wrap itself around the glass and you are lifted upwards into the sky. Then your whole world started to shift around you and you found yourself sliding. Working against gravity and from the current of cheese flowing beneath your feet, you do your damn best to make sure your still in the bottle, and not on the entree. Unfortunately Matt’s valiant efforts go unrewarded as your chamber is shifted vertically, causing him to slide out from his glass prison and fall in free-fall towards the pizza below.
Still clambering and screaming in plain slight as he fell, went unnoticed in the open air. Rather than focusing on the landing below, you decide to look up and see who’s including a little extra meat with their slice. You cannot believe your eyes when you see….
15122122112121121111.title: Ding!

choices: Joe’s in a Rush and Chews his Food...Furiously!
Joe Would Rather Enjoy his Food and Slowly Chews....
151221221121211211112.content:
Slipping through the tiny holes, you were finally free of the oppressive glass prison. However being added to a main course generally is a huge problem. As you looked down below, you saw the slice of steaming hot and fluffy pizza lying below to cushion your fall.

You along with the cheese that fell out with you soon landed on the pizza. The impact was hard enough to send you down a few feet in your perspective into the crust. Looking around you saw the surrounding terrain of a typical pizza. From the rolling hills of cheese, to the endless seas of tomato sauce all of which helped to create your new found horizon. Among the cushiony terrain surrounding the pizza slice, you also noticed many individual pieces of freshly cooked pepperoni extending into the sky like small apartments. But being on the pizza was not the worst thing in the world. Given enough time, you think it would be possible to struggle out of the mess you were in, but looking above you saw Joe, a hungry teen with an appetite for YOU!


Freshly out of the shower, Joe had yet to put on any clothes yet other than his Calvin Klein white boxer briefs outlined with red stitching. When he sat down, the ruby red label became level with your horizon, and enveloped your new view. Looking up towards the god like figure sitting in front of you, you find his soft looking blond hair which helped to complement the marble textured blue eyes. Water was still dripping out of his hair and onto his torso, running the course of his well-built muscular maze. Following the smallest of drops, you couldn’t help but notice the other features of the muscular body. His belly button helped to contrast the many hills and valleys of his six pack abs. Even when he was not flexing, those muscles were built up enough to stand out on their own quite well. He never really had to tan his body, as his sport gave him a tan that made many others quite jealous. The lean teen body was obviously ready for food as Matt continued stare at Joe’s torso when it made another yet another gurgling noise.


Joe being none the wiser of your presence picked up the pizza and placed it in front of his cavernous mouth. From your perspective, you saw the god like figure lick his lips anticipating the delicious slice, and saw many watery strands of saliva starting to form on his tongue. Before you even had a chance to scream, Joe parted his teeth and slowly brought the first part of the pizza into his salivating and expansive mouth. Slowly biting into the piece, Matt watched in horror as his teeth got to work on the chewing what must be acres of pizza. Seeing his deadly fate in sight, Matt tried his best to pull himself out of the pizza, but every push or pull into the melted cheese only made him sink deeper
into the crust. With no one other than Andy knowing he was there, his odds were pretty slim at escaping as he was situated in the middle of the slice. You tried to turn around to see if Andy was looking but a set of glasses were in the way. Feeling a sudden acceleration, Matt returned his attention to the first slice of pizza, still going through the trash compactor of Joe’s mouth. From Matt’s standpoint he couldn’t imagine what it was like inside of those lips, but it was a place Matt wanted to avoid in its entirety. Soon after, the chewing stopped and Joe’s office building sized tongue moved the food to be swallowed. A sickening gulp followed and Joe’s mouth was empty once more for new entrants.


Matt was absolutely horrified. As the giant’s mouth opened, Matt could see the uvula dancing back and forth wildly from the last swallow acting as a guardian of the slimy dark hole below. The ball at the back of the throat looked as if it could easily knock anything down and into the slimy and dark abyss in a simple swing, but Matt would soon find out. Joe, still not satisfied that he has had enough pizza, pushes more pizza into his awaiting mouth and slowly bites into the next part of the slice. The giant incisors came to a rest within a matter of feet to Matt’s perspective. If he was a little higher up from the cheese, he could have reached out and touched the solid white teeth! Much to Matt’s relief, he was not on that bite. Shortly after tearing through Matt’s entire horizon, the remaining pizza was pulled away from the mouth as Joe began the defining and destructive process again. Chewing over and over and finally swallowing, you came face to face with your fate. As Joe’s mouth slowly opened you could hear the stomach accepting the new arrival of pizza with yet another groan. You look into the mouth and find remnants of the last bites still plastered to the molars and saliva running everywhere. Welcomed with a blast of hot air from his breath reeking of pizza, you are slowly pushed forward towards the cavern of doom; where there is no way out you can possibly escape.


Joe was finally ready for the next bite. Slowly he brought the remnants of the piece along with you and started to push your new-found world into his vast mouth. No matter how much swimming through the cheese help your situation, you tried anything to get out. Looking out ahead of the piece, you could see the tongue dancing waiting for your arrival. As you looked up, you could see the bleached white incisors passing over you like massive icicles in a frozen cave. Now fully enveloped inside Joe’s mouth, you felt a cushioned thud as the pizza finally rested upon his tongue. Realizing that there was no way you could possibly escape, you turned around to view the outside world. Looking out towards the shining light beaming in from the small holes in Joe’s mouth you noticed it was closing quickly. This could only mean one thing. Matt braces for the worst as he knew that Joe was about ready to chew.
151221221121211211112.title: A Cruel and Hungry Fate

1512212211212112111121.content:
Finding yourself inside the mouth of a young teen was the last thing you wanted to do today. A lack of light from the outside world made it hard to see inside the fleshy walls, but you didn’t need sight to remind you where you’re at. Still trapped inside the piece, you found yourself inside a prison of teeth and hot human flesh. Before you knew it, Joe started to slide you and your piece towards the car compacter like teeth. Devoid of hesitation, Joe started chewing the piece into a pulp like any other piece of food. On the first bite, he nearly missed you by a matter of inches, but the second one you were not so lucky. With the help from saliva and the loosened material from the first bite, you were dislodged from your place among the cheese. As Joe was shifting the food, a quick flick from his tongue assisted you to land on top of unrecognizable chewed remains stuck between one of his molars. Unfortunately for you, Joe had no plans on slowing down his deadly chewing machine.

With an even faster bite, you were left with no time to react as the set of deadly teeth from above came crashing down on you. Pressing you hard between the molar above and the pizza remnants below caused you to break nearly every bone in your body causing you to temporarily lose consciousness. It was a good thing too, as Joe continued to chew without thinking.

Upon waking from the blow, you find yourself compacted into a pancake of pizza mostly dislodged from the tooth. Seeing the oceans of grease and seas of saliva lead you to look for the remains of the food. You thought they were already on their way to the stomach, but on a second glance the pulverized remains of the pizza were resting on the back side of his fleshy tongue. His slithering monstrous red tongue started to traverse the double set of sterling whites for any traces of food in Joe’s mouth. It swirled around the dark cavern and eventually the wet fleshy pad quickly found your pitiful life. Like a magnet, the saliva assisted to lift you from the tooth. Within seconds, the pizza and your bloody carcass were carelessly tossed towards the rest of the remains in the back of the slimly throat.

Landing in the pulp, Matt’s body left an impression which was similar to one found at a crime scene. Matt, barely being able to turn his head, looked out from the mushy mess and saw a horrifying sight. What was terrifying him as he was lying outside the mouth, was dancing above only a matter of feet from Matt’s head dripping hot, smelly saliva onto his entire body. But Matt’s realization had to be subsided as other worries came into mind as he saw the remaining light be cut off by the tongue. Lifting from the front first, the massive muscle twitched with joy as it jarringly tipped you and the rest of the pizza into a position to be easily swallowed. No matter the effort, with every bone in your body broken you had no way to even protest your situation. Accepting your final fate, you look upwards to see the fleshy walls of the throat close up on you and drag you downwards. An amplified and wet “Gulp” echoed throughout the expansive chamber, as you travel down towards the rugged and putrid stomach.
What felt like an eternity, you heard the same stomach noises you heard earlier but this time they were louder. A tremendous rumble and vibration from that growl echoed through your piece as you arrived at the point of no return, the rugged muscle of the stomach sphincter!

A short free fall caused you to drop into the stomach landing on the partially digested remains from the first bite. Inside of the dimly lit chasm the stench of stomach acid provided a deadly mixture of breathable but rancid and stale air. You saw the fleshly walls around you churning and dripping the slimy and potent stomach acid onto its new guests with ease. Matt couldn’t believe it. After all of the work down in his lab to finish a working shrinking potion, he never thought he would end up like this. He still couldn’t believe his eyes, or ears, or nose. He was actually inside of a healthy, fit, and athletic teenager whose body won’t make the distinction between him and any other piece of meat! Matt, encompassed by a loud noise from below caused him to pause his train of thought.
With more rumbling, he felt whatever it was in a waving motion as it passed by. It was gradually getting quitter until it made a turn for what you assumed to be Joe’s backdoor. What rattled Matt’s world was quite simply a gas bubble moving around in Joe’s large intestine which was only a sign of healthy digestion. Matt already knew there was no way out of this hell hole but he did not need to be reminded that he would most likely end up as hot air, or a skid mark on those Calvin Klein boxers. With a tingling sensation in Matt’s skin getting stronger and stronger, he knew that the putrid stomach acid was looking for him! But thankfully before Matt would go through his own digestion, Matt heard another gulp which was most likely a new slice of pizza was on its way down. Without being able to move, Matt was laying right below the trap door as the new slice slithered in from the fleshy tube above. Dropping right where Matt was laying, he was immediately buried, smothered, and crushed by the load which proved to be the final blow.

With every piece, Joe added on excessive amounts of cheese literally emptying the container by the last slice. Every slice continued the same pattern and traveled through the same dark hole. Eventually the teens plowed through the remains of the pizza leaving no crumb behind. Andy followed the last slice of pizza passing through his brother’s mouth. He knew that somewhere at some time, Matt had lost his battle staying alive and got a one way ticket to a full digestive tour. After Joe swallowed the last bit of pizza, he gave his lean teen stomach a good rub as he looked at Andy.


“Damn! I think they added a little bit more meat to these pizzas! I’d wish they would add more cheese too!”

Andy smirked at the irony of the joke; after all he was quite pleased with himself. Although neither Andy nor Joe would have any idea what Matt went through, a solitary digestion awaited. Even though Joe was unaware of Matt’s presence it didn’t matter. To Joe’s chiseled body, he was simply more meat and fuel for a high calorie demanding machine. The deed was done, and that was that.

Both Andy and Joe popped the tab open on their colas and clinked them together in midair.

“Cheers”, they both said before they both chased the eaten pizza (and friend) with a satisfying drink.

THE END!!!
1512212211212112111121.title: Hunger Beats Taste

choices: Andy should realize what he’s done to you soon. Stay put, and play it safe.
Water is Goooood. Drink all you can!
1512212211212112112.content:
Andy leaving the kitchen provided a great and unparalleled view of the room. When you looked across the kitchen you noticed many things that were already out. Although you were too far away to read any of the labels on the containers, you could tell that he had already pulled out the bag of chips along with the ingredients for the tomato salsa. A large steel knife lay on top of an even larger wooden cooking board, waiting to slice through the layers of the ripe, delicate, and delicious tomatoes.

Before you could inspect any further the door from the garage swung open. Andy walked back in carrying a cola in each hand and walked over towards you. As if on autopilot (and without thinking), Andy started to lower the cans of cola as if he was aiming for you! From his viewpoint, this was just an empty counter with nothing more than an empty wrapper. With a complete disregard for Matt’s safety, he dropped them on the counter not lightly, but with much force. Screaming to Andy not to crush you, you realized that he couldn’t hear you no matter how much you tried. Running as frantically to the side of the tile as you could, you didn’t make the safety of the grout A large dark shadow formed on the ground below you as the metal tin can came down to crush your very existence!

“ANDY YOU IDIOT!!! DON’T CRUSH ME!!! NOOOO!!!” You say, bracing for the worst as the can came crashing down. The shear force from when it hit the counter caused your whole world to vibrate furiously. You were immediately lifted off from the tiled counter, and hurled around in the air like a rag doll striking the can and tile several times. After the bouncing slowed, you find yourself alive but trapped under the concave structure of the can! Andy’s spared your live from a bloody end by a matter of millimeters but how is it even possible that he could forget that you were there?!

After you ears stopped ringing, you tried to get your bearings. Looking at the world around you, you can see very little. A few imperfections in the tile allowed some light trying to find its way in; barely enough to see the structure you laid under and the surrounding area, but not large enough for you to escape through. Matt can hear the sloshing of the carbonated drink above you smacking against the sides of the can. You lean back against one of the walls, but you are immediately hit with the temperature of the container. The can itself is very cold, not frozen, but just the temperature anyone would want on a hot summer’s day.

With the cold can in the hot humid interior room, it started to sweat pure drinkable water. Since you were shrunk, this ordeal has been quite physically taxing on you. Looking at the water droplets forming on the underside of the can, they prove to be a great temptation to drink. However, from your science studies, you remember that water can get little creatures stuck in droplets. Based upon your current circumstances, this opportunity might be your last good drink of water for a while, but it could end up killing you. Do you take the risk or play it safe? After all, Andy might realize what he’s done and come back looking for you!

The choice is yours!
1512212211212112112.title: Killer Cola, Almost

15122122112121121122.content:
Matt decides that he needs to drink.

After debating if this was a good idea or not, Matt finally came to the conclusion that he needed the water. Slowly pushing himself up from the tile, Matt stands up and gradually works his way over to the side of the can that has more light. Looking upwards at the polished metal celling, you see a variety of droplets forming. Some of these water droplets ranged from the size of a small suburban, to the size of your torso.

Keeping in mind your goal of staying away from the bigger droplets, you move around as far away from them as you can. Starting with the smallest of drops, you planted your face into the drop and started to suck in all you could. Before you were allowed to satisfy your thirsty body, the drop burst and separated into a fine mist like a pressurized water balloon. Obviously, Matt was not contented with the amount he drank so he went back for more. Reaching over to the next pure water droplet, he repeated the same method until every droplet he drank burst.

Through a lot of work, Matt was becoming quite full with water. His stomach felt bloated, but something from the metal container provided a sweat taste in the water which caused Matt go back for more. As the can continued to sweat more and more, many large droplets began to overwhelm the smaller droplets. Matt still sucking away at the sweet drink never saw the monstrous drop of water above him. Quietly it made its way down the can, traversing the smooth slope and eventually it merged with Matt's drink!

As if the world turned its gravity off, Matt suddenly was lifted off of his feet and found himself inside his very drink! Submerged inside the drop like a kid in a bubble, Matt worked furiously to punch through the walls so he could breathe. Scrambling to the metal surface, he planted his tennis shoes on the polished side and pushed as hard as he could against it. Fortunately for Matt, this was enough effort to penetrate through the surface tension in the water. Finding that he could now breathe, he tried to lift his arms, but found them pinned to his body below the surface. He couldn't move, but at least he could survive ' for now...

Without even being able recover from this most recent ordeal, Matt felt his whole world shake again. This time, it was not from the water itself, but from the whole can. The metal flexing under the new stress, you felt and heard the can pop and crinkle as it was lifted away from the counter. A blinding light entered your room as you were lifted several hundred feet in the air above the counter. Without hesitation, you along with the can were moved to the kitchen table where the mixed chip dip, bottles of water, and chips laid. But even further down from the table were a pair of shorts, legs and somewhat familiar Nike shoes.

You couldn't help but notice how high you were from the table. If you were your normal size, it easily could have been a good two or three feet, but currently it looked as if you could get altitude sickness! A fall from here to anywhere below would most likely be fatal. With another glance at the floor, something sparked in your mind as you made the connection of the shoes below to be those of Andy. Unfortunately for you, it seems as if your friend has your life in his complete control! Without even a pause in Andy's step, Matt suddenly heard the metal groaning and for some reason hissing. A violent shake of the can, which could only be the can opening, startled your world. The sheer force from the shake removed you from the water droplet on the side of the can which sent you hurling about through the air. As Matt spun around midair, you were able to just catch a glance of Andy lifting the opened can to his lips to enjoy his drink. Although it is always nice to see Andy enjoying a satisfying cola, you had much bigger problems to deal with. With one final turn, your heart just about stops when you look below and find yourself on a collision course with'
15122122112121121122.title: Water is Goooood. Drink all you can!

151221221121211211221.content:
