Spinning violently through the air, Matt was on a quick decent to the dip bowl below. Horrified of his future, Matt tried to recreate the same motions as the sky divers to get away. Slowly Matt drifted away from the container, but the effort was not good enough to keep him out of the dip of doom. Matt was on a collision course with the onion dip below and there was nothing he could do about it.

Bracing for impact, Matt tried to position his arms and legs so they wouldn’t land like a kid doing a belly flop at the local pool. Landing with a “thuck” in the messy blend below, Matt swam back to the surface to get to breathable air. When his head stopped spinning in circles, Matt was surprised to find his extremities to be so heavy to lift. After eliminating as much as he could off of his eyes, Matt opened his eyes and realized the severity of his situation. He was literally covered in the thick and creamy white onion dip from head to toe. Being concealed completely in goo, there was little to no distinction between him and some of the other non-crushed portions of the homemade dip. Seeing that the only way out was by swimming through the onion flavored pool, Matt immediately got to work cleaning as much off of his clothes but ran into a major issue. As Matt struggled to remove the dip from his clothes his worst fears came true. His premium cargo shorts, brand name green shirt, and even his plaid boxer briefs were all stained to the same milky color as the dip. Although stress from knowing you were in a dip bowl was bad enough, Matt was horrified know that he was well blended into the background. Before you even had time to move from where you were casually thrown, suddenly your whole world shifted. Matt looked up to see if Andy had set something on the table, but he was some distance off and was looking into the living room. Whatever it was, or whoever it was, you didn’t care. Dismissing such distractions will only work to your benefit. After all, you had a job to do, and that’s to live.

With your limited options, you figured that swimming to the outside of the glass rimmed bowl would help you to get out. From your perspective it did not look to be the easiest swim. After all, the closest glass wall looked to be well over a mile away, and each side of the container extended upwards by a mile or more. Starting your desperate swim, you sluggishly toil your way through the thick concoction trying your hardest to live.

After some time passes, Matt made it about a quarter of the way before he heard and felt several large footsteps approaching. The timing could not be any worse. You looked up, and saw Joe’s grinning face looming over the glass walls like some sort of god. With his stomach and mind already set on devouring the chips and dip, he happily lifts you from the table. Rocking your world back and forth, you find that each wave like motion from the rhythmic footsteps inhibits any measurable progress. During that whole time, Matt continued the fight for his life until he became exhausted from the strenuous workout through the sludge. Matt decides to take a quick breather before he gives himself a hernia; he sits upright looking around the container. Matt quickly tries to figure out where Joe is planning on going with you and the food. Fortunately for Matt, he was able to recognize the wallpaper on the walls and identify each room as they passed through.

With a sudden stop from Joe, Matt slid around like tar on an ice rink before finally slowing to a stop. Wondering what Joe’s thinking, another figure comes into view a distance off. Andy’s upper torso gracefully passes by your view as he opens up the basement doors. Accompanied by the sound of footsteps on the rickety wooden stairs, you could tell that Andy was heading down to the movie room to watch another one of his action films. Joe on the other hand was looking at the stair case going upwards towards his bedroom. He could join Andy with the movie downstairs, but that would mean sharing the chips and dip. However a more selfish and satisfying approach would be to pig out on these chips within his room.

Without even a second later from that thought, a long amplified growl was produced by Joe’s abdomen. So what should Joe do? Carry the chips downstairs and watch the flick, or go on-line on his computer upstairs? Joe looked down at his rumbling belly, rubbed his empty gut, and decided to…

Joe’s stomach won’t wait forever! Pick one quick!
151221221121211211221.title: The Dip of Doom

1512212211212112112211.content:
Joe’s stomach growls forced him to make a quick decision. Rather than standing around, Joe didn’t think about his decision and decided to follow Andy to the basement. Carrying the chips, dip, and Matt, Joe navigates the stairs being extremely cautious to not drop the delicious and very good food. Upon reaching the cement and open floor at the bottom of the stairs, Joe and Matt make a quick turn towards the left to find Andy’s make shift Movie Theater. Two large reclining chairs, a small coffee table, and a home theater system were systematically placed into the basement full of boxes. By the time Joe had reached the bottom of the stairs, Andy had already loaded the movie by this point and was already quite comfortable in the soft blue chair.

Joe sat down in the other chair after placing the snack on the coffee table between the chairs. Upon leaning back in the chair, this shift helped his abdomen to let out another tremendous and hungry groan. Matt heard the rumbling chasm just beyond the layers of muscle on a built body. Matt was still trapped inside the dip working as hard to get out of the mess. Even though Matt still had a long way to go, his muscles felt like they were already on fire. Nonetheless, Matt knew that he needed to get out of this mess as soon as possible before chips start removing oceans of dip and possibly you. Without any warning, Matt heard the crinkling of chips behind and above him. Disturbed by this noise, Matt knew that it could only mean one thing. The hungry teens have started to eat!

Matt now making a frantic swim for his life made another quick glance upwards to find a horrifying discovery. A skyscraper sized, and delicious looking chip was starting to descend into the dip bowl. Without any hesitation, the colossal chip crashed beneath the calm ocean of onion dip. With a quick and fluid motion, the chip was then slowly lifted into the sky with what must be acres of the very stuff Matt’s in! Due to the shape of the bowl, Matt couldn’t see where the chip went after it left, and whose stomach it started to fill. Soon after the first chip cleared the skies, another re-appeared to only go through the same steam shovel like process literally removing what looks like seas of dip. Matt now realized that reaching freedom was now a full-fledged obstacle course. Dozens of chips came raining down one right after another. With the chips falling all around, there was simply no way he could predict where the next chip would crash down next. Doing his best to dodge each one as they fell, Matt was narrowly missed being scooped up several times and spared again and again from the hungry teen’s stomachs. Matt knew that this could not last forever. Eventually they would run out of dip, and he would be on the last scoop, if not the last lick of the bowl. As more and more dip was pulled out of the bowl, the walls surrounding him went from a climbable one, to one that was impossible without mountain climbing gear. Realizing his dwindling opportunity for his own self-salvation, all he could do now was to prolong his stay in the bowl as long as possible before an inevitable digestion.

As the teens each cleared the bowls, they gradually worked their way towards Matt. Matt looked upwards and saw one of the biggest chips yet to come into the bowl. With a scoop below the waves of onion dip, Matt thought he would be in the clear, but was horribly mistaken. From under his feet, the world was suddenly lifted like anyone in an elevator. Slowly the heavily loaded chip was lifted clear of the bowl. Hovering slightly above the remains in the bowl itself, some of the contents were starting to slide off. The only logical thing Matt could calculate was one of the teens was waiting for the remnants to stop dripping into the bowl. Matt was close enough to fall off but the dip held his body firm. He would need a little help from someone else; otherwise he might not be able to slide back down to “safety”.

The next few moments are critical to Matt’s future! What will happen?
1512212211212112112211.title: Down we go...

15122122112121121122112.content:
Matt stared blankly looking at the last bit of dip sliding off. If he was to have not swum around in the bowl as much as he did, he would have easily been with the falling dip. Unfortunately for Matt, getting out of this predicament was becoming close to impossible. Dip all around created for Matt some interesting and deadly challenges. All Matt knew was that someone already had him scooped up on a chip, and he was on his way to a pulverizing set of sterling whites.

In a panicked swim through soup, chunks of onions that were not crushed laid all around. The blend of the material almost made it like swimming through wet concrete. The endless sea of dip was encompassed within the confines of the chip. Matt knew he needed to get off of the chip, but he has no idea how or where to go.

A wavy and textured salsa chip loaded with salt helped the fleshy fingers to literally rock your world. Matt tried to look upwards towards the face of the beholder but he couldn’t make out any features in the dark room. Without warning, a swift and hefty force caused Matt to be suddenly propelled downwards. After a few milliseconds of thought, Matt finally made the connection. He was being lifted like a high speed elevator towards the head of the teen above!

Screaming in horror, he knew it was a long shot over the explosions, but Matt tried anything that could possibly spare him his life. As the acceleration slowed, you first saw the stubble hair mess on his chin. Unfortunately for Matt, the chin was not his floor as it still rose. Finally stopping, you were presented with a massive set of fleshy and moist lips resting only meters ahead of you. Even though they were still closed, Matt knew what lied beyond those lips, and he didn’t like it. Especially since the pair of pink lips belonged to…
15122122112121121122112.title: Going up...

151221221121211211221121.content:
Much to your horror, as the few precious seconds passed, you finally were able recognize the haircut to be that of Andy’s stubby chin. Matt couldn’t believe it. The very same person that saved his life is now going to end it in a horrible accident.

Matt was blankly staring at the lips as they started to part. Slowly allowing the light from the TV to gradually make its way into the slimy mouth, Matt was presented with a cavernous and very dark chamber. Slowly as the mouth stretched open the fleshy and wet tongue extended to form a humid landing pad. As the salty chip, dip, and he were propelled forward towards the abyss, Matt knew this the point of no return.

Gradually picking up speed, Matt along with the chip continued to accelerate until they impacted the cushiony and wet tongue. Doing what he could to leave the horrible situation, Matt in a frantic effort began to swim for his life as the dagger like incisors lied just overhead. For a brief moment, Matt thought he was actually gaining some ground in his haste attempt, but Andy’s stomach had other ideas. Retracting Andy’s tongue, Matt realized that his chances of walking out alive from the horror behind him are pretty slim. The pink and textured muscle was now fully withdrawn into the cavernous mouth as Andy began to close Matt’s only chance of escape. The rectangular glassy glow from the TV was now becoming smaller and more circular as Matt watched the lips finally close right in front of his very eyes for his very last time.

As suddenly as all this began, the pace didn’t seem to slow at all once Matt was in the crushing machine of Andy’s Mouth. At first, Matt thought that he would get destroyed in the first chew, but “luck” spared him, from a quick and bloody end. Initially crushing the chip between his tongue and the roof of his mouth, Andy shifted many of the remnants to each tooth for further destruction. Matt fortunately was a piece that was spared from the crushing as the defacing process continued all around him.

Still encompassed in the dip, Matt remained as stationary as he could to prevent being cut in half from one of the teeth. Pieces of the chip were reduced to an unrecognizable pulp almost instantly by the solid white teen molars. With a limited amount of material to work with, Andy’s own stomach growls helped to remind him to swallow. Collecting the remnants plastered in each tooth, Matt was unfortunately mixed into the pulp. The slithering tongue started to rise to dump everything into the back part of Andy’s mouth. Matt, still shell shocked from even being in a situation like this remained paralyzed as he along with the food flowed in the saliva streams to the menacing and even darker hole below.

What should have been a single swing act in the process of swallowing was interrupted by something. Andy’s tongue still continued to wiggle, but overall the massive mouth was a peaceful still. As the dark chasm was suddenly filled with blinding light, the lips opened once again. Matt paralyzed with fear had just enough energy to turn his head around to see….
151221221121211211221121.title: Andy's Destrutive Lifestyle

1512212211212112112211211.content:
The introduction of blinding light was obscuring your vision of the outside world. Holding your hands in front of your face to shield the light, you noticed in the glare a blurred object was rapidly approaching and entering into your view. As Matt’s Eyes finally adjusted to the light he was horrified when he realized it was the sight of an approaching chip. Similar to the one he rode on, the wavy chip that was covered in delicious dip was slowly being brought into the damp, dark, and destructive cavern.

As part of the chip passed the first set of teeth, Andy’s solid teeth came crashing down. Noticing nothing odd about the previous chip, Andy took the opportunity of a closed set of to swallow the previous entrants. Matt along with the already chewed remains was carelessly rolled around the by the tongue and positioned to be swallowed. Matt was hysterical, crying to his friend he veraciously beat upon the fleshy tongue trying anything to grab his attention. Instead of getting the response he so desperately needed, Andy being none the wiser, closed up the walls around Matt and swallowed. Matt as he fell down to the churning mess below he continued to scream as loud as he could. Although the nearby thumbing noises from the heart were overpowering his own cry, Matt continued to try anything he could. The lubricated and nearby tubular walls were impossible to climb, and impossible to grab onto. Covered in gunk, spit and chip pulp, Matt looked around at his surroundings and realized that it really didn’t matter at this point. Andy’s energy demanding teen body viewed him as nothing more than a couple of extra calories.

Descending further and further, Matt rode the top of the partially digested mess on its way down Andy’s throat. Suddenly, the walls began to tighten up and it became very hard to move around. Pushing with another audible and distracting growl from the acid bath below, Andy unknowingly opened his stomach sphincter and Matt and the chip started to descend faster and faster. With the limited amount of light Matt had, he had noticed Andy’s stomach ring passing overhead. As quickly as the pressure was applied, Matt transitioned from the tight confines of the throat, to a cavity of great expanse. Smacking the floor of the stomach with a dulled and cushioned thud, Matt was welcomed to the interior of a healthy and powerful digestive tract. The smell was horrendous. From the trace smell of vomit, to the overwhelming stench of saliva and chips, all were confined in the dingy air and almost untreatable air.

Inside of the dark and churning chasm, Matt really couldn’t see more than his hands in front of his face. Being the nerd that Matt was, he never left the house without a flashlight. Matt quickly wiped off the sloshy mix from his arms and dug into his pocket. Searching through the cargo shorts, Matt eventually found the small flashlight. After scrambling to find the switch, he turned it on to help illuminate this unbearable interior. When the light was first cast upon the stomach walls, Matt abruptly wished he never turned it on.

Looking upwards towards the ceiling above, the weak light was barely strong enough to show Matt the horrendous sight of healthy teen digestion. The flexing and rugged walls of the stomach were already churning and oozing and glistening by the stomach acid. Following the moving ripples in the ceiling with his flashlight, Matt looked on and saw what must be tons of partially digested food already starting to leave. With the muscle closing up around the entrance to the intestines, the soupy chyme was expelled from this horrendous place. With a few more seconds passing, the tight knot of muscles quickly re opened with another loud growl allowing Matt to see that all the food has left. Matt himself was standing upon the chewed up remains of the first chips that laid upon the stomach floor. Looking around the pile, Matt could see fissures starting to form in the material as the acid began to break the food down. Although Matt could study Andy’s internal anatomy all day long, a familiar groaning noise from above interrupted his thought.
Looking up at the stomach sphincter flexing above, Matt knew that this meant that more food was on its way. Luckily for Matt, he was able to briskly move through the sludge and get out of the way of the newly arrived entrants.

As Matt continued to stare at the opening, the next chip dropped in with a splatter. The new slosh was added to the building pyramid of chips and dip making it slightly taller. Matt witnessing the construction, hoped that he would continue to eat more chips so he could climb up the fleshy tube to freedom. The pile continued to increase in size until Matt heard a distinct “thuck” from somewhere outside the body. Before Matt could figure out what it was, he suddenly heard several gulping sounds above him. As the material traveled closer and closer to the stomach, it sounded like a bubbling waterfall. The sphincter opened and in came a torrent of some sort of drink! Matt forgot about the cola!

Swirling around inside of the now flooded interior, Matt held on for dear life to the clotted fat raft that was keeping him out of the acid bath. The cola levitated the gunky mess and also helped to condense the void. There was only one problem with that. Matt’s raft did not take kindly to the presence of the carbonated drinks. The fat all around him slowly was melting away as it was diluted in the chyme. The smallest collision with the stomach walls, or another piece of food would certainly destroy the dying life raft.

“BUUUUUUUUUUURP!” Said Andy. He proudly rubbed his full and built stomach, boasting about how delicious the dip was today. “That dip was excellent! I could actually feel some sort of tingeing on my tongue on a few of the chips. Whatever I added this time, I gotta try to do it again!”

Inside of the stomach it was a different story. As Matt predicted, the raft did not hold, and was immediately disintegrated. Literally swimming in acid, Matt’s skin, eyes and lungs started to burn. There was nothing he could do. The quick swipe of cola destroyed everything that could be used as a platform. There was nothing to stand on, or to use to help float.

A few moments later, Andy was looking to the TV when he heard his stomach growl yet again. At the same time, Matt’s acid burned and digested corpse was flexed and squeezed into the small intestine joining the rest of the food. Andy looked down at his perfect stomach and with a smirk, rubbed his belly and burped again.

“Yup… That was goooooood.”
1512212211212112112211211.title: The Feast Continues

151221221121211211221122.content:
The defined chin and strong jaw helped Matt to identify Joe as the one who scooped him up. Peach fuzz covered his upper lip, nearly unnoticeable at normal size; the small blond hairs vaguely resembled an unruly lawn at Matt’s size.

“Joe, help me!” he cries out waving his arms. The plump lips part and a deafening gale rips past Matt. Joe is laughing. As his sour, humid breath blows around him, Matt couldn’t help but feel humiliated. Although undoubtedly laughing at something on the show, it feels as if he’s laughing at Matt’s pathetic situation.

Matt coughs as he inhales Joe’s bad breath and feels momentarily grateful when Joe stops laughing. He shakes his head to clear the ringing. However a new problem presents itself as he feels the chip below him move.

Although it probably only lasted a single second at the most, Matt experienced the next thing in excruciating slow motion.

Joe’s lips parted once more, slower than before. As they did the tip of his massive tongue appeared. It was like watching a monster emerging from a cave. As more and more appeared from the darkness Matt could see the bits and pieces of chewed chips spread across it. A large, soggy pile of yellow and white mush rested just to the left of the center. Strands of saliva stretched from the tongue to the upper molars before snapping as the tongue extended further. A chunk of compacted chip fell from one of Joe’s molars and landed on the side of the tongue. Matt couldn’t believe how long and wide it was, even at normal size Joe’s tongue was huge, now it was almost incomprehensible!

As it slowed to a stop Matt felt himself and the chip moving towards this horrible scene. “NOOOOOOO!!!!” he wailed but the giant still noticed nothing, Matt’s screams were completely drowned out by the TV.

Joe’s perfect white teeth glinted, reflecting the light from the TV off the saliva coating them. As he entered the mouth he could see the uvula swaying gently over the dark throat, a sliver of chip stuck to the top of it.

He coughed suddenly choking on the stale air. The stench of onions from the dip was overwhelming. As the chip lowered the tongue retracted into the mouth and Matt stared in fascination as the surface slid below him, the chewed food a blur as it returned into Joe’s mouth.

Finally with a splat only Matt heard the chip landed on the tongue. He looked up to see the ridged, pink roof coated in slimy saliva. He imagined Joe’s eyes up there, but he was completely unseen to this giant. The strong white teeth framed his peripheral vision as well as the soggy crumbs clinging to the inside of Joe’s cheeks. Matt struggled to look behind him as Joe’s fingers pulled away and his lips started to close.

Matt let out a wordless scream of desperation as the sharp teeth came closer together and finally the lips shut leaving him in a world of darkness. He whimpered in the complete calm.

Suddenly the tongue pushed up, shoving the chip against the roof of the mouth to crack it in half. Joe wasn’t conscious of his method of chewing, by now he unconsciously obliterated each chip pretty similarly.

Matt, all dignity forgotten, screamed loudly in absolute fear. The tongue shifted each half to their respective side of the mouth to be mashed between the molars. Matt, blind in the darkness, had no way or time to do a single thing to help himself. Luckily he brushes against the side of a molar as it sinks downward, splintering the chip. This action wedges Matt into the space between Joe’s upper teeth, with a layer off chip mush sealing him in place. Below him he can hear the crunches that quickly become squishes as Joe destroys the chip. He doesn’t bother to scream over the din.

After only a few seconds it stops and he hears squelches and slithering as the majority of the food is maneuvered away. Matt knows what is coming. His eyes adjusted to the darkness, Matt barely makes out the pile of chewed food as it’s dumped into the throat and with a deafening gulp is thoughtlessly swallowed.

Matt shudders at his barely avoided and probably inevitable fate.
151221221121211211221122.title: Into the Beast

1512212211212112112211221.content:
Matt struggles to free himself and smiles as he feels the chip paste around him loosen.

To his right, light begins to stream in and Matt squints as his eyes readjust. Joe’s lips are parting and again Matt can see the bits and piles of chewed chips which have shifted and changed. He can see that the piles get thicker the closer they are to the gaping throat. The tongue moves out of the mouth and Matt can see the piles of food, previously out of sight in Joe’s gullet now in front of him, unable to leave the mouth. ‘How can Joe be so oblivious to all of this?’ Matt wonders in amazement.

As the tongue pulls back and the piles of food return into the dark abyss, Matt sees a new arrival. The dip covered chip looks tasty now, but soon it will just be soggy bits with most of it gone down Joe’s greedy esophagus. As the light wanes Matt wonders if his moving has actually placed him in more danger…

As Joe annihilates this new chip Matt is pelted by the bits of chewed food and feels himself beginning to fall with each movement. He screams as he drops for a second before landing in something gooey and feeling himself shift sideways. He gags as he feels his body merge with a soggy pile and everything stops.

Joe has decided that he has chewed enough and Matt struggles to free himself as the pile he is trapped is forced backwards. As he finds himself unceremoniously dumped into Joe’s throat his only thought is: “This can’t be!” With that, the pressure around him increases one hundred fold as Joe swallows. As he descends the esophagus with the chip Matt begins chanting “no” under his breath, each time getting louder.

He stops at the sphincter leading into the stomach and shudders, still chanting. As it opens to welcome the new arrivals Matt’s adjusted eyes make it out the horrible interior of Joe’s stomach.

The pink wrinkly walls move slightly around the growing pile of soggy, yellow, chewed chips. A puddle of saliva and the beginning of stomach acid surround the mountain like a small moat. As Matt and the chewed food fall onto the mound of food he begins screaming his chant. His mind is shutting down from the stress of the situation.

Matt simply cannot believe he will die inside his best friend’s younger brother. His body will become just more energy for the growing, muscular young man. Whatever is deemed waste will exit the handsome boy during his morning dump. And never will Joe know the significance of his snack.

Joe continues to eat, unconscious of the bits and piles of chewed food that glint in the light for a moment as he takes a bite. He doesn’t give any thought to the soggy food descending his throat. He doesn’t feel it drop with a splat in his stomach, smothering Matt. He is unaware of the violent process that is about to start in his belly.

When he jumps suddenly because of a sudden death in the movie, he doesn’t feel the mountain of chewed food level itself inside his stomach. As the credits roll an hour later he doesn’t notice the gurgles emitting from his stomach as it begins to digest his chips. Instead he decides to head upstairs to half-heartedly start his homework.

Before he leaves he turns to Andy. “Dude this dip was epic, you gotta make it like this everytime” he says with a smile, his perfect teeth glinting in the light as he smacks his comfortably full stomach. Andy grins at the compliment and both boys are completely unaware of the extra passenger already lost to Joe’s powerful digestion.
1512212211212112112211221.title: Price of Freedom

151221221121211211222.content:
Still traveling at an amazing rate through the air, it seems as if gravity has already decided your fate. Just barely missing the edge of the table, you zip past the bowl of dip without contact as you continue your fall towards the ground below.

Matt braces for the worst in the last few seconds before meeting his demise. With a massive jolt to Matt’s world, he opened his eyes and was shocked to see that he was still in one piece. The droplet encasing his entire torso and body, helped to act as an airbag when the droplet of water exploded upon impact. Although it was nice to still be alive, Matt found himself in a whole new world of danger.

Looking up at Andy proves to be a bad idea. Just as you fell off of the can, many other droplets soon followed. Large drops began to fall all around Matt like mortar shells in a war zone. First came a few, but as Andy tried to drink the last drop of Cola, he shook the sugary drink violently. Matt seeing thousands of droplets being cast in of the sky caused him realize that he needed to get somewhere safe. But much to his avail, a hardwood floor provided no suitable shelter within running distance. Matt franticly tried to run towards the closest thing in sight which just so happened to be Andy’s Nike shoes.

Unfortunately for Matt, he could have made it to the shelter of soft rubber if he had more time. With rain droplets the size of homes finally crashing down upon Matt’s world, his options were completely cut off. Unable to reach the soft rubber soles of the shoes, frantically looked around for anything else that could be a shelter. Just as he was about to give up, he spotted a carved wooden groove in the floorboards lying right next to him. Diving into the seam, he stayed prone until he couldn’t hear anymore drops hitting the floorboards. With silence in the surrounding terrain, Matt sat up and climbed out of the groove.

Looking up at Andy, he could see your friend’s finally reaching the last delicious drops in his drink and swallowing them. Andy’s long teen body looked extremely satisfied with the last few drops of cola. A smile came across his face when he removed the metal lip on the can away from his mouth. His eyes were not fixated on the floor where you laid, but rather something in front of him. As you looked down towards the massive set of shoes, his toes were twitching in joy. You hoped that this was a reaction to the sugary drink, and not the temptation to move. Without further warning from Andy, the immense shoes started to rise hundreds of feet into the air without hesitation. Matt’s eyes were glued to his foot motions. Noticing that he was not lifting his foot to turn around, but rather step forward, you soon found a new world of trouble. The lifted Nike shoe was slowly starting to accelerate as it moved towards your place of existence!

Quickly looking at your options again, you realized that the notch in the wood was too small to protect you from the foot, so you started to run. In a frenzied dash, you ran faster than you ever did before as a dark shadow started to form over your head. Obviously this shadow can be quite distracting, so you looked upwards at the underside of the shoe. By the looks of it, it was a newer style of tennis shoe, but it was filthy. From being outside, there were clumps of dirt, small rocks, the smallest of twigs, and anything else you could imagine from all the outdoor yard work.

Unfortunately for you, by studying the details you forgot about the treacherous terrain ahead of your path. Your ankle twisted as you accidently stepped into one of the cracks. Being thrown down towards the already blackened ground, you looked up in horror as Andy’s foot enveloped your entire sky. With nowhere to run, you realized your hopeless fate, allowing the foot to come crashing down, ending your life by crushing your body into a bloody pulp. Nothing recognizable from your body remained intact as it was hopelessly squeezed into the shoe with the rest of the remains.

Andy on the other hand, went about his day never questioning where you were. Joe came down from his shower, and they both feasted on the chips and dip clearing both bowls. The thought never came up in Andy’s mind that you were still in his house or for that matter, shrunk. Matt very existence that day was simply forgotten and lost to the grains of time.
151221221121211211222.title: Deadwood

151221221121211212.content:
While Andy's back is turned, you make a run for it. Sprinting as fast as you can all the way to the end of the counter. You stand on the ledge looking down. You hear loud thuds getting closer and look back to see Andy is approaching where he had left you.

"WHERE DID YOU GO MATT?" his voice boomed. He brings his face close to the counter for a better look, glancing both ways.

"IF YOU DON'T COME OUT I'LL DO SOMETHING YOU REALLY WON'T LIKE."

You look back down to the tiled floor below. Just as you were about to jump, you see Andy's hand lower in front of you, his other hand landing behind you. He moves his hand forward, pushing you off of the counter and into his other waiting hand.

"I'M SURPRISED I ACTUALLY EVEN SAW YOU. WHAT WERE YOU GOING TO DO, JUMP?"

You try to yell back at him, screaming and waving your arms.

"I CAN'T HEAR YOU MAN. AND YOU KNOW WHAT, I'M TIRED OF YOU ALREADY. I WAS GOING TO SLIP YOU INTO SOME OF JOE'S FOOD AND DISPOSE OF YOU THAT WAY, BUT THAT'S TOO EASY."

You and Andy both hear in the distance that Joe opened the bathroom door, the water still running.

"I JUST THOUGHT OF SOMETHING PERFECT."

Andy closes his fist around you as you scream in desperation. You pound of the fleshy walls around you. Andy approaches the open bathroom door, looking inside to see the water running in the tub. Joe was in his room waiting for the water to heat up. Andy sneaks into the bathroom and moves directly to the tub. Opening his hand.

"I DON'T THINK YOU'LL SURVIVE THIS LITTLE MAN, YOU'LL EITHER BE SWEPT DOWN THE DRAIN OR CRUSHED BY MY LITTLE BROTHER. IF THERE WAS A WAY TO BRING YOU BACK I WOULD, BUT THERE ISN'T. AND I DON'T FEEL LIKE WATCHING OUT FOR YOU FOREVER."

Andy's hand slowly begins to tilt, sliding along his warm skin. You make a tiny splash in the waiting waters below. Surfacing you peer up to see Andy smile down before leaving your view. You tread the vast empty waters as they continue to rise. Then you hear the bathroom door close.
151221221121211212.title: Andy's Bad - RUN!!!

15122122112121122.content:
"What do we do with YOU?” Andy asked in a loud, rumbling voice.

Somehow, Matt didn't like the unspoken implication in his supposed good friend's question.

"Do with me?" Matt shouted in a squeaky voice that failed to reach the giant's distant ears. "How about helping me?"

Helping you, at the moment, failed to top the list of Andy's concerns. Instead, he looked down at his younger brother's soccer bag, which wasn't completely closed. He saw Joe's sweat-stained socks, his jock, a T-shirt, and he got an idea.

The swiftness of his gigantic friend's movements stunned tiny Matt. In one swoop, the tiny teen found himself enclosed in Andy's fist.

"Andy!" Matt shouted. "What are you doing?"

Suddenly, Andy released his bug-sized friend, who feel, screaming, until he landed on a vast white surface. His impact was softened by the strange surface.

"Where am I?" Matt wondered.

As he tried to get onto his feet, he smelled a very rank odor.

"I figured you can hang out in Joe's soccer bag while I fix my little bro a snack," Andy announced.

Matt realized his friend had dropped him into Joe's mammoth gym bag. He also realized he had landed on...
15122122112121122.title: The Brother's Bag

choices: Matt waves his hands to attract attention
Matt dives inside one of the socks
151221221121211222.content:
His fall ended with a cushioned impact on an unrolled pair of Joe's socks, which he had peeled off his sweaty feet and dropped, as was his custom, with little forethought into the jumbled gym bag.

The biting odor of Joe's feet permeated the socks and assaulted the olfactory sensibilities of Matt's nasal passages.

"Man, these socks reek!" Matt cried. The odor was so strung that his eyes watered and formed tears. "How can feet get so rank?"

Actually, the explanation was obvious, but Matt didn't know his friend's younger brother all that well.

Basically, Joe was quite slovenly in most areas of personal hygiene. He was, as Andy well knew, a slob.

Joe often went for days, sometimes a week at a time, before changing out the socks he wore at his intense practices. As a result, not even infrequent laundering did much to help, and the white socks gradually acquired a sickly gray coloration.

And these socks had been worn for the fifth consecutive day. They were still damp and slightly warm from Joe's recent exertions.

"Andy, this is gross!" Matt yelled. "Please, get me out of here."

Suddenly, Joe, naked, rushed into the room. "Got a call! I am meeting some of my friends. Where did I put my clothes?"

Andy, smiling down at the tiny form of his friend, pointed down at the bag.

"Cool!" Joe said. "I just need a pair of socks. I can't find any in my room."

He reached for the bag, leaving Matt with a split second to decide what to do...
151221221121211222.title: Even More Fun for Matt

choices: "massage my feet and lick them clean."
1512212211212112222.content:
In an instinctive choice, Matt dove inside one of Joe's socks. Worst decision ever, because the smell was even worse than outside. But it was now too late for Matt to come out, because Joe's huge hand was coming down to get his sock.

Joe extended it and Matt fell to the toe area. Then, from this point of view, he saw an immense stinky foot coming down.

"He's going to crush me!", Matt yelled. But that didn't happened. Matt just got stuck between Joe's toes, where he could find sweat and dirt and not enough clean air to breathe. He could already feel the humidity and heat starting to rise in there, and the rank odor filled his nostrils.

Meanwhile, Andy had a mischievous grin on his face by thinking about Matt and his situation. Joe didn't know that he was drowning his brother's "best friend" in his foot sweat. He put his (also smelly) shoes on and left the house, heading downtown to meet some friends.

--

Joe arrived to find his friends, who decided it would be a good idea to play soccer. Inside the sock, Matt felt the intense movement and started to feel nauseated (if he hadn't yet because of the smell).

"I have to get out of here, but how? I can't...move...", Matt said. He tried to escape from Joe's toes but it was impossible. They were pressing him too much. While he was there, some sweat drops from Joe's foot rolled down and fell on Matt's body, some even landing on his face and mouth. Matt couldn't feel more insignificant and humilliated. He eventually fainted.

--

Joe got home a little late, but no one was expecting him to arrive early so it wasn't important. He was, however, tired.

"Man, my feet hurt!", Joe said after a very intense soccer game, running from one side of the field to another chasing and kicking a ball. He went upstairs and, once in his bedroom, he took his shoes and socks off.

"Whoa, do my feet really smell that bad?", he wondered but didn't care much. While laying on his bed, he noticed something strange on his foot. A kind of bug was there. He reached up with his hand and took it. He held it closer to his eyes to see it better.

"No way. NO...WAY!" Joe thought that "bug" actually looked like a person. "Is it dead? No one's going to believe this." He poked Matt with his finger expecting him to move, to ensure he wasn't dead.

Matt woke up and the first thing he saw was the stunned, yet amused, face of his best buddy's younger brother.

"NO WAY!", Joe yelled. "You are alive! You really are a little person!"

"Yeah, but HELP ME! I'm Matt!, Matt screamed. "I can't hear you! I guess that means that you're mine now. I found you, I OWN you", Joe said with a grin.

"No! Please don't hurt me!", Matt pleaded, but it was useless.

"So darn cool! I'm going to tell my friends and we are going to have fun. But I'll wait 'til tomorrow. For now, we have the whole night to have FUN, just the two of us." Joe said in a tone which Matt didn't like. "And I guess Andy can't know about this, he would take you and never give you back to me."

"Now, little human. My feet hurt. You can massage them and lick them clean; or you can have even more fun inside my briefs. I guess, since you can't say anything, I'll choose. You're going to..."
1512212211212112222.title: Matt dives inside one of the socks

152.content:
Kellie enters the lab and notices her tiny brother on the floor and laughs.

She always wanted to get back at him so she slips off her shoes and slowly approaches him.
152.title: Kellie

1521.content:
Kellie walks slowly toward Matt. Matt runs in terror from the sight of his 15 year old sister Giantess.

Each of her steps makes a small earthquake. When she steps behind him, he trips and falls face foward. He covers his head ready for the worst.

"This is too easy," Kellie said.

Kellie raises her massive foot, pulls it overtop of Matt's tiny body, and brings it down apon him. She squeezes him in between her toes, and brings him up to her hand. She picks him out and walks from his lab.

"How would you like to be my pet?" Kellie asked.

And with that she walks up to her room and places him in a little cage she quickly makes. It has a glass wall so she can see into the cage.

"Although feeding you, cleaning up after you, and hiding you will be a pain, I get to know now that I get the last laugh," she said.

With that Kellie laughs and she closes Matt's little cage. And there he will stay for the rest of his life.

He only hopes she takes better care of him then her dead Hamster.
1521.title: Matt's End

1522.content:
Kellie decides to scare her brother. She jumps up and slams her feet down on either side of Matt.

Matt is nearly killed by not only his heart, but the heavy shock he sustained from her landing.

She sits down in front of him, laughing very loudly.

"You think it is funny, to almost kill people like that?" Matt asks.

Kellie can bearly hear him.

"Oh but it is soo funny!" Kellie says. She bursts out laughing again.

When Kallie finishes laughing, she picks him up and heads to her room.

"You know you might make a good play thing. You are soo helpless and funny like you are now," she says.

Kellie brings hip up to her ear so she can hear him as she continues to her room.

"You cant keep me for ever, Kellie! I will get free!" Matt promises.

"No you won't. I will make sure of it. And if you do, I'll swallow you."

Kellie looks at him seriously. Matt is stunned by what she said and the proximity to her giant mouth. Which Matt hopes he will never see the inside of ever.
1522.title: Petting Zoo

15221.content:
Matt figures it is better then nothing. He has a cage with a glass wall so she can see in. But she didn't figure he could see out, or she did and didn't care.

She feeds him some leftovers every six hours. And she skips him when she sleeps. She snores very seldomly, so when she sleeps, he is only disturbed by her moving at night.

She placed him next to her bed, so he is forced to look out over at her when he tries to sleep.

Matt would like it very much if he could get out. But he hasn't tried since what she said. After all, he would not want to see her stomach in full speed.
15221.title: Forever After

15222.content:
After a day or two of captivity and observation, while Kellie is away, Matt begins to plan an escape. He tries to keep it secret, and only can work on it when she is away from the room during the day. He doesn't get a light at night.

Kellie leaves again today. Matt hopes she will be gone a good two or three hours, giving him time to work on his plan.
15222.title: The Plan

152221.content:
Matt's Great Escape consists of two plans, a Primary and a reserve. The primary consists of two parts. And the secondary consists of one part. If Kellie discovers the first plan, Matt will move on to Plan Beta.

Alpha Plan:
Part 1: Wait until night and start digging at the corner of the cage. At daybrake, cover the hole and spread the extra extra material around the cage, minimizing the risk of discovery.
Part 2: Continue untill breaking the border. Seal the hole and hide the evidence, wait untill night fall to slip out. Make it out of Kellie's room before dawn.
Part 3: Make it to the Lab before dawn.

Beta Plan:
Part 1: Build a secondary tunnel if the first is destroyed. Repeat until escape.
152221.title: The Great Escape

1522211.content:
Matt digs out a tunnel. And it reaches about half way before he notices it is getting close to dawn.

Matt begins to cover the hole. Just as he beings to distribute the material, a loud sound startles him and he trips.

To his horror, his sister Kellie is sitting up looking at him through the glass from her bed. She does not look pleased.

She reaches in and smooths out the ground. Feeling along the ground looking for a hole, her finger slides into one, and the entire thing is demolished.

"Naughty, Naughty." Kellie tells him.

But to Matt's surprise, she leaves him alone, and procedes in her daily dressing and heading out of her room.

Night falls, as she comes back in and goes to bed. She takes a little extra longer in getting ready for sleep this time, but she passes out soon enough.

Matt begins to doubt that he will ever get out of this cage alive. He is wondering if he is willing to take the risk of being swallowed the next time he tries to escape.
1522211.title: Failure

15222111.content:
Matt decides to go with it. He initiates Plan Beta which is continuing where Plan Alpha left off but in a different place.

He doesn't get as far this time because he had a late start, and decided to stop sooner, so he had more time to distribute the material evenly.

When Kellie woke early the next morning, Matt was fast asleep. Kellie didn't feel around this time because he looked innocent.

Kellie said to herself: "It would be a shame to eat him, but if he doesn't play by the rules, there will be consequences."

Matt hears this but continues to sleep. He reconsiders his plan the next night.
15222111.title: Plan Beta

152221111.content:
Matt does not let himself falter. He is soo close to achieving his goal. When Kellie leaves the next morning, Matt cant wait, and leaves early.

Matt forgot about his small size and how little he travled. By the time he got to the table, Kellie came back.

Kellie noticed that his cage was empty and the little tiny hole in the other corner.

"You naughty boy! I told you to stay in your cage! I am going to find you!" Kellie says aloud.

Kellie storms all over the place looking everywhere. Getting all up close. She places her hands behind the places that she can't see just so she can get to secure the blind spots of hers.

Kellie begins to move close to Matt. Matt tries to hide, but as her eyes move over his hiding spot, her hands come around the book, and she feels him, and yanks him into the air.

Grabbing Matt by the feet, she slowly hoists him towards her mouth.

"NO! KELLIE!!! PLEASE DONT DO THIS!!!" Matt cries.

"I'm sorry brother, but you have disobeyed my rules, for the 'last' time.

Kellie brings him up to her mouth. She sticks out her tongue, and she places him on it. She sucks her tongue in and she can barely hear Matt scream, pleading for his life.

Kellie tilts her head back, and he drops into her throat. Kellie instinctively swallows.
152221111.title: Matt's Grave

152221112.content:
Matt sees that his plans are futile and that he will be trapped here forever. He accepts the fact that he will be his sister's pet, untill he dies.

Matt expects that Kellie will either eat him, or get rid of him, before she reaches 21 years old.
152221112.title: Matt's End

15222112.content:
(Abort All Opperations)

Matt sees that his plans are fuetile. And that he will be trapped here forever. He accepts the fact that he will be his sisters pet, untill he dies.

Matt expects that Kallie will either eat him, or get rid of him, before she reaches 21 years old.
15222112.title: Matt's End

choices: Approach to one of the colossus.
153.content:
The door opened and Andy and Kellie entered to the room. Kellie was still wearing gown and slippers, while Andy was wearing a red T-shirt, blue jeans, and white sneakers on his sockless feet. They both walked around the room.
"Matt should be here", said Kelly.
As they looked around, Matt had to decide what to do.
153.title: A pair of giants

choices: Try to climb the furry mountain on his sister's foot
1531.content:
Kellie's fuzzy slippers looked far less intimidating to the shrunken teenager than his friend's large, white sneakers.

Up close, they were not as clean and white as they first appeared. The soles of the sneakers had collected an assembly of debris and crushed bugs in the deep, rubber tread.

"Kellie! Andy! Help me!" Matt shouted at the giants as he ran toward a mammoth blue slipper that looked like some gigantic, furry alien animal come to earth.
1531.title: Fuzzy blue slippers

choices: His voice is too tiny to be understood.
15311.content:
"I guess he isn't here." Kellie said with a yawn.

Matt was in full sprint. He was desperate, and fueled by adrenaline. Before Kellie to turn to go back up stairs he dove into the blue fluff covering Kellie's slipper.

She unknowingly carried Matt with her back to her bedroom. Still tired Kellie flopped onto her bed with her slippers still on.

Matt was thrown into the air. He came crashing down on Kellie's cheek. He was too small, and she was too tired to notice.

Despite feeling like he was just on the worst carnival ride ever Matt was happy with where he landed.

Matt climbed along Kellie's hair right to her ear. Slipping inside he began to call for her attention.

"Kellie! It's me Matt, I shrank. I'm in your ear!" She yelled at the top of his lungs.
15311.title: Try to climb the furry mountain on his sister...

choices: Sam notices a bug between her feet.
154.content:
Matt jumped and turned around to the source of the deafening crash. Someone was obviously on their way into the lab. Or, more than one person. He heard several booming female voices accompanying the crashes of footsteps. He watched in awe as his younger sister Kellie and her friends Julie and Samantha entered the lab. Matt couldn't believe it. They were absolutely gigantic. Taller than the tallest skyscrapers he'd ever seen. Almost immediatley, he began to jump up and down, waving his arms and screaming. "Hey Kellie! Girls! I'm down here, on the floor!"
**********************
"Come on girls, let's just see if he's in the lab." Kellie said to Julie and Sam as they worked their way down the stairs towards her brother's lab. They had to ask him a question about something that had happened during school. They emerged from the stairwell into the lab, but didn't see him. "Matt, are you down here?" Kellie called out. "I don't see him." Julie said. "Let's look over by the table." Kellie replied. So they headed over.
***********************
"MATT, ARE YOU DOWN HERE?" Kellie's voice boomed like thunder, causing tiny Matt to cover his ears in pain. "Hey, I'm down here!" He screamed desperately. "I DON'T SEE HIM." Julie thundered. "LET'S LOOK OVER BY THE TABLE." Kellie boomed. That would mean they were heading right for him! "No, girls, don't step on me!" Matt screamed. He watched in horror as the three titanic girls thundered over to him! Matt covered his head as his sister's luxury liner-sized foot sailed over his head and crashed down 30 feet away from him. Matt wasn't out of the woods yet as Julie's enormous flip-flop cashed down way too close for comfort. She had nearly stepped on the tiny teen. Matt screamed in terror as Samantha's enourmous white tennis shoes slammed down on either side of him. "Sam, down here!" Matt yelled. She was totally oblivious to the speck waving his arms between her shoes. "WHERE IS HE?" Sam's voice crashed over his head.
**************************
Kellie and her friends sidled over to the table looking for Matt, but still didn't see him. She stopped next the table with Julie in front of her. Sam stopped just behind her. "Where is he?" Sam inquired. "I don't know."
154.title: Kellie And Her Friends--Super Sized

1541.content: Sam sees the bug between her feet and screams. She then lifts up her collosal foot above him.
1541.title: Sam

15411.content:
With a horrifying slowness Sam lifts her foot up, and Matt watches as the titanic shoe comes crashing down right on top of him. Matt, though terrified, is still capable of rational thought at this point, and sees his only way to survive the encounter with Sam's sole. He was lucky in a way. Had she been wearing her usual high heeled boots he would be dead for sure under its flat sole. Instead she wore a pair of sneakers with ridges on the bottom. With a look skyward he found a place where he could curl up and wait.

He did not wait long as no sooner had he gotten into position then foot struck the ground with a force that would have reduced him to a smear in short order. Luck, and his good judge of distance, was on his side in this instance as the shoe slammed down around him, casting him into a void of darkness. Looking around he found he could see nothing, though his sense of smell told him that Sam really needed to clean off the bottom of her shoe.

Suddenly he realized that he could use his new position to his advantage, and so stretched out his arms, jamming himself into place. When the shoe lifted up again so that Sam could check her handiwork she found a clean, well of Matt guts anyway, floor. Looking down she decided that the dot hadn't been a bug like she'd though. It must have been a trick of the light or a dust mote. She never did check the bottom of her shoe, where she would have found a very tiny passenger hanging on for his life as she brought it down again.

At this point Matt found out that his great idea wasn't so great, as the force of Sam's footfalls nearly ripped his arms out of their sockets, but he wasn't about to abandon the idea, after all he needed help, and though the antidote was in the lab, he doubted he could get it without help. Steeling himself against the pain in his shoulders Matt hung on for his life as Sam continued to walk through the lab following Kellie. He couldn't really make ut what they were saying because his attention was focused on holding on, but he thought he heard his name a few times, and then something that sounded like pouring liquid.
15411.title: Matt under foot

choices: a very tiny bug on the floor
154111.content:
"I need to wash my hands, there dust everywhere." Kellie says as she wash her hand with soap.

"What does your brother even do down here?" Sam ask as she walk toward one the fail invention that Matt made.

"I don't know, some mad science junk that always blow up in his face." Matt's not going to denied that statement, as he is focus on not losing his grip to the shoe. "Let's get out of here." Kellie and Sam were about to leave when they notice that Julie is not moving.

"If its ok, I would like to stay down here for a bit." Julie has her own reason that she doesn't want her friends to know. Both the girls shrug and left Julie alone.

Meanwhile for Matt, he lost his grip just before Sam reach the stairs. He watches as his sister and Sam leaves. He then see Julie walking around and looking at Matt's plan. Having little options, he ran to Julie as fast as he can.

As for Julie, she walks around before she spots...
154111.title: It was just running water

1541111.content:
"Andy has a bit of a crush on me, you know." Julie said outloud after Kellie and Samantha left the room.

Matt stopped moving towards the giantess teen. "Is she talking to me?" He asked outloud, confused.

"So naturally he blabbed about what you two have been working on." Julie said casually.

Realizing Julie knew what had happened to him Matt was suddenly conflicted on what he should do. He needed help to return to full size, but he also had a knot forming in his stomach. He was unsure if she could be trusted.

Julie moved towards a bug she spotted on the ground. "For such a smart guy I can't believe you were dumb enough to test your formula on yourself. Let alone by yourself." She said with a slight mocking tone.

Knowing that Julie knew he was shrunk somehow made her seem even more gigantic. Matt watched as Julie lifted her flip flop clad foot into the air.

Julie smirked as she lifted her foot. "What exactly was your plan once your were tiny ? It's almost like you wanted to get squashed like a bug" She said, suddenly bringing her foot down.

The barely audible crunch under her foot widened Julie's smile. "Uh-oh, I think I accidentally stepped in a bug." She said twisting her foot back and forth.

Matt was in complete shock. Standing, frozen in fear Matt couldn't take his eyes off Julie's enormous foot. With no effort she squashed a bug that was several times larger than Matt.

"Matt ? Was that you ?" Julie asked giggling.

She raised her foot and inspected the bug's crushed remains on the sole of her flip flop. "Huh, guess not." She said a disappointed tone in her voice. "Maybe you were that bug Samantha stomped on before."

Matt was so terrified that his brain refused to make a decision. He couldn't decide if she should run, or stay still. Either was the consequence was Julie noticing the minuscule teen.

When Samantha stepped on him, he had been able to think quickly. He was decisive in the moment, and it saved his life. Now, as Julie scanned the ground for him Matt was overwhelmed with fear. His legs were shaking, his heart racing out of control.

"This can't be happening!" Matt screamed as he fought to force down his fear. "She wouldn't really step on me on purpose! This is just a bad prank." His attempts to convince himself slowed the trembling of his legs.

"Ah-ha! There you are!"Julie said, eyes locked on the tiny teen. "Wow, you're so teeny!"

Matt's fight or flight instincts finally kicked in. He bolted across the floor as quickly as his legs could take him. Sanctuary was just ahead under a heavy cabinet.

Above Julie watched with a smirk as the speck made barely any progress. From her perspective Matt had covered approximately 6 inches. She let him run for a moment more before stepping into his path.

Matt was knocked backwards as the foot dropped down in front of him. Julie had effortlessly blocked his path. He knew instantly that there was no escaping the giantess teen.

"Wow, you almost got away." Julie said rolling her eyes. "But, since you didn't, it's time.......
1541111.title: a very tiny bug on the floor

154112.content:
High above him Kellie has found his vial of antidote, and with a single sniff of it, decides that Matt has made another dud. Looking around she spots the sink and proceeds to dump the foul smelling concoction into the sewer. Only after washing out the vial does she think that maybe it wasn't bad, that maybe her brother had just been working with some nasty smelling chemicals, but looking at the sink she shrugs.

"Too late now. So how about we go grab a bite to eat before we go home today?" she asks her friends, and to this they all agree. Walking out of the lab the proceed outside, and with a quick across the street they find themselves inside a Wendy's. Matt meanwhile has found loads of stuff to contain his interest besides the inexplicable pouring noise he'd heard in his lab. For instance hanging onto the bottom of Sam's shoe as she walked in his lab was easy compared to her running over the turf outside the lab, which conformed to the shoes sole, and tried to crush him with every step the giantess took.

He sighed with relief when they stepped back onto nice, hard concrete, though soon found that hard surfaces were almost as bad as soft, as he had to fight even harder to maintain his position inside the shoe with each thunderous impact. Holding on with all his might he found the transition onto a tiled floor encouraging. Maybe they were finally at someone's house? Does he let go and try to make contact with the girls?
154112.title: Letting go?

1541121.content:
With a sigh of true relief Matt let's go of the shoe as Sam takes another step, and then is blinded by the light as he is uncovered and released once more into the world. Looking around for a moment he comes to the quick conclusion that this is not one of the girl's houses, and that he has made a serious error. A quick glance at a glowing panel set just above him reveals that he was correct. He wasn't in one of the girls' houses, instead he was in the Wendy's just across from the lab.

"Oh man. This has got to be the worst day of my life," he tells himself, looking after the forms of the girls, which are already miles away, well really probably only a few feet if that, but to him it seemed like miles. He feels ready to just break down and cry. It wasn't supposed to be this way. All he was supposed to do was see if the formula worked, and then grow back and find some kind of market for it. Now here he was, less than an inch tall sitting on the floor of a fast food restaurant with nothing to look forward to but getting stepped on.

"No!" he cried, rallying his courage against the world. He wasn't just some bug, he was a genius. He invented something that was theoretically impossible, and he wasn't about to just lay down and die. That's not the kind of man, well boy he was. He would get noticed, or die trying. More than likely the latter, but at least he can say when he got to where ever it was dead people went that he at least tried to live.

Still looking around he realized how hard a task this was going to be. To those above him he was little more than a dot, smaller than a bug really. Yet he couldn't give up. There was always hope, even in the darkest of times. Looking around he saw the girls make their way to a table almost right next to where he was standing. He thought for a moment, and realized he might be better off trying to get in touch with a stranger than his sister or her friends. He was about an equal distance from the counter. So does he head for the girls or the counter?
1541121.title: A contact choice

15411212.content:
He decides quickly that his sister is not someone he really wants to beg help from in this situation, and her friends would probably tell her about him if he got them to notice him. Oh well, as the line went, ‘I have always depended on the kindness of strangers' Sure miss Scarlet said it better, and was in a much less dire straight, but it was the same thought. He would have to hope someone was able to see he was a person before they crushed him.

A long run brought him to the edge of the counter, where he ran into a long and steep problem, the side of the counter. It was like a cliff at his size, and he couldn't see any way up it right at first. Staring at the monumental structure he was just about to decide to go back to the girls when a lucky break occurred. The phone rang. The ringing of the phone was like a thunderous blast in his ears and Matt fell to his knees in pain, and then an impact attracted his attention. The phone cord had fallen off the counter, and now he had his way up.

Running over to the fallen black vine he found that it was just a little shorter than him when it laid flat, and that with a slight leap he was able to haul himself up onto its rubbery surface. Looking up from the floor he knew it would be a long climb up, and so he decided to begin without delay.

It didn't take him long to get up to the counter and more, because before he could begin his climb the person who had picked up the phone noticed the fallen cord, and pulled t back up so fast that the end which Matt was hanging on to went up like a whip, his grip quickly began to slip, and he knew he would go flying if he lost it completely. Does he lose his grip?

With a last scream of effort Matt's fingers finally slip off the black surface of the cord, and the diminutive little inventor went flying upward. He was still in possession of his wits though, and with a little curl to his spine, in much the same way a cat does, he turned his body so he faced upward, and then, just as his arc reached its apex he grabbed the ceiling, thus preventing a fall onto the hard ground below.

He was safe. For a moment anyway. Looking down he found he was right over the counter he had been so intent on climbing a moment ago, and that a tray was sitting on it, with food and drink laid out. The only ones in the entire restaurant were his sister and her friends, so he could only assume it was her order. Looking down he soon came to the conclusion that he would have to fall onto it or nothing, as his grip was already slipping and falling onto the counter or floor would kill him. Looking he finds he has to decide quick as Sam is getting up to presumably get their food. Does he aim for the food or drinks?

Unable to change his course, or do anything else for that matter, Matt was forced to watch as the pink fleshy wall of Sam's throat grew closer, before slamming into it, and then dropping as Sam's swallowing reflex kicked in. Sam, feeling something tickle the back of her throat, nearly choked as she swallowed it and what was in her mouth down whole.

"Sam, are you okay?" asked Kellie as Sam began coughing. After the fit subsided and Sam leaned back in her chair she looked at her friend and nodded weakly.

"I think so. I guess I ate to fast," she said, and Kellie laughed at her in a friendly way. Sam smiled, if still somewhat weakly, and the two returned to eating. Inside Sam's belly you really wish the two girls would question what just happened more, but neither do, and as you begin to lose consciousness due to a lack of air you can't help but think that this is all just so wrong. A moment later Sam let's out a terrific belch that causes every eye in the restaurant to turn to her. Laughing in embarrassment Sam took another bite of her burger an silently swore to herself to throughly chew her food before swallowing. She lives up to that promise for the rest of her life, and she provides your sister with some much needed emotional support after the police report you as a missing person, and finally as presumed dead.

“WHAT IS ALL THIS STUFF?” Samantha asked.

Kellie sighed loudly, milking as much sympathy as she could from her friends. “IT’S MATT’S TOP SECRET EXPERIMENTS,” she said in a derisive tone. “HE WOULD BE ANGRY IF HE KNEW WE WERE DOWN HERE.”

“HAS YOUR BROTHER ALWAYS BEEN SUCH A NERD?” Julie asked.

Unobserved on the floor at their feet, a tiny pale speck dashed about in haphazard fashion, screaming unheard for their assistance. As Matt gazed to the distant faces of the three giant girls, he saw Julie take a huge jar into her hands. He saw the red liquid slosh about in the jar.

“The antidote!” Matt screamed.

He watched Julie wrinkle her nose in disgust. “KELLIE, THIS STUFF SMELLS AWFUL!”

“DUMP IT!” Kellie answered. “THERE’S A SINK OVER THERE.”

Matt huddled in fear again as the enormous girl crossed the room in a few strides. He saw her tilt the jar and pour the formula into the sink.

“No! Don’t!” Matt screamed. “I need that!”

“I OUGHT TO CLEAN THIS PLACE OUT,” Kellie remarked. “MATT LEAVES EVERYTHING IN SUCH A MESS.”

"OH, JUST LEAVE IT," Samantha said.

choices: Hitch a ride on her shoe
155.content:
Matt nearly jumped out of his skin at the noise, pivoting in mid-air as he turned to it's source. As it turned out, it was the sound of gigantic footfalls, pounding down the basement stairs.

Matt wondered who could possibly be coming down into his lab. His questions where answered for him when the person came into sight. It was Kellie's friend Julie. And she was positively gargantuan. Black Vans skater shoes the size of luxury liners. Rising out of them were redwood-like legs clothed in jeans which gave way to a black shirt promoting some skateboarding company. Kellie's friend had become some skyscraper-like being to him.

"HEY MATT? ARE YOU DOWN HERE? KELLIE SAYS IT'S TIME FOR YOU TO HELP US WITH OUR SCHOOL PROJECT!" She said, in a thunderous voice that reverberated around him and caused him to cover his ears.

Matt raised her arms over his head and waved them. He even started hopping in place and screaming.

"Hey Julie, I'm down here!" He yelled.

Julie didn't seem to notice, let alone care as she stomped across the floor in his direction. Each footfall created a mini earthquake that caused him to lose some balance. Matt's attempts to gain her attention were interrupted by immediate danger. Those impossibly huge shoes were coming right at him! They could crush him flat!

"Julie, wait, no! Don't step on me!" Matt squeaked. Julie's Vans stomped down on either side of him and she stopped. Matt looked up, miles up, to Julie's face. High above him in the heavens like some distant planet.

"MATT?" She called again.

"Julie, I'm right here! Here, at your feet!" Matt cried. But even he knew it was useless. His tiny voice would never reach her ears from all the way down here. Julie was totally oblivious to the speck between her shoes.

Matt had to do something to get her attention. She surely wouldn't hang around long,
155.title: The Titaness Julie

choices: Matt has fallen off the shoe somewhere
1552.content:
Matt contemplated his options. However, his mind was made up much quicker than he would have liked.

"HMM, I GUESS HE'S NOT DOWN HERE." Julie said, and started to turn to leave.

Without thinking, Matt bolted at her right shoe. He practically threw himself at the huge piece of footwear. He found that at his minute stature, the material of the shoe created many fine holds for him to utilize. Matt wasn't an athlete, but he wasn't out of shape either. Using the holds, he started to scale the side of Julie's gigantic skate shoe.

"THAT WAS ODD, MATT IS HARDLY EVER AWAY FROM HIS LAB." Julie said as she started to walk out of the basement. Julie had never told Kellie this, but she had always had a bit of a crush on him, in spite of his nerdy tendencies. She had been working up the courage to ask him out for over a year, but every time the opportunity presented itself, she shied away. He spent so much time in the lab that she wasn't sure how he would react.

It presented a pretty big problem to her.

She couldn't know that on a much more microscopic scale, far below her, the object of her affections was having problems that were far more huge than a simple teenage crush.
1552.title: Scale that shoe!

choices: Matt is thrown from the shoe
15521.content:
Matt was undergoing turbulence.

His plan to hitch a ride out of the basement on Julie's shoe had backfired on him. His plan had been to scale to the top of her shoe and secure himself under the laces. But he hadn't made it up in time. He was now holding on to the side as best he could. Which wasn't very good at all.

Each step Julie took was like trying to hold on to the side of a jetliner in flight. The sheer force of the air moving around threatened to rip his arms right out of the sockets.He looked around as his house passed by in a blur as Julie made her way upstairs to Kellie's room.

Julie made a slight detour on her way back to Kelly's room, veering out of the hall and into Matt's room. She decided to leave him a note, telling him to call her later. She stopped at his desk, grabbed a Post-It note and a pen, and started to write...

Matt, meanwhile, had noticed her stop too. In his room, no less. "What is she doing?" He said to himself. He chanced a look up Julie's immense legs and saw her bent over doing something, she looked like she was writing something.

"Julie! Look down! Down here, on your shoe!" He screamed.

Julie, who took no notice of tiny Matt on her shoe, finished writing the note and started to leave, catching him off guard. Does he manage to hold on just in time, or is he thrown off the shoe?
15521.title: Love Notes

choices: Trying to climb to the desktop
155212.content:
After finishing the quickly scribbled note, Julie turned and walked out of the room.

Little did she notice that her routine steps caused something tiny and pale to topple off the side of her shoe.

Not much later, tiny Matt recovered from the bone-pounding fall from Julie's shoe. By that time, she was long gone, leaving him all alone in his own massive room.

Although the change in scale left even familiar surroundings looking rather bizarre, Matt managed to claim a modest victory. He was no longer in the basement, but instead had managed, with some help from Julie, to get upstairs into the habitat of his own room.

But, as the tiny teen looked around the huge surroundings, the fact he was in his own room didn't seem to do him a whole lot of good.

He was still curious about the reason Julie had gone to his room in the first place and remembered the note she had written.

"I wonder what's in that note?" Matt thought as he stared at his towering desk.

If he could get onto his desk, maybe he could read the message and even think of a way to get some help from Julie, his sister or someone else.

What could he lose by trying?
155212.title: Matt falls off the shoe

1552121.content:
*A bit of a forewarning, my writing style is heavily influenced by my foot fetish, so if you're not into that, then you might want to go back and pick a different chapter*

Matt figured "why not?" so he tried to put his arms and legs around the closest desk leg. Just as he thought, his tiny appendages were too small to grab hold of the metal leg at an eighth of an inch tall. But, to his surprise, his hands and feet had an impressive grip of the tower, not unlike a spider.
"Huh, I need to write this down." He thought to himself. Apparently, being the size of an ant also gives you the climbing abilities of an ant. Using this new found skill, Matt shuffles his way up the desk leg.
Now at the top, he reads the note: "Dear Matt, I've never had the courage to tell you until now, but I want you to know that I really like you. Wanna go on a date sometime? Signed, Julie~" Matt was shocked. Always indulged in his science experiments and research, Matt had never really taken notice to girls. He didn't really have the time. After reading the love note, Matt felt butterflies in his stomach. Now he was thinking about Julie, and started to think about just how beautiful she was. Her shoulder-length, wavy brown hair. Her oceanic light-blue eyes. Her perfect curvy body. Her pale, creamy soles. The freckles on her cute nos- wait a minute, her soles? Why was he thinking about her feet? Snapping out of his trance, he decided he needed to go find her.

After about an hour of trotting through the long carpet fibers, Matt finally made it to the hallway. He heard noise in the living room, and figured someone was watching TV. "It could be Julie" Matt thought. It didn't take as long to reach the living room, because the hallway had a hard, wooden floor. As you made it to the couch striding through the carpet fibers of the living room, you saw...
