15521212.title: Your mom and sister

155212121.content:
Even though you were adopted at a young age, you always felt as though your step-mom was your real mother, because she cared for you as such. You cared for your sister the same way, despite her being your step-mother's daughter. Deciding your mom was the better choice, you made your way to her bare feet. When you stopped at her feet, you took a minute to appreciate them. You took notice to her round toes, her cherry red nail polish, and how not a single vein was visible. You admired them for almost an hour. Your trance finally broke when your mom stood up, stretched, and landed a loving kiss on your step-sister's forehead. Your step-mother worked as a waitress at a restaurant and was scheduled for closing, so she needed to get ready for work. You re-entered your trance as she lifted her foot, ready to take a step towards her room. "wow, her soles look amazing t-"

SPLAT

As your step-mom's building-sized foot swiftly pressed you into the carpeted living room floor with its full weight, something occurred to you: You were invincible! You forgot that the shrinking process compresses your molecules, leaving you with the density of normal you. If you were stepped on, it would feel like the force of someone someone standing on your chest, but evenly spread out across your whole body, so you felt no pain at all! Oddly enough, you actually enjoyed it. Being stepped on had a strange, yet very strong appeal to it. Your new fascination with feet was interesting, to say the least. You decided you might do some research if you ever get to return to your normal size. As your mother lifted her foot again, you came with it. Her foot then proceeded to rhythmically smash you into the floor. You thought you were getting used to it, that is, until she reached the hallway. As she stepped down onto the hard wood, your body was pressed deeper into her sole. Now you're really stuck, and thought that if she kept this up you'd eventually be flattened. As she reached her room, she grabbed her waitress outfit and started to change.

After throwing on her blouse, skirt, and hat, all she had to do was put on her nylons and high heels, so she sat on the bed and crossed her left leg over her right. After pulling on her left nylon, she rested her right foot on her left knee. Before she pulls the remaining nylon onto her foot, she takes a glance at her sole.
155212121.title: Your mom

choices: Try to get out, that's enough feet for one day
Stay in her cozy nylons and fall asleep
1552121211.content:
"Did I step on an ant?" Your mom thought out loud. After closer inspection, she realizes its still moving. "Awww, it must be suffering. I guess I better put it out of its misery." That said, she stands up, lifts her foot high off the ground at gives the 'ant' a good stomp. After her foot connects with the carpeted bed room floor, she lifts her heel and starts twisting her foot side to side, grinding you into the floor like a cigarette. After a solid minute of twisting and grinding, your mom turns her foot so her sole is facing upwards to check on her little bug. "What? How are you still alive? I guess I'll just have to try harder." After a few more attempts of grinding her little bug into paste, she finally gives up and says "Well, if you won't die by being stomped on, then I guess you'll accompany me on my shift. The smell might kill you!" She says this with a laugh, and pulls on her other nylon before sliding into her stiletto heels. Your mom really did have have smelly feet, regardless if you enjoyed it or not (you definitely did). This made you think about the foot rub you gave her once.

About a year ago, your mother had just got home after a late shift, and decided it was a good idea to drink a couple glasses of wine (it was a bad shift) before sitting next to you on the couch. As you were watching a movie, she kicked off her heels, crossed her feet on your lap, wiggled her toes, and asked "Matthew? Would you mind rubbing my feet for me, please? It's been a really long day, and my feet are KILLING me." This was probably your first foot fetish experience. You said of course, and started rubbing. You noticed the smell as soon as she kicked off her heels, and it was strong, but when she put her feet in your lap, it really hit you. They smelled REALLY bad, but to you, they smelled like heaven. You never thought much of it until she stepped on you. After you rubbed your mom's feet for about 20 minutes, she decided to put her foot on your face and asked "Hey honey, do my feet stink?" Taken aback, you weren't given much time to think of an answer, so you blurted out "N- Not at all! They actually smell great!" Too drunk to care, she said "Well, if you like the smell so much, you can smell them for the rest of the night." Then she put both feet on your face, crossed her arms behind her head, and laid back with her eyes closed and a satisfied smile on her face. So just like she said, you breathed in her foot scent for the rest of the night, and never even bothered removing her feet from your face. You woke up the next morning still kneeling on the floor with your head resting on the couch and your mom's feet in your face. Luckily, you woke up before her, and she didn't remember anything due to being drunk.

Your mom is now walking to her car, repeatedly stepping on you and smothering you with her perfect feet.
It was a hot day at work, and your mom smothered and crushed you with her hot and sweaty soles for six hours without a break. At the end of the day, it was finally time to go home. Your mom drove back home, kicked off her shoes, and fell asleep on the couch. Do you...
1552121211.title: She sees you

choices: with a splash in Andrea's glass of water
With a soft thump in Kelly's hair
15522.content:
Matt was doing well, all things considering.

The shoe was proving to be easy enough to scale, despite the constant turbulence of Julie's footfalls. Matt chanced a look at his surroundings, and saw they were in the upstairs hall. Matt guessed she was probably on her way to Kellie's room. He gave a great heave, and threw himself over the edge onto the top of the shoe.

Matt made a quick dive at the shoelaces, taking hold as Julie's foot sailed into the air. He found the going far more difficult up here. The wind from Julie's steps threatened to toss him from the shoe. Mercifully, it was over quickly as Julie entered Kellie's room and stopped.

"WELL, WHERE IS HE?" Kellie boomed.

"YEA, YOU KNOW, THIS PROJECT IS DUE IN TWO DAYS!" Andrea said.

Matt looked up at the giant girls. He saw Kellie, his sister, and her other friends Andrea, and Amanda. They resembled a group of mythic goddesses.

"Hey! Kellie! Girls! I'm down here, on Julie's shoe!" Matt squealed. But it was again for naught.

"I DON'T KNOW, YOU GUYS! HE WASN'T DOWN THERE!" Julie responded.

"UNBELIEVABLE!" Andrea boomed, flustered. "I SHOULD HAVE KNOWN WE COULDN'T COUNT ON YOUR BROTHER, KELLIE!"

Matt stood up. He had to get to higher ground if he wanted any shot at getting one of the girls to notice him. He figured his best option would be to climb Julie's body. If she could reach her ear, she'd have to hear him! Matt looked up and gulped. Starting at the bottom of her jeans, it would take a long time and a lot of effort. But he was determined. He started for her leg.

"WELL, BEST JUST START WORKING NOW AND GET A HEAD START BEFORE MATT GETS HOME." Kellie boomed, taking a seat on the floor. Her friends started to do the same.

Matt was nearly to his destination when everything changed. As Julie went to sit down, she lost her balance. Her leg went kicking wildly into the air. Matt, caught totally unaware, was flung skyward, up and off the gigantic shoe. He sailed upward, and actually passed very close to Andrea's face. Matt's stomach lurched as he hit the peak of his flight and the inevitable descent started.

He screamed in terror, flipping end over end, tumbling through the air before finally coming to a landing...
15522.title: Taking Flight

choices: Andrea spills a little bit of water
Matt is washed into her mouth
155221.content:
It was almost surreal.

Here Matt was, shrunken to a mere 1/8 of an inch tall, flipping madly through the air in his sister's room. He was terrified, screaming madly. But to his sister and her friends, everything was normal. They were totally oblivious to his plight.

Matt wondered if he would ever land. He wanted it to be over quickly. No pain from his sudden impact with the floor. He closed his eyes and braced himself for the impact.

It never came.

Instead, Matt landed with a cold, tiny splash. Plunging beneath the surface, it took Matt a second to regain function, and he kicked his legs furiously, trying to reach the surface. He broke it, sputtering and clearing his eyes. It was water. Matt looked around at his new surroundings. He was treading water in a vast pool. But that couldn't be right! There were no pools in his house!

He paddled over to the side of the pool and was met with a wall of glass. The level of the water was far below the top of the wall. It all dawned on Matt quickly. He was in a glass of water. Frightened beyond belief, he tried to climb the side of the glass, but he only succeeded in making it a few feet, but his wet body slipped off the glass and dropped back into the water. He pounded on the glass, but couldn't see through the thick, distorted wall of glass.

He paddled back into the middle of the pool. He looked down and saw that there were several hundred feet of water below him. He looked up and screamed.

"Somebody help me! I'm in this glass of water!" He cried. He looked in the distance and saw a huge hand opening up. It pressed against the glass and wrapped around it. Then Matt's entire world shook as the hand lifted the glass into the air.

"I STILL CAN'T BELIEVE THIS, KELLIE." Andrea said as she lifted her glass of water to take a sip. "MATT SHOULD BE HERE TO HELP US!"

Matt looked up as he heard Andrea's voice. Her gigantic face now filled his entire field of vision as he realized the water glass he was trapped in belonged to her. Andrea had never like Matt much, in fact, most of the time she refused to even take notice of him.

Matt now needed her to notice him more than ever before. He knew if she didn't see him, she would swallow him. She looked right at him, her huge eyes flashing over him briefly. But she failed to notice the the tiny speck floating in her glass of water. He waved his arms and screamed.

"Andrea, stop!" Matt screamed. "Please don't drink me!"

The glass pressed to her lips and she tilted it forward. A current formed, taking hold of Matty's tiny form. He started to drift towards the open top of the glass and Andrea's open, waiting mouth. Matt turned and started to paddle away. But it was useless, and he was now seconds away from being washed over her teeth and into her mouth.
155221.title: Taking a swim

Julie left. Matt sighed in relief. But then, he gulped. He saw his uncle Tom, a vet and Roger's assistant and brother. He was about the size of an Arkeyan Robot!

What's gonna happen next?
1553.title: Matt's uncle Tom arrives

choices: Tom suddenly shrinks to one foot tall
Tom suddenly shrinks to eighth of an inch tall
15531.content: Matt hid in his huge shirt, and watched as his uncle walked over to the table. He gasped in horror as he saw Tom pick up the shrinking formula! "Ahh, lemonade!" Tom said, and he took a sip. Then, he suddenly felt strange, for he suddenly began to wobble, and his belly bounced.
15531.title: Tom drinks the shrinking formula

choices: Matt's Dad Roger [and Tom's brother] arrives into the lab
155311.content:
Tom suddenly gasped as he saw his hand sinking into his coat sleeve, and his pants started to drop. He stumbled because his shoes were somewhat too big for his feet, and fell down to the floor. Matt gasped.

Tom’s gradual return to full consciousness extended over a period of about half an hour. He found his body so exhausted that he could barely open his eyes, let alone move under his own power.

He managed to focus on something. It looked the size of a billboard and he remembered the letters 32.

More time passed. He felt a chill. His eyes snapped open. “Where are my clothes?” Matt mumbled.

He grunted and pushed himself onto unsteady feet. A large wall of white surrounded him. He walked closer to the expanse and touched the wall. It felt like thick cloth. That’s when he noticed that strange billboard.

In the back of his mind, he knew he had seen something like it before. It looked like the label in his boxer briefs.

“Oh crap!” Matt exclaimed. He had realized what had happened. Because of drinking the shrinking formula, Tom had shrunk. And he had shrunk out of his clothes until he now stood, very small, in his own boxer briefs.

Tom ran toward the wall. He began to grab with his fists at the fabric, determined to hoist himself out of the enormous boxers.

Matt had failed to take into account that his formula would have no effect on the drinker's clothing.

After Tom escaped the boxer briefs, he saw more articles of clothing. He found one of his shoes turned on its side. The shoe was as big as an apartment building. A strong stench wafted from the interior of the sneaker.

“Everything looks so big!” Matt wondered how small his uncle had become.

"Tom! Are you alright?" Matt asked his shrunken uncle.

Tom didn't hear. He got closer to his size 13 shoe. The shoe dwarfed the very tiny teen.

“I must be only a foot tall!” Tom exclaimed.

But, Matt had proven that his formula worked.

“Now, I just need the antidote and...” Matt’s words trailed off and his mouth gaped open as he stared up at the distant tabletop. He saw the jar with the pale blue liquid, the antidote to his shrinking formula.

Now what?
155311.title: Matt's one foot tall uncle Tom

choices: Matt's Dad Roger [and Tom's brother] arrives into the lab
Tom and Matt decide to climb the table to get the antidote
155312.content:
Tom suddenly gasped as he saw his hand sinking into his coat sleeve, and his pants started to drop. He stumbled because his shoes were somewhat too big for his feet, and fell down to the floor.

Tom felt very strange as he opened his eyes. He felt a heavy weight pressing down on him and found himself in darkness.

He could not stand up in his cramped confines, so he crawled forward toward a thin sliver of light.

He reached the opening. Stepping into the light, he found himself without any clothes. “What’s going on?”

He took a look around the lab. Were his eyes tricking him? He looked like he had been transported to some weird alien city. Towering structures surrounded him. “Wait!” He rubbed his eyes. “Those aren’t buildings.”

The formula! It must have worked. He had shrunk!

"Tom! Are you alright?" Matt asked his shrunken uncle.

Matt saw Tom's huge clothing on the floor. His jeans looked like a range of rolling brown leather hills. He realized that he had crawled from beneath the sleeve of his own shirt to find himself lost in this strange gigantic world.

“Everything looks so big!” Tom looked down at the hardwood floor. The cracks between floorboards looked as wide as he was tall.

When Matt explaied eerything about the formula, Tom realized that he and his nephew were now 1 eighth of an inch tall.

"Wow!" exclaimed Tom, his colossal surroundings swallowing up his tiny voice. "I'm the same size as my nephew!"

Now all Matt wanted was the antidote.

“Oh no!” His voice carried a hint of panic. He titled his head back and gazed toward the distant jar with the pale blue liquid, the antidote to his shrinking formula. The jar far, far out of reach on surface of the skycraper-sized table.

Now what?
155312.title: I'm the same size as my nephew!

info.brief_description: Matt invents a shrinking formula. Unfortunately, the antidote doesn't work. Uh-oh!
info.description:
Typical high school student Matt, a 17-year-old genius but still a bit of a nerd, invents a shrinking formula and tests it on himself.

It works!

There's only flaw in his plan. The antidote doesn't work and Matt finds himself trapped at his tiny size.

Desperate to get help, he tries to make contact with:

Kellie, Matt's 15-year-old sister.
Andy, Matt's best friend.

This is more of an adventure story. Feel free to add. In fact, additions are encouraged.
